text:
How…?
How
did this happen? Nezuko, don’t die! Don’t die on me! I’m gonna save you no matter
what! I won’t let you die!
I swear your big brother will save you no matter
what!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A young boy,
Tanjirou, carries his sister,
Nezuko, on his back through
the snow. Nezuko
is bleeding from a wound on her head.

text:
Tanjirou?
Your face is covered
in soot. Come over here.
speaker: Kie
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: It’s dangerous with all this snow. You don’t have to go, you know.
speaker: Kie
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
Well, I want everyone
to eat their fill on New Year’s,
so I’m gonna sell as much charcoal
as I can.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Thank you.
speaker: Kie
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Big Bro!

during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

text: Hmm?
speaker: Tanjirou

during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

text: You’re going to town again today?

text: I’m going with you!

text:
Oh no, you’re not. You know you can’t

scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Mom!

At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

preparing to leave the house.

text:
You may not.
Since he can’t use the cart today, he won’t be able to give you a ride when you’re
tired.
speaker: Kie
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: I wanna go with you! I promise I’ll help you!

preparing to leave the house.

text:
Thanks, Hanako. But you’re
staying home today.

At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

preparing to leave the house.

text: What~?
speaker: Hanako

At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

preparing to leave the house.

text:
You too, Shigeru. But I’ll get you tons of goodies,

scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Really?

scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

preparing to leave the house.

text:
Yeah.
And Hanako, I’ll read for you when I’m

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Yeah!
speaker: Hanako
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

text: That’s a good girl.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
Thank you so much,
Tanjirou.
speaker: Kie
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
Sure.
Okay, I’ll be heading
out now.
Takeo, will you chop as much wood as you can?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
Sure, I’ll do it, but… I was hoping
we could do it together.

scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

speaker: Takeo

At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket

preparing to leave the house.

text: You’re blushing, Take!
speaker: Shigeru
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Hey, you shut up!
speaker: Takeo
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: I said cut it out!
speaker: Takeo
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Hurry back, okay?
speaker: Shigeru
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Be safe, okay?
speaker: Hanako
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Big Brother!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text: Hey, Nezuko.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
I was putting Rokuta
down for a nap, or he’d make a scene when you
leave.
He misses Dad a lot since he passed
away.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
And everyone follows you wherever you go.
See you later.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
We don’t have an easy life, but we’re happy.
But
life could change suddenly like the weather. It shifts and moves on. (Thoughts)
It’s not like it always stays sunny, and it’s not like it ever snows endlessly.
(Thoughts) And… whenever
happiness is destroyed, there’s always… the smell of blood.
Woman 1         Well now,
Tanjirou!
I can’t believe
you came down from the mountain on a day like this. You’re such a hard worker!
You might catch a cold, you
know?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At a small cabin in the mountains,
during the morning. Tanjirou takes up a basket
of charcoal on his back and is
preparing to leave the house.

text:
This is nothing, really.
Do you have enough
charcoal?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text: Hey, Tanjirou!
speaker: Man 1
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text: Can I have some charcoal?
speaker: Man 1
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text:
Thanks for fixing my sliding doors the other day.
Woman 2         I’ll need some charcoal, too!
speaker: Man 2
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text:
Ah, Tanjirou! Oh man, perfect
timing!
speaker: Boy
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text:
I’ve been accused of breaking this plate!
Help me out, will you? Sniff it!
speaker: Boy
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text: I smell a cat.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text:
You see?!
Woman 3         Oh my, so it was
a cat?
speaker: Boy
scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text: I told you it wasn’t me!
speaker: Boy
scene:

Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text: Tanjirou! Can you give me a hand with this luggage?

scene:
In town during the morning.
Tanjirou has made it down the mountain.
He speaks to townsfolk
down the street.

text:
Jeez, it’s late already.
I’m glad they’re sold out, though.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At night. Tanjirou is making his way back up the mountain.

text: Are you gonna go back to the mountain? You’d better not. It’s too dangerous.
speaker: Saburou
scene: At night. Tanjirou is making his way back up the mountain.

text:
I’ve got a great sense of smell,
so I’ll be fine. Saburou       I’ll put you up for the night. Come on. Get back here. Tanjirou    But…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At night. Tanjirou is making his way back up the mountain.

text:
Don’t argue!
Come on!
Before the demons show
up.
speaker: Saburou
scene: At night. Tanjirou is making his way back up the mountain.

text:
Thanks for the meal!
Hey, Old Man Saburo,
what are demons
like?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text:
Man-eating demons have always
prowled the land once it gets dark.
That’s why you should never stroll
around at night.
If you’re done eating,
go to bed. You can set off for home at first light.
speaker: Saburou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text:
These demons wouldn’t come inside your house, would
they?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text: Yes, they’d come in.
speaker: Saburou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text: Then, everyone would get eaten up by the demons.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text:
That’s why the demon hunters protect
us by slaying them since way back when.
Lights out now. Go to sleep.
speaker: Saburou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text:
Old Man Saburo
is all alone after losing
his whole family,
so he must be lonely.
I’ll bring my brothers and sisters next time and say, “You don’t have to be scared. There are no demons. You’re
safe.”
But, come to think of it, my grandma used to say the same thing when she
was alive.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Saburou’s
house. Tanjirou is given a meal and finishes it.

text: You be careful now.
speaker: Saburou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Okay!
Whenever happiness is destroyed, there’s
always…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: The smell of blood!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Ahhh!!!
Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
What happened? What’s going
on?! What happened
here?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Mom…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Mom… Hanako… Takeo… Shigeru…
Nezuko… Rokuta…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Nezuko’s the only one who’s still warm! (Thoughts) If I can get her to a doctor, she might survive! (Thoughts) How did this happen?
Was it a bear? Was it a bear that wasn’t able to hibernate? (Thoughts) I can’t breathe!
The air’s so icy! My lungs hurt!
Keep moving
forward! Move your legs faster!
We still have a long way to go before we reach town. Hurry! (Thoughts) I won’t let you die!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I’m gonna save you no matter what!
I swear your big brother
will save you no matter
what!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Ah!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Uraaa!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Oh no!
Ahh!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I was saved
by the snow. I slipped
because of the snow to begin with.
Nezuko?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Nezuko, are you alright?
You don’t have to walk! I’ll carry you to town, okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Arhh!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Wah!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Sh-She’s… a demon!
I just remembered what Old Man Saburou told me.
(Thoughts) Nezuko’s a man-eating demon?
No! Nezuko’s been a human ever since she was born!
(Thoughts) However, she no longer has Nezuko’s scent. (Thoughts) But it wasn’t
Nezuko’s doing!
She was lying
as if she was protecting Rokuta, and there
was no blood on her mouth or hands.
And there was one more… There was one more scent!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Sh-She just grew in size!
And she’s getting
stronger and stronger!
While I was sleeping carelessly at Saburou’s house,
they were murdered brutally like that!
I know it must’ve hurt! You suffered,
didn’t you? (Thoughts) I’m so
sorry I couldn’t save you.
If
only I could help Nezuko at least… (Thoughts)
But she’s too strong for me to push her back!
Nezuko! Hang in there, Nezuko!
Don’t give in! You gotta hang in there!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Don’t turn into a
demon!
You gotta stay strong!
Hang in there!
Hang in there!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
What the…
Who’s that? (Thoughts) A sword?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Why are you protecting it?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
She’s my sister! She’s
my younger sister!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Uauhhh!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
You call that thing
your sister?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Don’t move.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Ah...
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
My job is to slay demons.
Needless to say, I’m going to decapitate your sister.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Hold on! Nezuko hasn’t killed anyone!
Back at my house, there was another scent that I’d never smelled
before! That’s probably the one who killed my family!
It wasn’t Nezuko!
I don’t know why she turned into something
like that, but… but still…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
It’s quite simple.
Because her wounds were exposed to demon blood,
she turned into a demon. That’s how man-eating demons
multiply.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Nezuko would never eat humans!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
You gotta be kidding.
Just now, you were about to be devoured.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
You’re wrong! I’m sure she knows who I am!
I won’t let her hurt anyone!
I’m going to turn Nezuko
back into a human!
I swear I’ll heal her!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
She can’t be healed.
Once you become a demon, you can never go back to being
human.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I’ll find a way, no matter what! So, please… don’t
kill her!
I’ll hunt down the one who slaughtered my family!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I’ll make everything alright!
Please! Please!! Don’t do it!
Don’t take anyone else from me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I’m begging you not to…
Please… don’t kill my younger sister! Please don’t do it.
I’m begging you…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Grr…
Don’t ever give others
a chance to murder you!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Wha…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Stop that pathetic groveling!
If it was the least bit effective, your family wouldn’t
be dead!
Can a weakling who can’t take the initiative in such a situation heal his sister?!
Hunt down the enemy?!
Don’t make me laugh!
The weak have no rights or choices!
Their only fate is to be relentlessly crushed
by the strong! The demons might know how to cure your sister!
But don’t
think that a demon would respect your will or wishes!
Naturally, I have no respect for you, either!
That’s reality!
Why did you throw yourself over your sister
earlier? Was that your way of protecting her?
Why didn’t
you swing your hatchet? Why did you show your back to me?
All those blunders led to your sister’s capture!
I could have skewered
her along with you!
Don’t cry. Don’t
despair. Now’s not the time for that. (Thoughts) I know you’re
devastated.
Your family was massacred, and your sister’s
become a demon. (Thoughts) I know it’s painful. I
know you want to scream. I get it.
If only I’d gotten here a half-day
sooner, your family
might not have ended up dead.
But there’s no way to turn back time.
Feel the rage.
The powerful, pure rage of not being able to forgive will become your answering drive to take
action!
With such a fragile resolve
like yours, you can’t protect
your sister or heal her, or get revenge for your family!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: No!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Arghhh! Ahhh!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Stop!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Arghhhh!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
A straightforward attack
driven solely by emotion…
You fool!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Hmm? Where’s his hatchet?
head.]
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Just before he hid behind the tree, he
hurled that rock toward me and,
at the same time, tossed the hatchet
in the air.
He hid his hands as he pretended
to attack so I wouldn’t
realize he was unarmed.
He knew he couldn’t beat
me.
He tried to bring me down after I struck him! (Thoughts) This kid…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Uaar!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Damn! She’ll devour him!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.
character:
Prostitute 2     But she sure is ugly. I’m surprised that she got taken in
here. Prostitute 3

text:
Nezuko…
It wasn’t Nezuko!
She’d never eat humans!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Graahh!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Long ago, someone
said the same thing, only to be devoured by a demon.
When a demon is starving, it will kill and devour
even its own parents or siblings because they’re nutrient-rich.
I’ve seen it happen more times than I can count.
This girl has been wounded,
and she’s expending
energy to heal those
injuries.
She must’ve drained
vast amounts of her strength
as she transformed into a demon.
That means she’s
severely starved at this moment,
without a doubt.
She must’ve wanted
to feast on a human right away,
even if it’s her own brother…
Yet she protected him instead, and she even intimidated me…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: Grr!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I wonder… These siblings might be… different
from others.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I’m sorry to leave you behind,
Tanjirou.
Take care of Nezuko
for me, all
right?
speaker: Kie
scene:
In Tanjirou’s unconsciousness. Tanjirou is lying face down. Kie and his dead siblings
surround him.

text: You awake?

Nezuko… I’ll keep working
hard, okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri during the day. Urokodaki trains
Tanjirou on how to slice cleanly.

text: Huh?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later, on Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Urokodaki with his sword in hand.

text:
Today, I did nothing but fall.
Training to break my fall and get up quickly from any position. Argh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later, on Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Urokodaki with his sword in hand.

text:
I wield my sword, and I charge
Mr. Urokodaki, really
trying to kill
him.
In contrast, Mr. Urokodaki is bare-handed and unarmed.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later, on Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Urokodaki with his sword in hand.

text:
Huh?!
What?!
But he’s ridiculously powerful!
He flings me away to roll on the ground
every time.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later, on Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Urokodaki with his sword in hand.

text: I’m home, Nezuko.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later, on Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Urokodaki with his sword in hand.

text:
Today,
I learned breathing
techniques and some forms.
Total Concentration Breathing?
Urokodaki        That’s right. And I’m going to teach you all ten of the Water Breathing
forms.
Remember to take a long breath so the oxygen flows into every cell in your body.
This will enhance your body’s natural
healing power, and both stabilize and energize your spirit.
Relax your upper
body while bracing
your lower half. All right, breathe!
Urokodaki        Wrong!
Tanjirou        Agh…! Urokodaki      Next! Forms!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri during
the day. Tanjirou
continues training.

text: Right! Like this?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri during
the day. Tanjirou
continues training.

text:
This?
Urokodaki        Wrong!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri during
the day. Tanjirou
continues training.

text:
I get yelled at for not bracing
my stomach and am clobbered to a pulp.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri during
the day. Tanjirou
continues training.

text:
Next, he told me to become one with the water.
Urokodaki        Get
in there!
Ahhh! Nezuko!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou and Urokodaki stand on a cliff near a waterfall.

text: Ahhh!! Nezuko! I am water!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou and Urokodaki stand on a cliff near a waterfall.

text:
And now it’s been six months since Nezuko was last awake.
Mr. Urokodaki summoned
the doctor right away and had him examine her, but
he found nothing wrong.
But it’s not normal for her to stay asleep
like this. (Narration) I was
scared.
I worry that one morning,
I’ll wake up to find her dead. (Narration) Not a day goes by that
I don’t worry.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou and Urokodaki stand on a cliff near a waterfall.

text:
My descents are getting more dangerous, and the air’s even thinner
where I train.
Ngh… Urgh… Agh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
continues his mountain
descent.

text:
Time and time again, I think I might die.
Urokodaki        I
have nothing more to teach you.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
continues his mountain
descent.

text:
A year after
I arrived at Mt. Sagiri,
he told me all of a sudden… Huh?
Urokodaki        The
rest is up to you!
Whether or not you can improve
to the next level. Come with
me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Ah…
Urokodaki        If
you can slice this boulder,
I will allow you to enter the Final Selection.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Ah…
Is a
boulder… something you slice? (Thoughts) Something you can slice
with a sword?
I don’t think
I can do it. My sword will snap!
Mr. Urokodaki, please wait!
Mr. Urokodaki!
After that,
Mr. Urokodaki never taught me anything again. Ngh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Argh!
Ah… Hah… Argh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Every
day, I practiced over and over what I’d learned
from Mr. Urokodaki.
The basics like holding the breath and flexibility… I was glad I had written
those down in my journal.
Argh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
But… even after six months
had passed, I still couldn’t
slice the boulder. (Narration) I felt frustrated.
Not enough!
I’m not training
hard enough!
I gotta do more! More!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Am I… hopeless?
Is Nezuko going to die without ever waking up? (Thoughts) Ahh! I’ll almost give in!
I’m breaking down!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text: Keep working, Tanjirou! You can do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text: Shut up!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
A man shouldn’t whine.
It’s unseemly.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
When did he show up?
There’s
no scent. A fox mask?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text: No matter how you suffer, bear it in silence… if you’re a man.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
If you call yourself
a man.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Urk… Agh!
Urgh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text:
Slow. Weak.
Immature.
That’s not what you call a man.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou catches his breath.

text: What are you doing?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
I’d like to know what you think you’re
doing.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: What do you mean? I’m training.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
How long do you plan to keep your butt on the ground
without even taking
a stance?
Ngh!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Come on. Come at me.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
But you have a wooden sword,
and I have a real sword!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Hahaha… Hahaha!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
Well, well! Thank you for worrying
about me.
So you think you’re actually going to injure me!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Ngh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
Well, you have absolutely nothing to worry about!
I’m more powerful than you because
I’ve sliced that
boulder!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: He sliced that boulder?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
You’ve learned nothing.
You haven’t mastered a single thing!
Particularly, the breathing technique
Mr. Urokodaki taught
you… Total Concentration Breathing.
He knows Mr. Urokodaki? And the breathing
technique, too?
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
All you did was memorize it as fact.
Your body has no clue what it needs
to do.
What the hell were you doing for a whole year and a half?
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Urgh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Slam it into your flesh!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
More! More! More!
So that you’ll never forget the secrets Mr. Urokodaki taught
you! Pound it into the marrow of your bones!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
I’m trying!
I’m trying
every single day! With everything I’ve got! But I’m
not making any headway!
I just can’t go any further!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
Go further! If you’re
a man!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
If you call yourself
a man!
There’s no other way to go but forward! Bring it on!
Show me what you’re capable
of!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text:
I’m leaving
the rest to you.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Yeah.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
On Mt. Sagiri.
Tanjirou faces Sabito.

text: Ngh… Ah… Makomo
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text: Did you see that just now?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
What a strike that was!
Not a single bit of wasted
motion! It was really beautiful!
I want to become
like that!
You think I can become like him?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
Heh…
I’m sure you can… since I’ll be looking after you.
Hehe!
speaker: Makomo
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
She’s so cute…
Who are you?
This
girl’s name was Makomo. (Narration) She told me the boy’s name was Sabito. (Narration) Makomo also pointed
out my defects.
She corrected my unnecessary movements
and bad habits.
But when
I asked her why she was doing that, and where she came from, she
didn’t tell me anything.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text: Both he and I love Mr. Urokodaki very much.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
That was Makomo’s
pet phrase. (Narration) She and Sabito
weren’t siblings.
She said Mr. Urokodaki raised
them after they’d
been orphaned.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
There are other children
besides us.
They’re always watching you, Tanjirou.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
Makomo is a somewhat
strange girl. (Narration) She speaks
in such an abstract, dreamy way.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
See, Total Concentration Breathing
accelerates your blood circulation and your heart rate.
That causes your body temperature to spike, making
you as strong as a demon while staying human.
The most important thing is to expand your lung capacity.
When you bring lots of air into your blood, and when your blood gets excited, your bones
and muscles scurry to heat up and grow stronger.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
I’m not sure I get
that.
How can I do that?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
Train to death.
At the end of the day, there’s nothing
else you can do.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text:
Until
my arms and legs were ready to fall off…
Until my lungs and heart were ready
to burst, I swung my sword.
(Narration) But still… I just couldn’t beat Sabito.
Not until six months later.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
wakes up.

text: When I challenged him that day, Sabito was wielding a real sword.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text:
After six months, finally,
you have the look of a man.
speaker: Sabito
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text:
Today’s the day I win!
Head-on battles are simple. (Thoughts) Whoever’s
stronger and faster
wins.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text: The battle was over in an instant.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text:
On this day, in this moment, for the first time, my blade reached
Sabito first.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text:
The moment I won, Sabito
smiled.
He looked sad and happy. A relieved
kind of smile.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text: Tanjirou…
speaker: Makomo
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text: Ah…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text:
You did great. Don’t forget what you just
did.
Win, okay, Tanjirou?
Beat that guy, too.
The next thing I knew,
Sabito was gone… Ah…!
… and my sword, which I was sure had slashed Sabito’s
mask… had sliced the boulder.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
Six months
later, on Mt. Sagiri. Tanjirou
and Sabito face each other.

text:
The reason I won… was because I learned
to detect the scent of the opening thread.
When I’m battling
someone and I pick up this scent,
then I can see the thread.
The thread is connected from my blade to my opponent’s opening,
growing taut the instant I see it.
My blade is drawn toward
it with great force, and then I slash the opening.
speaker: Tanjirou

text:
Mr. Urokodaki…
Urokodaki        I
had no intention of sending
you to the Final Selection.
I didn’t want to see children
die anymore.
I was sure you wouldn’t be able to slice this boulder, but…
Urokodaki        Well done, my boy.
Tanjirou, you’re… a remarkable kid.
Urokodaki        Make sure you come back alive
from the Final
Selection.
Both your sister and I will be waiting
for you here.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
has cut the boulder in half successfully. Urokodaki walks toward
him.

text:
Wow… What’s the occasion?
There’s so much.
Urokodaki        You’ve completed all your training, so we’re celebrating.
Don’t be shy. Eat up.
Urokodaki        (Thoughts) Tanjirou… there’s nothing
more I can do for you.
From here on out, you’ll
be going through
such hardship and strife. Your training will seem like nothing in
comparison.
So for now, at least,
you should rest well without
a care in the world.
Urokodaki        Hey, Tanjirou…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Yes?
Urokodaki        Did
you enjoy that hot pot?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Yes! I haven’t had such a feast in so
long!
Urokodaki        A growing
boy like you with a hearty appetite
should get stronger
the more he eats, as well as grow bigger in size.
But that goes for demons, too.
Remember this. Basically, a demon is as strong
as the number of humans
he’s devoured.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
So, the more they eat, the stronger they
get?
Urokodaki        That’s right.
There are demons
who gain power,
become able to transform their bodies,
and even use strange spells.
Urokodaki        When your sense of smell
becomes keener, you’ll be able to tell how many humans a
demon has consumed.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
What’s this?
Urokodaki        It’s called a “warding
mask.”
I’ve charged it with a spell to protect
you from harm.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text: A warding mask…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text: Nezuko…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou prepares for the Final Selection. Before
he leaves, he goes to the back room where Nezuko is sleeping.

text:
I’m coming back here no matter what, all right?
Urokodaki        Don’t worry about your sister. I’ll take good care of her.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou prepares for the Final Selection. Before
he leaves, he goes to the back room where Nezuko is sleeping.

text: All right! Thank you very much!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou prepares for the Final Selection. Before
he leaves, he goes to the back room where Nezuko is sleeping.

text: I’ll be going, then, Mr. Urokodaki!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou prepares for the Final Selection. Before
he leaves, he goes to the back room where Nezuko is sleeping.

text:
Say hello to Sabito
and Makomo for me!
Urokodaki        What?
Tanjirou… how do you… know the names of those dead children?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou prepares for the Final Selection. Before
he leaves, he goes to the back room where Nezuko is sleeping.

text:
Wow… Look at all these
wisteria flowers. Even though they’re
out of season…
There are so many.
Everyone. We thank you for coming
here tonight to the Demon
Slayers Corps Final Selection.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria
flowers.

text:
There are demons imprisoned here on Mt. Fujikasane, captured
alive by the Demon
Slayer swordsmen, and unable to leave.
speaker: Kanata
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria
flowers.

text:
That is because wisteria, which demons hate so much, blooms year-round from the bottom to
halfway up the mountain.
speaker: Kiriya
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria
flowers.

text:
However, there is no wisteria from this point
on, and so demons abound.
speaker: Kanata
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria
flowers.

text:
You need to survive
here for seven days to pass the Final Selection.
And now, be on your way.
speaker: Kiriya
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria
flowers.

text:
Survive for seven days… That’s
all I’m going to think about.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text:
First, I’m going to survive
tonight.
Once the sun comes up, the demons won’t
be able to do anything, so I can get some rest
then.
So I’ll have to head east!
I’m gonna make my way to where the sunlight
will hit first!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text:
This smell… It’s a demon!
And it’s nearby!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text: Total Concentration! Water Breathing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text:
The scent of the thread!
Fourth Form! Striking
Tide!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text:
I did it… I defeated demons! I’ve grown stronger! (Thoughts) All that training
wasn’t for nothing…
I’ve mastered it!
If I slash a demon with the sword Mr. Urokodaki gave
me,
Urokodaki        (Flashback) A demon’s weak spot is its neck!
But you can’t kill it with a normal sword
even if you slash its
neck.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text:
Then, how can I take it down?
Urokodaki        (Flashback) The swords wielded
by the Demon Slayer Corps were forged
with a special kind of steel. That’s the only way to kill a demon.
They’re
called the “Nichirin
Swords.”
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text: Rest in peace.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text: What’s this rotten smell?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text: No one ever told me! I never signed up for this!
speaker: Boy
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text: What’s going on?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text: What the hell is that?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Tanjirou runs through the forest by himself.

text:
Hey, Sabito… Do you think Tanjirou
can beat that
one?
speaker: Makomo
scene:
In the forest where
Tanjirou trained with Urokodaki.

text:
I don’t know.
No matter
how hard you try, it’s never enough. You know that well yourself, don’t
you?
speaker: Sabito
scene:
In the forest where
Tanjirou trained with Urokodaki.

text: What’s this morphed demon doing here anyway? They didn’t tell us!
speaker: Boy
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text: He got eaten!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text: Ahh!!
speaker: Boy
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Don’t wimp out!
Save him… Save him! Save him!
(Thoughts) I’m not powerless anymore! (Thoughts) Move!
Water Breathing! Second Form! Water Wheel!
Hand Oni         Another sweet little fox has come to me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
“Another”?
Hand Oni         Little fox cub, what is the year of Meiji now?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
It’s the Taisho Period
now!
Hand Oni         Taisho?
Ahhh!! Holy
crap!! Time has passed into a new period?! Again! Again while I’ve been held prisoner inside this place! Ahhh!! Unforgivable! Unforgivable!!
Damn you, Urokodaki! Damn you, Urokodaki! Damn you, Urokodaki! Damn you,
Urokodaki!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
How do you know Mr.
Urokodaki?
Hand Oni         I know him, all right! Because
Urokodaki is the one who captured me!
I’ll never forget that day 47 years ago!
Back when he was still hunting
demons. It was the Edo Period during
the Keio Era.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text: Hunting demons? Edo Period?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
You’re lying!
No demon has ever lived that long!
The only demons in here should
be the ones who’ve eaten
just two or three humans!
They don’t
live long because
they’re killed during
the Final Selection, and they even eat
their own kind!
Hand Oni         Yeah, but I’ve survived
all this time.
Inside this wisteria prison,
I’ve eaten at least fifty of you brats.
speaker: Boy
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Fifty…?
Hand Oni         Eleven… twelve…
thirteen… That makes you Number
14!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
What are you talking
about?!
Hand Oni         The number
of Urokodaki’s disciples I’ve eaten, that’s
what.
I promised myself to kill every
one of his disciples.
Hand Oni         Let’s see… The ones who particularly stand out to me… It’s those two.
Those two… That brat’s
hair was an unusual color.
He was the most powerful. A scar by his mouth.
The other one was a female
brat in a flowery kimono.
She was small
and lacking in power, but she was awfully agile.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Wha…?
They had already
been killed by this demon?
But I was with them!
Hand Oni         That mask.
I can tell by the fox masks.
I know the texture
of the masks Urokodaki carved. The same style of carving he used for his own goblin mask.
Warding masks, right?
Everyone got eaten just because they were wearing them. They’re all here inside
my belly. Urokodaki might as well have killed
them himself! When I said that
to the girl, she was crying and fell into a rage.
And right after that, she lost control of her movements.
I ripped off her limbs, and then…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text: Grr… Yahhh!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Calm down, Tanjirou. Your breathing is uneven.
It’s all right. Never mind us!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
I’m getting out of here while the demon’s taking
out that guy!
Hand Oni         Another one of Urokodaki’s brats is dying.
I wonder
how he’s gonna
feel when another
one of his kids doesn’t
come home. I wonder what kind
of look he’ll have on his face.
Oh man, I wish I could
see it.
speaker: Boy
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Big Bro… Big Bro…!
Big Bro!
Hand Oni         (Thoughts) He dodged it! So he can still move?
Great! I can have some fun!
speaker: Shigeru
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Damn! No matter
how many arms I cut, they grow back in a second!
Hand Oni         You can’t
defeat me just by slashing
off my arms.
Then again, even that pink-haired brat couldn’t slice off my head!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
I can’t just let this one go.
Before any more lives are sacrificed, I gotta bring
him down now! Ahhh!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
A demon’s scent coming from the ground?
Hand Oni         (Thoughts) H-He jumped! Dammit,
I missed him!
But there’s no way he can dodge
this attack in mid-air!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Do you think Tanjirou’s going to lose, too?
His neck is so tough, after all.
speaker: Makomo
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
He may lose, and yet, he may win.
Either way, there’s one irrefutable fact.
That Tanjirou… is the man who sliced the toughest, largest
boulder of all.
Hand Oni         (Thoughts) He deflected me!
Hand Oni         (Thoughts) He got too close to me!
Not to worry.
My neck is tough! He can’t slash it!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
First Form!
Hand Oni         (Thoughts) As soon as he fails to cut my neck, I’m going to crush his head! Just like I did to the other
one!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text:
Uahhhh!!
Hand Oni         Ugh…

scene:
Back at the Final Selection forest.
The candidate is still running
from the Hand Demon.
He trips and falls.

text: Water Surface Splash!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

The candidate is still running

text: Grr…
speaker: Tanjirou

text: Arhhh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Final Selection
forest. Tanjirou is facing the Hand Demon.

text:
First Form!
Water Surface Slash!
Hand Oni         Urokodaki!
Hand Oni         Dammit! Dammit!
Dammit!
My body’s
crumbling and disappearing. I can’t stop it!
Hand Oni         Dammit… To think that the face of a Demon Hunter will be the last thing I’ll ever see…
Hand Oni         How did it come to this?
H. Hand Oni     I’m
so scared. I’m all alone.
Brother, where are you?
I want you to hold my hand! Like you always
do!
Why…? Why on earth did I bite you to death,
Big Brother?
Hand Oni         Huh? Wait, who’s this “Brother” person?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Final Selection
forest. Tanjirou is facing the Hand Demon.

text: What a sad scent.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the real world, Tanjirou
walks over to what is left of the Hand Demon’s body.

text:
God, please…
The next time this man is reborn, please make sure he doesn’t
turn into a demon.
H. Hand Oni     Brother!
H. Hand Oni     Brother! Brother!
Hold my hand, will
you?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the real world, Tanjirou
walks over to what is left of the Hand Demon’s body.

text: You’re hopeless, you know? Still such a scaredy-cat.
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the dark realm,
the young Hand Demon sees a
light. He runs toward
the light, which comes from a
lantern his older brother carries.

text:
Sabito,
Makomo… and everyone
else who was killed…
(Thoughts) I won.
You can rest easy now.
I guess you’re going home as promised.
Even though you’re just souls,
you’re going back to Mt. Sagiri… and to Mr. Urokodaki whom you love very much.
If I’d ended up dead, my soul would’ve returned
there, too.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the real world,
the last of the Hand Demon’s body disintegrates.
Tanjirou looks up and sees the forest where he trained with
Sabito and Makomo. The spirits of the students killed by the Hand Demon are
gathered.

text:
There’s something I want to ask you.
How do I turn someone who’s become a demon back into a human?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Tanjirou continues
on. In the rain, a demon chases him through the Final Examination forest. Tanjirou traps the Demon using tree branches.

text: Grr… Gahh!!
speaker: Demon
scene:
Tanjirou continues
on. In the rain, a demon chases him through the Final Examination forest. Tanjirou traps the Demon using tree branches.

text: Please tell me… how I can turn Nezuko…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Tanjirou continues
on. In the rain, a demon chases him through the Final Examination forest. Tanjirou traps the Demon using tree branches.

text: Guahhh!

text: … back into a human!
speaker: Tanjirou

on. In the rain, a demon chases him through the Final Examination forest. Tanjirou traps the Demon using tree branches.

text:

Hah… I made it.

scene:
Tanjirou continues
on. In the rain, a demon chases him through the Final Examination forest. Tanjirou traps the Demon using tree branches.

text:

I don’t see that guy here, either.
It’s all because I blacked out at that moment. I couldn’t save
him.

The Color Changing

text: Well, not that I’m going to live very long. Probably.

and three other candidates stand at the gathering area. Zenitsu, clad in

text:
They’re asking us to choose, but how are we supposed
to pick one out? (Thoughts)
I’ve never seen an ore before, and I can’t tell the difference anyway.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou
and three other candidates stand at the gathering area. Zenitsu, clad in
yellow, looks exhausted. Genya, clad in black, looks angry. Kanao, clad in
pink, is calm.

text:
I have absolutely no clue.
As many of five of them managed to survive, huh? Excellent.
The number of my children has increased again.
I wonder what kinds of swordsmen
they’ll become.
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou
and three other candidates stand at the gathering area. Zenitsu, clad in
yellow, looks exhausted. Genya, clad in black, looks angry. Kanao, clad in
pink, is calm.

text:
I was so naive.
I couldn’t even have a talk with a demon.
All they did was attack me and try to kill me right
away. Sorry, Nezuko.
I never got to ask them… how to turn a demon back into a human.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text:
Even my uniform
is heavy.
I wanna get home as soon as possible, but my whole
body hurts.
Ugh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text:
I made it…
Nezuko… Mr. Urokodaki…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text:
Hey! Nezuko! You… You’re
awake!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text: Nezuko! Ugh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text: Ouch…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text:
Ahh…
Why… Why’d you fall asleep all of a sudden?
Never waking up once!
I was worried
you were going
to die, you know?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text:
Uuh…
Urokodaki        You
came back to us alive.
Urokodaki        I
see. You killed that morphed
demon.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou struggles to walk, alone on a path through
a rice field.

text:
Yes.
Urokodaki        At
last.
I’m truly impressed that you made it back.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Urokodaki’s house, later that night. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki sit by a fire.

text:
Yes.
Urokodaki        There are several kinds of demons.
The demons
who use a special spell called the “Blood Demon
Art” possess supernatural abilities.
You may have to fight those demons, as well, from now on.
And battling them will be far more difficult than anything you’ve
known until now.
Even so, Tanjirou, I’m sure you’ll be fine.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Urokodaki’s house, later that night. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki sit by a fire.

text:
Right.
Um… I think that Nezuko’s not like the other demons. Do you think it could be that
Whatchamacallit Art?
Urokodaki        No,
I don’t think so.
I wouldn’t call that an example
of the Blood Demon Art.
I’m just guessing here,
but it could be that Nezuko’s recovering her strength by sleeping
instead of consuming human flesh.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Urokodaki’s house, later that night. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki sit by a fire.

text: I’ll protect you, Nezuko.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Urokodaki’s house, later that night. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki sit by a fire.

text:
Uh…
Haganezuka    My name is Hanagezuka.
I have forged Tanjirou
Kamado’s sword, and I am here to deliver it.
Um, I’m Tanjirou Kamado.
Please come inside.
Haganezuka    This
is the Nichirin Sword. I forged it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Fifteen days later. A man wearing
a hat with windchimes around the brim walks slowly
up to Urokodaki’s house.
Tanjirou stands outside.

text:
Um…
Please come in so I can serve you some te --
Haganezuka    The materials
for a Nichirin Sword can be obtained
from the mountain
closest to the sun.
Scarlet Crimson
Iron Sand and Scarlet Crimson
Ore. They produce
steel that can absorb
sunlight.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Fifteen days later. A man wearing
a hat with windchimes around the brim walks slowly
up to Urokodaki’s house.
Tanjirou stands outside.

text:
Wow, is that right?
Haganezuka    Mt. Yoko is bathed in sunlight all day long,
you see.
Never a cloud in the sky, nor any
rain.
Urokodaki        There he goes again,
never listening to what others
say…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Fifteen days later. A man wearing
a hat with windchimes around the brim walks slowly
up to Urokodaki’s house.
Tanjirou stands outside.

text:
Ah! A clown mask?
Haganezuka    Hmm?
Hmm~?
Hey, you’re
a Child of Brightness, aren’t
you? Now that’s what I call lucky.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Fifteen days later. A man wearing
a hat with windchimes around the brim walks slowly
up to Urokodaki’s house.
Tanjirou stands outside.

text:
Oh no, I’m the son of Tanjuurou and Kie.
Haganezuka    That’s
not what I meant.
See how your hair and eyes are a reddish color?
When a kid like you is born into a family that
works with fire, it’s considered lucky and a cause for celebration.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Fifteen days later. A man wearing

text:
For any kind of wound, there’s

At this time, I’m unable to turn a demon back into a human, but surely, that,
too…

At Tamayo’s

At Tamayo’s

By “demons
closely related to Kibutsuji”, I mean demons whose powers
are more on par
with that of Kibutsuji himself.
It won’t be easy to extract blood from such demons.
Are you still willing to go along with my requests?

At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo, Yushirou,
Tanjirou, and Nezuko converse in the tatami

text:
Fufufu… Did you decide

Susamaru        Hehehe!

scene:
At Tamayo’s

text: Kuh!

text:
Fufufufu… Did you decide

Susamaru        Hehehe!

At Tamayo’s

She’s giving off a totally

Is it

Susamaru        Hm?
The demon hunter

I’m the one they’re targeting?
Miss Tamayo! Please find a safe place to hide! I’m the one they’re after!

At Tamayo’s

Tanjirou, please don’t worry

right… It’s all over for you now!

At Tamayo’s

At Tamayo’s

text:

Of the ten forms, the fastest thrusting

Total Concentration! Water Breathing!
Seventh Form!
Droplet Ripple Thrust

However…
Ngh… How can

Yashirou, too!
It’s not like it has any natural
spin to it, and yet… What’s going

At Tamayo’s

If I were to cast my Blood Arts now, it would

At Tamayo’s

There it is again! They changed trajectory again, even without

Even if I cut them and they lose force, they still end up hitting
me anyway! Ugh… Ngh…!
I can smell
two different scents of blood.
That means there
are two demons!
I can locate them with their scent! But…

At Tamayo’s

balls once again return to Susamaru.

At Tamayo’s

text:
Kuh…!

text:
I have two favors to ask of you.
One, permission to study your sister’s blood.
Two, to retrieve

A demon with a high concentration of Kibutsuji’s blood means a demon close in strength to Kibutsuji himself.
It won’t be easy to extract blood from such demons.

Tamayo, Yushirou, Tanjirou, and Nezuko are gathered.

And I hate to say it,

Tanjirou faces off against Yahaba.

text: Ugh… Gah…!

Tanjirou faces off against Yahaba.

text:
Haaa!!
Twist! Envelop! (Thoughts)
Flowing Maelstrom Spin!

Tanjirou faces off against Yahaba.

text:
Kuh… Ngh…!
My

Modified Second Form! Horizontal Water

Tanjirou faces off against Yahaba.

text: Gah…!
speaker: Yahaba

Tanjirou faces off against Yahaba.

text:
It’s about time for you to

Twist!
Envelop!
Twisting
Whirlpool Flowing Water!

At Tamayo’s

text: Ngh… Ugh!

scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Tanjirou faces

text:

Second Form… Improved… Lateral Water Wheel!

text:
Ugh…!
I did it! The Whirlpool move loses force when it’s not underwater!
But thanks
to my opponent’s attack, it gained
power, and I was able to envelop the arrows!
Curse you! Curse you! Curse you! All I had to do was bring back your head, and I would’ve won his approval!
I’ll never
forgive you! I’ll never forgive
you! Shoving my face into this vile dirt!
You’re going down with me!
Oh no! He’s gonna get me!
I’m getting pulled by a force stronger
than the arrows
he’s hit me with!
I gotta
unleash move after move and go on the defensive, or my body’s
going to get smashed!
Fourth form! Striking Tide!
The pressure
is bearing down on my body, and I can’t swing my sword!
(Thoughts) Unleash one! Unleash a move! Not here! Don’t let yourself get beat!
Second Form, Water Wheel!
Waterfall Basin!
Water Surface
Slash! Drop Ripple Thrust Curve!
Whirlpool!
I’ve never made this many consecutive moves before!
It feels like both my arms are about to get torn off!

Don’t

Keep throwing them

Miss Tamayo… Yushirou… Ngh…
I’ve got a broken rib and leg.

At Tamayo’s
mansion. Tanjirou has beheaded Yahaba.

N-No good! I’m too exhausted to grip my sword! (Thoughts) I gotta get over there!
There’s still one more demon!

At Tamayo’s
mansion. Tanjirou has beheaded Yahaba.

text:
Mm!
Susamaru        Hahahaha!
speaker: Nezuko

Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari

text:
I used a healing
serum on her, nothing more. Made exclusively for demons.

scene:
Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari
balls, causing dust to be stirred up.

text:
It doesn’t make one physically stronger. What we’re seeing
is Nezuko’s own power.
Without devouring human
blood, solely on her own… Nezuko is gaining strength at a rapid
rate.
Susamaru        Ah…
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari
balls, causing dust to be stirred up.

text:
However, her opponent is also formidable. If she were to go all-out, Nezuko wouldn’t stand a chance.
I’ve got to… do something.
Susamaru        Hahahaha! You’re
an amusing little girl!
This time, I’m going
all-out against you! I wonder how long you can hold out!

scene:
Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari
balls, causing dust to be stirred up.

text:
Twelve Kizuki demon girl there…

Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari
balls, causing dust to be stirred up.

text:
Just tell me one thing please.
Are you aware of Kibutsuji’s true identity?
Susamaru        Ah…!
What the hell did you say?!
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari
balls, causing dust to be stirred up.

text:
That man is nothing
but a coward. He lives in constant
fear of something.
Susamaru        Stop it! Damn you! Stop it!

scene:
Elsewhere on the property. Yushirou faces off against Susamaru. Susamaru bounces her temari
balls, causing dust to be stirred up.

text: Did she just die?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Susamaru has been subjected
to Kibutsuji’s curse.

text:
She will die momentarily.
That’s the curse. Her physical body will be destroyed by Kibutsuji’s cells
still in her body.
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Susamaru has been subjected
to Kibutsuji’s curse.

text:
Tanjirou… She is not one of the Twelve
Kizuki.
The Twelve
Kizuki have numbers
engraved on their eyeballs, but this demon doesn’t
have one.
Most likely,
the other demon isn’t a member of the Twelve Kizuki, either.
They’re too weak.
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Susamaru has been subjected
to Kibutsuji’s curse.

text:
Here’s your mari.
Susamaru        Play with me. Play with me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Susamaru has been subjected
to Kibutsuji’s curse.

text:
You’re just like a little
kid. Even though
you must’ve murdered
scores of people.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Susamaru has been subjected
to Kibutsuji’s curse.

text:
You were deluded into thinking
you were in the Twelve
Kizuki. Deceived… Compelled to
fight… And now, you were killed by the Kibutsuji curse.
There’s
no salvation.
Even after you die, not even your bones will remain.
(Thoughts) Is this the price you pay for killing others?
Kibutsuji… This is how that man treats even those who revere him! (Thoughts) He’s a true… demon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tamayo’s
mansion. Susamaru has been subjected
to Kibutsuji’s curse.

text: Hurry down, then, Tanjirou!
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text: Oh, right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text: Ah… Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
I moved her to this basement, where the sunlight
won’t reach her, ahead of daybreak.
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
Nezuko has been acting
this way since she awoke.
Do you think she’s all right?

scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
But Nezuko has perceived you two as humans. That’s
why she tried to protect
you.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text: Ahh…
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
At first,
I didn’t like the idea of Nezuko
being under a spell, but since it looks like she has a will of her own, I’m glad that --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
Ah…! I-I’m so sorry!
Nezuko! Nezuko! S-Step away from her! It’s rude, all right?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
Do you still
wish to live?
Do you still wish to live even if you’re no longer
human?
If this goes on, you will most likely succumb
to your illness.
However, losing your humanity
will cause you pain and grief.
Do you still wish to live? Yushirou and I will leave this
region.
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
We’ve gotten too close to Kibutsuji. We must conceal
our whereabouts soon or the risk
will be too great.
Not to mention, even if I think I’ve concealed my identity, when I interact
with humans as a doctor, people sometimes see through
my disguise as a demon.
The young and the elderly
are particularly perceptive. Tanjirou…
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text: Yes?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou walks into Tamayo’s mansion.

text:
I can’t give you an absolute
guarantee that she’ll
be safe, but I believe
it will be less
dangerous than taking her into battle.
speaker: Tamayo
