Ah… What’s this? An odd scent is wafting this way. It’s not a demon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the room where Tanjirou and Teruko are trapped.
Tanjirou holds his hand over Teruko’s
mouth.

text:
Hahaha! Hahaha! Hahaha!
Comin’ through, comin’ through!
Comin’ through!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the room where Tanjirou and Teruko are trapped.
Tanjirou holds his hand over Teruko’s
mouth.

text:
Wh-Who’s
that guy?! He’s wearing a boar’s head…
and he’s wielding
Nichirin swords!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the room where Tanjirou and Teruko are trapped.
Tanjirou holds his hand over Teruko’s
mouth.

text:
All right,
you monster… Die on the battlefield and serve as my springboard so that I can
become more powerful and soar even higher!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the room where Tanjirou and Teruko are trapped.
Tanjirou holds his hand over Teruko’s
mouth.

text: Infuriating! Infuriating!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the room where Tanjirou and Teruko are trapped.
Tanjirou holds his hand over Teruko’s
mouth.

text: Here goes… Comin’… through!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the room where Tanjirou and Teruko are trapped.
Tanjirou holds his hand over Teruko’s
mouth.

text:
Here goes… I’m comin’
through!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Inosuke prepares for battle.

text: Teruko! Hold onto the furniture!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Inosuke prepares for battle.

text: Grr!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Inosuke prepares for battle.

text: That’s a demon with supernatural abilities! Stop launching those reckless assaults!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Inosuke prepares for battle.

text: Hahahaha!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Inosuke prepares for battle.

text:
Infuriating! You damn insects
running amok in my house!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Woah… Urgh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Hahaha! Hahahaha! The room freakin’ spun around! This is fun! I’m havin’
a blast!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Ah! Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Don’t stomp all over her!
Who the hell are
you?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
What do you think you’re doing,
stepping on a little kid like that?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Hahahaha! I like it, I like it! No human has ever sent me flying
like that before!
Urah!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Why is he coming after
me? Isn’t he a Demon Slayer?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
My swords will hurt you. Because
they’re not the kind of swords you little gentlemen
use!
The way they shred
through flesh… I pride myself
on that!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Knock it off! There’s
a demon right there, you know!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Like I care! Urah!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Damn insects! Get out of my sight! Die!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Woah!
The floor ripped apart all
of a sudden! At the same speed as the sound of the drum, in the shape of a beast’s
claws!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Spinning right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Spinning left!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Damn insects!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: You damn miserable insects!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
I’m starting to get the hang of it now!
We’re
in yet another room?
(Thoughts) But what does this mean?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
That demon didn’t
strike his drum just now.
I’m picking up the scent
of multiple demons
in this house. Is there another
demon with a drum?
That’s
why…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: … there’s the smell of blood.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Ah… You’ll be fine,
okay? Just stay behind me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
Okay.
Another human ripped
to shreds and devoured!
speaker: Teruko
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text: Wh-What’s the matter?
speaker: Teruko
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
It’s all right. There are no demons around.
Come on, let’s head over there.
Without so much as a backward
glance, look straight
ahead, okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
There’s
another scent. A unique scent of blood I’ve never smelled before. (Thoughts) Looks like there wasn’t
that much bleeding.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
The room shakes.
Inosuke launches toward
Kyougai.

text:
A demon showed up! You got it?! A demon showed
up!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Zenitsu nervously leads Shouichi along.

text:
No~!! Go away!! Stay away from us! Stop that!
Tongue
Oni     Fufu…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run frantically through
the halls as the Tongue Demon chases them.

text:
What was that?! He’s quick-tongued! Even able to split a vase in two!
Tongue
Oni     Grrr!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run frantically through
the halls as the Tongue Demon chases them.

text: Gah! Huh?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run frantically through
the halls as the Tongue Demon chases them.

text: Okay.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run frantically through
the halls as the Tongue Demon chases them.

text:
Damn! He sent me flying again!
It’s been like this for the last three days, dammit!
Making my way through
a cramped building
like this… It’s just not my thing,
for crying out loud! Grr!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Inosuke runs through
the halls.

text:
Ugh! Huh?
Horned Oni      You dodged
me, huh? You seem to be a pretty fresh
human.
Your flesh will be well worth gouging out!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Inosuke runs through
the halls.

text:
Ngh… Grrr…
Self-taught Beast Breathing…
It’s gonna be so worth it to shred such a huge target!
Horned Oni      Hoho, you’ve
got guts to charge me head-on like that!
Horned Oni      Ahhh! Owie!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Inosuke runs through
the halls.

text:
Hahahaha! Flaunt your corpse
and serve as my springboard!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Inosuke runs through
the halls.

text:
Third Fang! Tear and Gorge!
Urahh!
Comin’ through! Comin’ through!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Inosuke runs through
the halls.

text:
Rare blood… Rare blood…
If I can just consume
some…
Fifty… No, a hundred
humans’ worth… I have to find more humans with rare blood and
consume them.
That way…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
Elsewhere in the mansion.
Kyougai searches his mansion.

text:
The more humans you consume,
the stronger you can become.
And once he saw my potential, Lord Kibutsuji was
willing to share his blood with me.
The
power of that man’s blood was mind-boggling. I was sure that I’d grow
infinitely stronger than ever before, be welcomed into the ranks of the Twelve
Kizuki, continue to gorge myself on humans, and become even more powerful!
Or so I believed!
Or so I believed…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the past. Kyougai
struggles to eat a human as Kibutsuji
approaches him.

text: Ah… Kiyoshi!
speaker: Teruko
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Ah… Ah!
speaker: Kiyoshi
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Brother! Brother!
speaker: Teruko
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Teruko!
speaker: Kiyoshi
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Wh-Who’s he?
speaker: Kiyoshi
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: I’m Tanjiro Kamado. I’ve come to defeat the evil demons.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Now then, show me your wounds.
Good job for hanging in there on your own.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Brother…
speaker: Teruko
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Ah… Heh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
This ointment here is amazing! My master gave it to me!
My master always wears a tengu mask.
Action: Tanjirou applies
the ointment to Kiyoshi’s leg.]
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Tengu? Really?
speaker: Kiyoshi
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Yes, it’s true. My master’s ointment
is so amazing, it kicks
in within mere seconds!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Okay, you’re all set!
Well? The pain is gone, isn’t it?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Do you think you can tell me what happened here?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Ah… Ngh…
A monster dragged me away, a-and I nearly
got eaten.
But just then,
another monster showed
up out of nowhere, a-and they started
fighting to the death…
It was over… who was gonna
get to e-eat me.
A-And then, the one with the drum growing
out of him… When the other monster defeated him, he dropped a drum!
And when I picked it
up and struck it, the room suddenly
changed. I somehow
held on until now!
A demon with drums growing out of him… So that was him? He mentioned “rare blood” or
something like that.
speaker: Kiyoshi
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Ah… That’s right! He kept saying I had rare blood!
speaker: Kiyoshi
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Caw! Rare blood! That’s
what they call those who carry delicate
blood!
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Hahaha! You little brats! I’m going to peck you now.
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Cut it out!
What do you mean by “delicate blood”?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
The blood of all living species
can be categorized into types,
moron!
And the ultimate rare blood… the less common the blood is… for a demon! A
single human with rare blood has the same nutritional value as eating
fifty, one hundred humans!
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
For demons, humans with rare blood are a feast! Rare blood is their favorite
food.
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Rare blood… Rare blood… Tanjirou
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Keep calm. It’s all right. I’m just going to take down that demon.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Listen to me, Teruko.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Your brother is terribly
exhausted right now. Make sure to look after him, okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
As
soon as I leave the room, strike that drum and move out. Just like Kiyoshi has
been doing until now, whenever someone tries to open the door or you hear something, strike that drum right away and make a
run for it.
I promise to come pick you up. I’ll follow
your scent. I’ll call out your names
when I open the door.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
You just have to hold out a little
longer. You can do it,
right?
Yeah…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Good! You’re so strong!
I’m heading out.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Strike it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Damn insects! So infuriating!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Ngh… Ugh…
The drum on his right shoulder flips the room to the right!
(Thoughts) The left one flips it to the left!
Right leg, forward spin! Left leg, backward spin!
And the drum on his belly launches
that claw attack!
Urgh… So fast! The speed of the rotations and attacks is devastating!
Miss Tamayo may have treated
my wounds, but I haven’t
fully recovered from my injuries yet!
Can I beat him? These injuries hurt so badly that I can hardly stand it!
All this time, I’ve just been
enduring it! When I
pulled Zenitsu off that girl and when I started out, I was enduring
this horrendous pain!
I was able to withstand
it because I’m the eldest
son! But I couldn’t have if I were the second!
Whenever
I dig in, the broken parts creak, and I can’t muster
any strength!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
That demon’s attack is leaving
scars that look like claw marks. It scares me so much that I can’t move in closer!
Since I’m not at full strength, if I charge
forward to get within striking
distance and stumble from the pain… I’ll get sliced into rings!
My injuries
are making me imagine the most awful things!
(Thoughts) Master Urokodaki!
Urokodaki        (Flashback) Water can change
into any form.
Pour it
into a container, and it’s a square. Pour it
into a bottle, and it’s round.
Sometimes, it can even smash boulders and flow away as far as the eye can see.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
That’s
right! That’s it! There are ten Water
Breathing forms! (Thoughts) I
can battle any kind of opponent!
If you’re hurt, use a move that will compensate for that! I can take on any form! And this flow will never be
stopped!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
Right now, it’s not just my bones!
My heart’s also been broken!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
What?!
A broken Tanjirou
is not gonna do any good!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
All
right! If you could please quiet down!! (Thoughts) Look straight ahead!
Fire yourself up!
Give it all you’ve got, Tanjirou! You’ve got this!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
I’ve been doing great
so far! I have what it takes!
And not today or any other time in the future,
even if I’m broken…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text: Grrr…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
… I won’t ever give up, no matter
what!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the mansion.

text:
I’ve done a good job until now! I have what it takes!
And not today or any time in the future! Even if I’m broken…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Tanjirou faces off against Kyougai.
Kyougai strikes his drum, making the room spin. After regaining his
footing, Tanjirou wields his sword against Kyougai.

text: … I’ll never give up, no matter what!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Tsuzumi Mansion.
Tanjirou faces off against Kyougai.
Kyougai strikes his drum, making the room spin. After regaining his
footing, Tanjirou wields his sword against Kyougai.

text:
What the heck?! All right, all right, just stop giving
me that look! Fine, I’ll do it myself!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi
Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run through the halls.

text:
Eek…
There’s nobody
around. Let’s go this way!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi
Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run through the halls.

text: Th-The room… just flipped!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Tsuzumi
Mansion. Zenitsu and Shouichi run through the halls.

text:
Ngh! Ah! Gah! Ngh… Ah!
It’s no good! Nothing’s changed
at all! Spirit
alone isn’t gonna get me anywhere!
Your head… Use your head, not just spirit!
Think!
Think! Think!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
Close call! I barely survived
that one!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
Damn! This is so annoying! I gotta consume
some rare blood!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
Ugh… Ah!
There isn’t even time to stop and think!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text: Hey, you! What’s your name?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text: Ngh… Kyougai…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
Kyougai! I’m not handing
over Kiyoshi… the human with rare blood to you!
I’m not gonna cave! I’m not giving up!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
Just give it up, will
you?
speaker: Man
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
I’m going to get my hands
on some rare blood and reclaim my place among the Twelve Kizuki!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text: Ngh… Grr… Grrr…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the mansion. The room that Tanjirou fights
in flips.

text:
Just give it up, will you?
(Flashback) It’s so boring!
Your writing
is just so boring.
Every last word is utter
trash!
No beauty, no fragility, no impact. Why don’t you forget about writing? It’s just a waste of paper and fountain
pens!
You never even step outside
anymore these days.
No wonder you’re
so boring!
You should just enjoy your hobby, playing
the tsuzumi, as long as you’re shut in here.
Not that you have the skills to teach that, either!
Ngh… Grr… Grrr…
(Flashback) Grr…
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past. A man speaks down to
Kyougai.

text:
Ngh… Out of my sight! You damn insect!
Rapid Drumming!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text: Don’t tell me he can strike that tsuzumi even faster!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text: Grrr… Grrr…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Ahh! Ah… Ahhh!
The speed of these rotations is making me dizzy! This is bad! What an amazing skill!
Not only that, but now he’s got five claws instead of three!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Ngh… (Thoughts) Got it.
Because I dodged his blows without stepping
on the papers, I now know how to move my body without aggravating
my wounds and how to breathe!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Take shallow breaths.
Quickly!
Use that breathing technique to reinforce the muscles around
your broken leg! (Thoughts) And right before the claw
attack, there’s the scent of mold!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Here it comes!
The claw attack! (Thoughts) Above! Left! Right!
Behind!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Ngh… He’s evading
all of my attacks!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Total Concentration… Water
Breathing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Ninth Form, Splashing Water Flow, Turbulent!
Minimize
the landing time and area as much as possible!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
He’s adapting to the room’s
orientation changes!
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Go! Get in there! Within
striking distance!
Forward!
Get right up in his face!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
I see the Opening Thread!
Kyougai!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Your Blood Demon Art was incredible!
Ah, ouch, ouch, ouch! I took a deep breath by mistake…
I’m the eldest
son! The eldest son!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text: Boy…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
Answer me…
You think
my Blood Demon
Art… was incredible?
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
It was amazing. But… I can’t forgive you for killing
others.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text: I see…
speaker: Kyougai
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text: Oh, wait. I gotta get a blood sample.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
fights Kyougai.

text:
It extracted the blood… So it really
does extract blood automatically if you

All living creatures constantly give off sounds. The world is full of all these sounds spilling out.
Breathing, heartbeats, the sound

I could tell what someone was thinking.
But I’ve been deceived by others time and time again. I’ve always believed

Tanjirou,

text:
Those clothes
of yours are quite soiled,

I’ll clean
them for you, so please
wear these in the meantime. These are pleasant to the touch
and quite comfortable.
speaker: Hisa
scene:
At dawn, at the manor with the wisteria
crest. Nezuko emerges
from her box.

text:
How does tempura for dinner sound?
You know, something covered with batter
and fried.
speaker: Hisa
scene:
At dawn, at the manor with the wisteria
crest. Nezuko emerges
from her box.

text: Hoho…
speaker: Inosuke

At dawn, at the manor with the wisteria
crest. Nezuko emerges

text:
Hey, wait up! Come back here,

Wh-What was that for?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At dawn, at the manor with the wisteria
crest. Nezuko emerges
from her box.

text:
Hold up, hold up! Stop chasing
us, Inosuke!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At dawn, at the manor with the wisteria
crest. Nezuko emerges
from her box.

text: Tanjirou!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At dawn, at the manor with the wisteria
crest. Nezuko emerges
from her box.

text: You’re fully healed.
speaker: Doctor
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
meet with the doctor.

text:
North-northeast! North-northeast! Your next mission
is north-northeast!
The three of you are to go to Mt. Natagumo! Head to Mt. Natagumo!
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
meet with the doctor.

text:
We’re heading out now.
Thank you for everything.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: Now then, for good luck.
speaker: Hisa
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: Thank you so much!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
What do you think
you’re doing, old
hag?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: What are you, a moron?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
She’s striking
sparks for good luck! It’s a purification ceremony! Because we’re
gonna go on a dangerous
mission!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
Always live your lives with great pride. I wish you luck in battle!
“Great pride”? “Luck in battle”? What does that mean?
speaker: Hisa
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
Jeez, this guy is totally
clueless.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
Well, yeah, now that you mention
it, it’s kind of difficult
to explain.
“With great pride”… I guess it means that you know your place and that you
behave properly so that you’re never ashamed of yourself.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: And the old lady is also praying for our safety.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
So what is this “place”? What do you mean, “never
ashamed”?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: Well, it’s…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
What exactly does it mean to “behave properly”?
Why in the hell would that old
hag pray for our safety,
anyway? She has nothing to do
with us, so why?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text:
She has no clue what her own place
is, does she?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: Ngh… Hmph!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: He sped up!
speaker: Zenitsu

Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: Urah! I won’t get beat!
speaker: Inosuke

Outside the manor with the wisteria
crest. Tanjirou, Zenitsu,
and Inosuke prepare
to head out.

text: Wait up!
speaker: Zenitsu

text:
Hold up! Would you mind waiting
a second?

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
I’m scared, all right?!
Now that we’re nearing our destination, I’m so scared!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
Why the hell is he sitting?
How creepy is that?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
Who are you to talk, Pig Face?!
Don’t tell me you’re
not getting any vibes from that mountain!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Still, what good will it do to just sit there?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: I told you, he’s creepy.
speaker: Inosuke

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
I am not in any way creepy! I’m normal! I’m the normal
one! You guys are abnormal!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Ah… Ah… Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: What? What’s wrong? Hey…

Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: What is this smell?
speaker: Tanjirou

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Oh… Heh!
speaker: Inosuke

In the evening. Tanjirou,

arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

Come on! Don’t leave me here by myself!
Don’t leave me!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Ngh… Ugh… Ah… H-Help me.

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

He’s got our uniform

Something must’ve happened!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Eek! Hold up!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
Are you all right?!
What happened?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Ah! Ahh!
speaker: Slayer

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
Ahh! They were attached
to me, too! Help me!!
speaker: Slayer
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: I’m going.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

I’ll go on ahead.
You can follow
me, shivering.
This is making me hungry.

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Inosuke…
speaker: Tanjirou

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
Don’t you mean you’re

challenge?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Haha!! Let’s go!
speaker: Inosuke

In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text:
Ah… Ah…
What the hell is this?
A spider web?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
arrive at the base of Mt. Natagumo.

text: Jeez, this place is full of spider webs! What a pain!
speaker: Inosuke

In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly

text:
You’re right.
Inosuke?
speaker: Tanjirou

In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: What do you want?!
speaker: Inosuke

In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: Thanks.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: You said you’d come with me, and I felt encouraged.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
That twisted,
ominous scent I was
picking up from the mountain… It made me freeze a little. Thanks.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
These are pleasant
to the touch and quite comfortable.
Always
live your lives with great pride. I wish you luck in battle!
speaker: Hisa
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: Inosuke!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: Ah… Ah…
speaker: Inosuke

In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: Ngh… Ah… Ah!
speaker: Murata

In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
We’ve come as backup.
I’m Tanjirou Kamada,
rank Mizunoto.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
Mizunoto… Mizunoto?!
Why didn’t they send a Hashira?
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
No matter how many Mizunoto they send, it won’t help!
It’s pointless!
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: Inosuke!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
As far as pointless goes, your existence
itself has no point at all!
Now, tell us what’s
going on, you spineless fool!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
Who the hell is this guy?! Did you forget that I have seniority?!
Th-The crow gave us the order!
And ten of us Demon
Slayers came here.
Not long after we entered the mountain, the Slayers…
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
… the Slayers started
killing each other!
I… I…
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text: Ohh…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
and Inosuke run up a trail when Inosuke suddenly
stops.

text:
You did well to return.
So, most of my children have been slaughtered? We might find the Twelve Kizuki there, then.
It seems I’ll have to send in some Hashiras. Giyuu. Shinobu.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a manor elsewhere. An exhausted kasugai
crow sits on Kagaya’s lap.

text:
Heh…
As you wish!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In a manor elsewhere. An exhausted kasugai
crow sits on Kagaya’s lap.

text:
If only humans and demons could get along.
Don’t you agree,
Tomioka?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In a manor elsewhere. An exhausted kasugai
crow sits on Kagaya’s lap.

text:
Impossible… as long as demons eat
humans.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In a manor elsewhere. An exhausted kasugai
crow sits on Kagaya’s lap.

text:
I wonder if they hate
me.
Would you really leave your friend
by the roadside? (Thoughts) Wouldn’t
you talk him through it if you were friends?
If they both tried to talk me into going,
I would’ve gone, okay? Sure I would. (Thoughts) But no, off they went
on their merry way up that scary mountain.
Poor me, left alone here…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the base of the mountain. Zenitsu
sits alone.

text: Haa… Lucky you, you don’t have a care in the world. You don’t understand a thing about humans, do you?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the base of the mountain. Zenitsu
sits alone.

text:
Ouch, ouch, ouch!
You’re not cute at all! I mean it! Not that side of you! Seriously, you’ve got zero
charm!
I mean,
look how cute Nezuko is, and she’s a demon!
But you’re a sparrow,
and you’re so vicious!
Ahhh!! He took Nezuko
with him!!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the base of the mountain. Zenitsu
sits alone.

text:
Why did he have to take my precious
Nezuko with him?! Damn Tanjirou!
Don’t take a young
girl into danger!
Idiot, idiot, idiot,
idiot, idiot! Nezuko!!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the base of the mountain. Zenitsu
sits alone.

text: What is this sound?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: There it is again.
speaker: Murata
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
It’s this sound again!
I heard this sound, and the next thing I knew, everyone
started killing each other!
speaker: Murata
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Ah… Where’s it coming
from?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: Ngh… Ah!
speaker: Murata
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: Eek! Ngh!
speaker: Murata
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Haha! These guys are all morons!
They don’t know that it’s taboo for us Demon Slayers
to fight each other!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: No, that’s not it! They’re not moving normally! They’re being manipulated by something!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: All right…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: I’m gonna slash them to ribbons!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
You can’t do that!
They’re alive!
Some of them are still
alive! Besides, we can’t harm the corpses
of our teammates!
Stop denying
me at every turn!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: Ah! Ah… Ngh… Ahh…!
speaker: Murata
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Ngh… Urah!
A strange sweet scent from his back!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
They’re threads! They’re being
manipulated by threads!
Slash the threads!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Haah!
All right! Urah!
I already knew that before you caught on!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Where’s the location
of the demon controlling them?
What’s
this? What an irritating odor!
Though it was just for a second!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: What’s this?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Fufufu…
Spiders! So, the spiders are attaching them to the puppet strings?
That means…
speaker: Mother
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Fufu… Fufufu! Now then,
my sweet little dolls… Dance until your arms and legs fall
off.
speaker: Mother
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
It’s not good enough
to just cut the threads!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: The spiders are just gonna stick more puppet strings onto them! So…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Ngh… That acrid smell again!
What is it, anyway? It’s being carried
here by the wind!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
So, all we gotta
do is kill those damn spiders, huh?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
That would be impossible! Those spiders are tiny, and I’m sure there are tons of them!
We gotta find the demon who’s controlling them!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: Oh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: Urahh! Urah! Urah!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
It’s no good, Inosuke!
Inosuke, if you have some kind of power that can pinpoint the demon’s location,
then help me out!
This weird smell has been flowing in, and my nose isn’t working great! Ngh… And also, um…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text: It’s Murata!
speaker: Murata
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Murata!
Murata and I will find a way to deal with the people
being controlled! Inosuke,
you…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Don’t disturb
my family’s peaceful
life.
speaker: Rui
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
He’s floating! No, he’s standing
on the threads!
What did he mean by “family”?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Mother will kill you all right
away.
speaker: Rui
scene:
Further up the mountain. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Murata survey
their surroundings. Tanjirou hears a strange sound.

text:
Mother?
There! Urahh!

At Tanjirou
and Inosuke’s location.
The two boys face off against the headless puppet.

text:
This is… It feels like I’m being showered by a gentle
rain. (Thoughts) It doesn’t hurt at all. It’s not agonizing. I just feel
warm. (Thoughts) I never dreamed that my end would be this tranquil.
And now, I’ll be released.
speaker: Mother
scene:
At Tanjirou
and Inosuke’s location.
The two boys face off against the headless puppet.

text:
Ahh! Ngh…
I’m so sorry! I apologize, so please forgive
me!
What made you angry? What caused you such displeasure?
speaker: Mother
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Father attacks
the Spider Demon
Mother.

text:
It’s your own fault for not realizing
what made him mad.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Father attacks
the Spider Demon
Mother.

text: But how could I?
speaker: Mother
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Father attacks
the Spider Demon
Mother.

text: Fufu! Mom’s in trouble with Dad again! Fufu! Fufufufu!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Father attacks
the Spider Demon
Mother.

text: Ahh!! (Flashback) Stop it! No… No!
speaker: Mother
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Father attacks
the Spider Demon
Mother.

text:
Those
eyes… Such kind eyes…
Back when I was a human,
I think someone
used to look at me with kind eyes.
I wonder who that was.
I can’t remember.
It was someone who always
treasured me. (Thoughts) I
wonder how that person is doing now.
There’s a member of the Twelve Kizuki
here.
Huh? Wait!
speaker: Mother
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Mother’s head begins to disintegrate. Tanjirou
looks on sadly.

text: Be careful…
speaker: Mother
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Mother’s head begins to disintegrate. Tanjirou
looks on sadly.

text:
A member
of the Twelve Kizuki is here… A genuine member
of the Twelve Kizuki, here on this mountain!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Mother’s head begins to disintegrate. Tanjirou
looks on sadly.

text:
The blood of the Twelve
Kizuki should have a high degree of Kibutsuji’s
blood.
If I can extract
it, the medicine that will turn Nezuko back into a human can be completed sooner!
Ah, hold on! Inosuke!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
So did you defeat
it?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
Are you all right,
Inosuke?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
I asked you whether you defeated
that thing or not! Tanjirou         Uh, yeah,
I did! But anyway, Inosuke,
how are you feeling?
Inosuke         Don’t go showering me with your
sensitivity and kindness!
You hear me? Got that? After all,
anything you can do, I can do, too!
Before you know it, my head will
be harder than yours!
Not to mention… Not to mention…
Um…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
He’s wounded severely. I couldn’t save our other friends, either…
That person gave off the scent of terror and suffering.
Enough to make her yearn for
death.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
What’s the deal with this mountain anyway?
With one of the Twelve
Kizuki present and a demon
family living here…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text: I’m totally fine!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
But… I thought
demons never herded together!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou has defeated the Spider Demon Mother.

text:
Ouch!
Something
just pricked me! What the hell? This is so annoying!
I can’t find Tanjirou
and Inosuke anywhere!
This sucks! Where did they go?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere on the mountain.
Zenitsu wanders around.

text:
Which way?! And it stinks around
here, too! Stinks!
I think I’m gonna
cry!
And this sound of spiders rustling
around is so creepy! I’m sure these
spiders are doing their best to survive, too, but
still!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere on the mountain.
Zenitsu wanders around.

text: Dammit! Shut up! Just stay still!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere on the mountain.
Zenitsu wanders around.

text:
Is this even possible?!
That’s a spider with a human
face! A spider with a human face! What’s up with that?! What’s up
with that?!
Please be a dream! Please
be a dream! Please be a dream!
If this can just be
a dream, I promise to do my best!
If I wake up to find myself
resting my head on Nezuko’s lap,
then I promise to give it all I have!
I’ll even plow fields! I’ll be glad to plow a whole
acre, no, even two acres! So, please! Let me wake up from
this nightmare!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere on the mountain.
Zenitsu wanders around.

text: Ahh… Ah…!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
What the heck is that? What the heck is that? Are those humans
who got turned into spiders?
Is that
house floating? I can see a glimpse
of something, but are those threads?
And it really stinks! Talk about pungent!
This would kill Tanjirou with his keen sense of smell!
The smell is making my throat ache! I’m tearing
up! My eyes hurt, too!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: Heh!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
It’s huge!!
It’s huge! It’s huge! It’s so huge! That thing is too huge!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: Hehe.
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: You know what! I refuse to speak with anyone like you!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
Fufu! It’s no use running away. You’re already
losing.
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
What are you muttering
about?! I don’t wanna hear it, so stop talking to me! I don’t
like guys like you, all right?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: You already know how dire your situation is, don’t you?
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
What are you talking
about?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: Take a look at your hands.
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: Huh?! My hands?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: What’s wrong with my hands…?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
It’s poison.
You got bitten by a spider,
right? That poison
will turn you into a spider, too. Fufu… Fufufufu!
In another 30 minutes,
you’ll be my slave, crawling
all over the ground!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text:
Fufufufu… Look at this. It’s a clock. Do you understand?
By the time this long hand goes around once, you’ll
have become a member of the spider clan!
When the needle arrives
here, you’ll start to feel tingling and pain in your limbs. When it’s here, you’ll also feel
dizzy and nauseous!
Here, you’ll
experience intense pain, your body will start
to shrink, and you’ll black
out! And by the time you wake up… Fufufufu… Fufufufufu!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Zenitsu sprints through
the forest.

text: Ahhhh!! Ahh!!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text: Running away…
speaker: Brother
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
… is futile! Right,
right, right! I know that, all right?!
I know that!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
Hahahaha! What do you think you’re
doing?
speaker: Brother
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text: Shut up! Just shut up!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
There’s no need to be afraid!
Once the poison
makes its rounds
and you turn into a spider, you’ll lose all intelligence,
too!
speaker: Brother
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
No! That’s just what I don’t like about this!
Why can’t you understand that, huh?!
I have no friends or girlfriend, all right?! No one will like me!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
Tsk! I can see that you want an extra dose of poison
to turn into a spider
faster.
speaker: Brother
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text: Heh…
speaker: Brother
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
Eek!! No! No! I don’t want to turn into that!
Kuwajima         Get a hold of
yourself!
Stop crying!
Stop running away! Doing that won’t get you anywhere,
Zenitsu! Come down from there! We’re going to continue training!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the Spider Demon
Brother’s lair. The clock ticks
down.

text:
Oh, no! I’m sure I’ll die if I do any more training! I’m sure that I’ll die, so…!
Kuwajima         You won’t die! Not from this level of training!
Come down from there,
you little moron!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the past. Zenitsu
hides in a tree after training with Kuwajima.

text:
Gramps!
Kuwajima         Call me “Master”! Zenitsu     But I love you, Gramps! Kuwajima         Mm…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the past. Zenitsu
hides in a tree after training with Kuwajima.

text:
When the girl I loved
made me raise money so she could run off with another
guy, you did rescue me from
my mountain of debt!
Well, maybe all you wanted was to train
a swordsman!
I want to live up to your expectations, too! But it’s totally beyond
me! I do feel terrible about the fact that I’m like this!
Just so you know, I’ve been training on my own in secret,
too! I haven’t been getting
any sleep!
But I have absolutely nothing to show for it! What does this mean? I mean,
really, what does this mean?!
Kuwajima         Calm down, Zenitsu! You do have the ability
to…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the past. Zenitsu
hides in a tree after training with Kuwajima.

text:
I’ve had enough!
Kuwajima         Zenitsu!!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the past. Zenitsu
hides in a tree after training with Kuwajima.

text:
How tragic is my life anyway? I got hit by lightning.
My hair color
changed. I was thankful
just to be alive, but… I… I hate myself
more than anyone else.
I always
think I have to get my act together,
but I end up cowering, running
away, sniveling…
I want to change. I want to be a competent person.
Even still!
I’m doing everything I can, all right?!
So why do I have to end up going bald
and turning into a monster?!
Oh, crap! Don’t climb up here! Just leave me alone for a minute! Just for a minute, all right?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text:
Ah… Huh?
My hair’s falling
out already? My hair is falling out… (Thoughts) Hey, he never mentioned
that part to me!
Who is this guy? Isn’t he
a demon hunter who came here to kill our family?
(Thoughts) Did he just faint? I can’t believe how spineless he is.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text: He’s gonna fall onto his head and die. What the hell?
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text: Thunder Breathing, First Form.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text:
Poison
Sputum!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text:
Did he just twist his body in midair to dodge that?!
Such quick reflexes!
It’s like he’s a totally different person!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text:
Hey, you guys! Pounce
on him!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text:
He’s been assuming
the same stance over and over.
Hahaha! No question
about it. This guy… is only capable
of one attack!
Kuwajima         (Flashback) That’s
all right, Zenitsu.
That’s good enough
for you. (Flashback) If you
can master one, that’s cause for celebration! (Flashback) If you can only do
one thing, hone it to perfection.
Hone it to the utmost limit!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present, in the forest.
Zenitsu hides in the tree.

text:
Hey, but Gramps…
Just a little while ago, you were hopping mad. Because
Thunder Breathing has six forms, and all I can manage to do is one.
Kuwajima         (Flashback) Do you know how to forge a sword?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Zenitsu’s subconscious, in a dream.
Kuwajima consoles Zenitsu.

text:
I have no idea.
Will you keep hitting me? I think I’ll cry.
Kuwajima         (Flashback)
The thing about swords… You strike and strike and strike to get rid of
impurities and anything you don’t need, and to increase the purity of the blade,
so a durable sword can be
forged.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Zenitsu’s subconscious, in a dream.
Kuwajima consoles Zenitsu.

text:
So that’s why you keep clobbering me day in, day out? (Thoughts) But I’m not made of steel, am I? I’m living flesh,
you know.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Zenitsu’s subconscious, in a dream.
Kuwajima consoles Zenitsu.

text:
Hehehe!
You’re not much of a threat, are you? You call yourself
a demon hunter?
Any minute now, you’ll be rendered immobile
by that poison.
Kuwajima         (Flashback) Zenitsu, perfect it!
It’s all right to cry. It’s all right to run away!
Just don’t ever give up!
Just believe. You endured all that hellish
training! You’ll be rewarded for that
without fail!
Hone it to the utmost
limit! Become the most durable
blade of all!
Kuwajima         (Flashback) Hone that one thing to perfection!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu assumes his stance.

text: Get out of my sight.
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
Don’t make me repeat myself.
Get out of my sight. (Flashback) You know what I’m
talking about.
Aren’t you ashamed of crying like a baby all day long?
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
Tsk. You laggard…
Any time spent on you is wasted. (Flashback) Sensei is an
extraordinary man.
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text: But Gramps said --
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
“Gramps”?
Don’t speak of him in that familiar
way!
Sensei is a former Hashira!
Someone who earned
the highest title in the Demon Slayer Corps!
Almost
no one ever gets the chance to be trained
by a former Hashira! The time Sensei spends training you is
all for nothing!
You’re an eyesore, okay?! Get out of my sight! (Flashback) Why are you here? Why do you insist on clinging here?!
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
I have
no parents, so no one has any hopes for me. There’s
no one who dreams that I’ll grasp or accomplish something one day.
That I’ll prove
myself useful to somebody. That I’ll manage
to protect somebody and make
that person happy, just once in my life.
Not even a simple future
like that. There’s
no one who hopes that I’ll have one.
If you fail, cry,
and run away even once, they say, “Oh, this guy’s no good,”
and they walk away.
But not Gramps!
Time and time again, he steadfastly reprimanded me.
All those times I kept running away… Time and time again… he’d drag me
back. Clearly, he did smack me around a bit too much. But he never abandoned
me.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text: Pierce him! Inject him with more poison!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
Hahahaha! That should do it for
him!
What’s this? The air is vibrating.
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text: Thunder Breathing, First Form… Thunderclap Flash!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text: Sixfold!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
Ah… He vanished?!
Did I get slashed? Me? Slashed? By him?! By a guy like him?
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
Ahh! But that’s absurd!
By a guy who can barely move his arms and legs?!
A dream… It’s a happy dream.
I’m powerful, more powerful than anyone. I can help the weak and anyone in trouble. Anytime.
Everything that Gramps taught
me, all the time he spent on me… It wasn’t for nothing!
A dream that,
thanks to Gramps,
I became powerful and helped out a lot of
people.
But now, it’s all over!
speaker: Brother
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
Chuntarou… I’m so sorry.
Kuwajima         (Flashback) Don’t ever give up!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
Don’t
ever give up. Use the breathing technique
to slow down the poison as
much as you can.
Even if it’s painful,
even if it’s agonizing, don’t try to take the easy way out, or Gramps is gonna let you have it!
Right.
And Tanjirou’s gonna yell at you, too.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text: What was that sound? Did lightning just strike?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: How should I know?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
I’m not smelling any thunderclouds, but… the acrid odor in the air is stronger
now, so I can’t tell.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
I think I’ll go that
way.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
Go ahead and do whatever you
want!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Are you descending, Inosuke?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Are you going down the mountain?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
Why would I?! Just beat
it!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
No, no, because you’re
severely wounded.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
I am not wounded
at all!
N-N-No, Inosuke! Your injuries… Anyone can see that…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
A demon! Because
of the odor wafting all over this mountain, I couldn’t pick it
up at all!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
All right! I’m gonna tear you to shreds,
you damn demon!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Come back here, dammit!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Father!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
Who are you calling
“father”?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Don’t come near my family!
speaker: Father
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
I’m leaving the rest to you,
Father.
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Urahh!!
speaker: Father
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text: Water Breathing, Second Form! Water Wheel!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest, near a river.
Tanjirou hears the sound of thunder.

text:
Were you acquainted with any of them?
There don’t seem to be any survivors around
here.
We were advised that several rookie Mizunoto had joined the battle, but they might be
dead by now, don’t you think?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Tomioka and Shinobu
stand among the dead Demon Slayers.

text:
Isn’t the moon lovely?
Since we’ve been given this joint mission, let’s try to get along.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Tomioka and Shinobu
stand among the dead Demon Slayers.

text:
I’m only here to slay some
demons.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Tomioka and Shinobu
stand among the dead Demon Slayers.

text:
How callous of you!
All right, then, let’s split up here. I shall proceed
from the west.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Tomioka and Shinobu
stand among the dead Demon Slayers.

text: Agreed.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Tomioka and Shinobu
stand among the dead Demon Slayers.

text: Urahh…
speaker: Father
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text: It’s no good! The blade won’t go through!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text: Urahh… Urah!
speaker: Father
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text: S-So hard!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text:
I can’t slash him even if I use an attack!
What should I do? What should I do?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text: Urahh… Don’t come near my family!
speaker: Father
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text:
What are you looking
at? I’m over
here!
Curse you!
Ouch! All that force with just one swipe of its arm!

Not to mention, the bleeding
is making me stumble!

of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

speaker: Inosuke

Water Breathing, Second Form, Improved… Lateral

of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text: Ahhh!

What was that? What’s

Inosuke! Are you okay?!

In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

All right! I should be able to chop off that tough neck now! (Thoughts) Water Breathing… The final

He’s got a different air about him now. He’s about to do something totally mind-blowing!

In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

Don’t die! Don’t die! Whatever

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text: Oh, crap!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou’s sword is stuck in the Spider Demon Father’s arm.

text:
It’s getting really
hard to breathe now. I have no feeling in my arms and legs anymore.
Nezuko…
I’m sorry.
Kuwajima         (Flashback) Don’t give up! Don’t give up! Don’t give up!
speaker: Zenitsu

At Zenitsu’s
location. Zenitsu continues

text:
Don’t…
give up!
speaker: Zenitsu

At Zenitsu’s
location. Zenitsu continues

At Zenitsu’s

speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Zenitsu’s
location. Zenitsu continues

text: Ngh… I managed to land somehow!
speaker: Tanjirou

Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
I beg of you! Please stop!
Ah! Ah…
speaker: Sister
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
What are you looking
at? This isn’t some show, you know.
Wh-What are you doing?
Aren’t you two allies?
speaker: Rui
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Allies? Don’t put us in the same category
as something that flimsy.
We’re family. We’re joined
by a powerful bond.
And besides, this is between me and my sister. Don’t interfere… or I’ll carve you up.
You’re wrong.
Whether it’s your family or an ally, if
you have a strong bond between you, then either one should be just as
precious!
Calling it flimsy if you’re not related by blood… That’s
not true at all!
Not only that,
but those who have a strong bond give off the scent of
trust! But all I’m picking up from you two is the scent
of terror, hatred, and repulsion!
That’s not what you call a bond! It’s counterfeit! It’s
forged!
speaker: Rui
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Hey, look at that. A demon that’s just the right size.
Even I can take down a kid demon like this one.
speaker: Slayer
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Hold up a second,
please!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
You can just back off!
I want to take the safe route up
the ladder. Once you move up,
you get more money from the top guys.
My unit’s practically been wiped out, but I’ll slay myself
a decent-sized demon
and head down the mountain.
speaker: Slayer
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text: Don’t do it! Stop!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Shattered to pieces in an instant! But how did

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Hey, what did you
say?
speaker: Rui
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text: Ah…! Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Look, you… What was it you just said?
Just look at that intimidation factor! The air just got heavy and denser!
Inosuke,
I’m sorry! Hang in there,
okay? Just a little longer!
I’ll be there
as soon as I defeat this demon!
I’ll come save you, no matter what!
speaker: Rui
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Hey, you… What you said just now… Let’s hear you say it again.
Come on. Say it, will you?
speaker: Rui
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
Sure! I’ll repeat it as many times as you want!
Your bond is forged!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou is flying
through the air.

text:
O-Oh,
crap!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location. Inosuke breathes
heavily as he hides behind a tree. The
Spider Demon Father searches
for him and finds the trail of blood leading to Inosuke’s hiding spot.

text:
Dammit!
Hiding myself in a place
like this… How pathetic is that?
Still, I
gotta come up with a way. How do you slash someone
who’s sword- proof?
What should
I do? What should I do? Just how do I slash it?!
(Thoughts) Think! Think! Think! Think --
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text: Woah!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text:
This is bad! This is really
bad!
Until… Until
he gets back, I gotta somehow…!
What the hell kind of attitude is that?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text:
Don’t mess around, dammit!
Urahh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text:
Curse you!
Looks like I got infected by Tontarou’s germs!
Messing around like that… That was way too close a call!
Using my head? That’s so not me!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text:
All right! Slashed you!
It’s really simple. If you can’t slash something
with one sword,
all you gotta do is pound it with another sword!
I mean, look! I have two swords! Hahahaha! I’m the almighty!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text:
Are you running away from me?!
Hey, you! Come back here, dammit!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo, at Inosuke’s location.
The Spider Demon Father stomps
toward Inosuke.

text:
I just want to let you know… I won’t
kill you in one blow.
After ripping you to shreds, I’ll carve you up.
But… if you take back what you
said just now, I’ll do you a favor and kill you at once.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou faces off against
Rui. Tanjirou has gotten cut several
times and is breathing heavily.

text:
I won’t take it back! What I said was the truth!
The one who’s not making sense is you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou faces off against
Rui. Tanjirou has gotten cut several
times and is breathing heavily.

text: You’re the one who’s mistaken!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou faces off against
Rui. Tanjirou has gotten cut several
times and is breathing heavily.

text: Damn! That bastard… Where the hell did he go, dammit?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
I’m telling ya, this doesn’t hurt! What doesn’t

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text: Now that it’s come to this, I’ll sniff it out for sure!
speaker: Inosuke

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Agh… Ngh… Ngh…!
Ah… So, there you are!
speaker: Inosuke

At Inosuke’s location.

after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
You idiot piece of crap! How high did you climb up?!
Damn you! So you’re

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text: Urahhh…
speaker: Father

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
What the…
Oh, I get it! He’s trembling with fear and dread at the sight of me, huh?
Hahahaha! Well,
it’s a little too late for that!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
What the… Now what?
D-Did it just shed its skin?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Jeez. Come on, that’s bulking
up way too much!
This is looking really bad for me. I’ve never sensed this much force from an opponent before!
I’ll get crushed
just by his force!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Ngh… It’s no good. I can’t win.
I’m gonna be killed.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text: Don’t die!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text: Don’t die until I get back!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Always
live your lives with great pride. I wish you luck in battle!
I’m not gonna lose… No way am I gonna lose!
I’m Inosuke Hashibira of the Demon Slayer Corps!
Just bring it on, you dirtbag!
speaker: Hisa
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text: So fast! I can’t see it!
speaker: Inosuke

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Beast Breathing… Fang Three.
Devour!
speaker: Inosuke

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
It snapped!
Oh, crap! I failed to go on the defensive with my breath
attack!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
I’m not gonna die!
Beast Breathing, Fang One… Take this! Pierce!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
They’re

speaker: Inosuke

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Ngh…! Ahh…!
Ino.Mother       (Flashback)
I’m sorry. I’m sorry, Inosuke. (Flashback) I want at least

Inosuke continues chasing

text:
Wh-Who

Wh-Who is that? Who on earth…

At Inosuke’s location.
Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider

text: Urahhh…!

speaker: Inosuke

Water Breathing, Fourth Form… Striking

after the Spider

text:
H-Holy

I-I’ve never seen anyone… as incredible as this guy!

Inosuke continues chasing
after the Spider
Demon Father.

text:
Got it!
The acrid odor is starting

threads!
I can take him on now!

Hmph… He’s smarter than I thought.
He doesn’t flinch

At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou and Rui continue
to face off.

text: Water Breathing, First Form! Water Surface Slash!
speaker: Tanjirou

At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou and Rui continue
to face off.

text: No way! My sword…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou tries to slice through Rui’s

text:
Amazing!
He’s on a different
level! The force of his stroke is in a different class!
He’s head and shoulders above the rest!
He slashed that tough-as-nails monster
like tofu!
Amazing!
Amazing! Amazing! Amazing!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text: Who is this guy?! I still have goosebumps, dammit!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text:
Hold up a second!
Fight me, Mismatched Haori!
You beat that
Twelve Kizuki! And I’m gonna beat you!
That’s how I’ve drawn it up! If I can do that… that’ll make me the most
powerful of all!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text: Go back to training, idiot.

scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text: What the?!
speaker: Inosuke
