In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text: That was no Twelve Kizuki or anything close to one. You can’t even tell that much?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text:
Sure I can tell! I never thought that scrub could be one of the Twelve Kizuki,
either!
It was Tanjirou who said it was one of the Twelve Kizuki!
All I did was repeat what he
said, all right?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text:
Ngh…! What’s going on? Did he just tie me up?
(Thoughts) So quick! This guy’s so quick!
Wait, you! Come back here!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text: Stay out of battle if you don’t even realize how hurt you are.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text:
Huh?! I can’t hear you! Your voice is too soft,
and you walk too fast!
I said hold up a second!
Untie these ropes
right now! Hey! Hey! Hey~!!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Inosuke
catches his breath after Tomioka
defeats the Spider Demon Father.

text: Gramps…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text:
Who are you calling
“Gramps”?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text:
Just now, Gramps showed
up, and told me not to give up.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text:
Oh, you saw your life flashing
before your eyes.
According to
one theory, the reason one sees such images just before death is because you’re searching for a way to avoid
death by going
through all your past experiences and memories.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text:
Well, not that I can say for sure,
since I’ve never experienced it myself…
Right, you did a good job slowing
down the poison’s
path with your breathing. If you
hadn’t been able to do that, you would’ve turned into a spider long ago.
I’ll inject you with an antidote
now, okay?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text: Hurry! Over here, over here!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text:
Can we get them down?
Be careful, okay?
It’s all good! Everyone’s still alive!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At Zenitsu’s location. Zenitsu breathes
heavily as Shinobu
stands over him.

text:
My sword got snapped! I can’t believe
it!
The threads
this boy is controlling… Does that mean they’re even tougher
than the body of that demon I couldn’t slash?
Forgive
me, Mr. Urokodaki, Mr. Haganezuka! Thanks to my inexperience, my sword is now broken!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
No, this isn’t the time for that! Think! Think!
If I can’t slash those
threads, then let me get right up in his face!
It’s no good! Those threads
have a life of their own, and I can’t get through their attacks!
Even though he’s holding back enough not to kill me, he’s still overwhelming me to this degree!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Well? Do you still refuse to take back what you said?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Fine. In that case, you’ll get slashed to ribbons.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
I can’t dodge them all!
Nezuko!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Nezuko! Nezuko! You protected
me! I’m sorry!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
A girl emerged from that box on his shoulders. But she has the aura of a
demon!
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Hey, you… Is that… That girl…
Is she your sibling?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: So what if she is?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: The wound is so deep! Her left wrist is about to fall off!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Hurry up and heal! Hurry
up and heal! Hurry up and heal!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Siblings… Siblings… The sister’s been turned into a demon.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: R-Rui?
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Yet, she stays by his side.
The younger
sister protected the elder brother.
Risking her own life…
That’s a genuine bond! I want it!
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
W-Wait a minute! Wait a minute!
Please! I’m your elder sister!
Don’t desert me!
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
None of you ever managed to fulfill the roles you were given.
Never. Not once.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
W-Wait. I was the elder sister
you wanted, wasn’t I? Give me a chance to redeem myself!
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
In that case,
go kill those people wandering
all over this mountain. If you do that, I’ll forgive you for what just happened.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
F-Fine. I’ll go kill
them.
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Boy, let’s talk. Come on out.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Boy? Talk?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
The thing is, I was really
moved.
Seeing the bond you two share gave me chills.
I doubt there are any words in this
universe that can describe how moved I was.
But now the only thing left for you is death by my hand.
It would be sad if it were to come to pass, right?
But there’s
just one thing. Just one thing that will let you escape
that.
Your sister…
Give your sister
to me. If you hand her over without
a fight, I’ll at least
spare your life.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I have no idea what you’re talking about!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Your little
sister will be my little sister. Starting
today.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
You didn’t actually think I’d ever agree to that.
Not to mention,
Nezuko’s not a thing! She has her own feelings
and will! There’s no way
she’ll ever be your sister!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
It’s all right. No need to worry. Because
I’ll create a bond between
us.
I’m stronger
than you. I’m talking about the bond of terror.
I’ll teach her what
will happen if she defies me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
I’ve had enough of this crazy talk!
Using terror
to shackle someone
hand and foot is
not the bond of
a family! Unless you fix that basic misunderstanding, you’ll
never get what you desire!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
So irritating. Would you mind not shouting?
We don’t see eye to eye, do we?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I’ll never hand Nezuko over to you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
That’s okay, I guess.
I’ll just kill you and then take
her.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I’ll cut off your head first!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: That’s the spirit! I’d like to see you try it.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
That is, if you can actually
defeat a member
of the Twelve Kizuki like me!
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Family.
A father has his role as the father,
and the mother has her role as the mother.
The parents
protect the children, and the elder brother and sister protect
their younger siblings.
No matter what. At the risk of their own lives.
The way I
see it, if you don’t understand your own role, there’s no reason for you to live.
What about you? What is your role?
Your role is to relinquish your younger sister
to me and disappear. If you
can’t do that, your only
option is to die.
Because you can’t defeat me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Lower Five… Just as I thought! That power… This kid is a true Twelve Kizuki!
It won’t
be easy to slash those threads. What should I do? With this broken
sword… If that kid’s neck turns out to be tougher than the threads…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I don’t like that look in your eyes. Glittering like that…
What a fool you are. Don’t
tell me… you think you’re
going to beat me?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: All right, I’ve taken her now. Now do you recognize what your own role is?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Let her go!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: But I told you I’d spare your life at least if you didn’t defy me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Ah… Nezuko’s gone!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Ahh… Nezuko!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Stop that hollering. I’m sure that’s
not enough to kill her. After all, she’s a demon.
But it looks like I’ll have to teach her a lesson after all. I’m going to let her bleed for a
while.
If she doesn’t
learn to be docile, I’ll just leave her like that until daybreak… and let
her roast for a bit.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: You let Nezuko… Let her go!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Look, you… I’m sure I’m mistaken, but…
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
… you don’t think
that if you get close enough to me, you can chop off my head, do you?
Fine by me. Here. Give it a shot.
The blade… won’t
go through! Ngh… Ngh…!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Didn’t I tell you? You have no chance
against me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
My body is more durable than any thread
I manipulate.
If you can’t even slash those
threads, you don’t
have a chance in hell of slashing
my neck.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Ngh! Ngh!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
S-So powerful. His power is on a whole different level than any other demon I’ve fought!
So this is a Twelve
Kizuki’s… The power of a demon closely
related to Kibutsuji?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Ngh! Ngh!! Ngh!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
You’re making
too much noise. Quiet down a bit.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Ngh!!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Stop that!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I’m your elder brother
now. Enough of that infernal
wailing.
Calm down! Don’t get emotional! If you keep this up, you’ll be playing right into his hands!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Hm? Did she pass out? Is she asleep?
This demon has a unique aura.
There’s something about her that’s not like the rest of us. Interesting.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Concentrate! Control your breathing! Unleash the most precise, final Form!
(Thoughts) Total Concentration!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
You still don’t realize
how futile it is?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Water Breathing! Tenth
Form! Constant Flux!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I slashed them!
I was able to slash the threads!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Gathering
force with each rotation… This could be trouble.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I can do it! If I can keep closing
the distance between
us, I can defeat him!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Hey… You don’t think these threads
are at maximum strength, do you?
Blood Demon
Art… Cutting Thread
Cage. I have no more use for you. Goodbye.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
No good! I can’t slash these threads!
I’m still not getting enough
spin. These are giving off a totally
different scent than the
other threads!
But I can’t
afford to lose, no matter
what! (Thoughts) I’m gonna die. I’m gonna lose! I’m…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Father…
Tanjuurou        Tanjirou… Breathe. Get your breathing under
control and become
Hinokami.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past, in Tanjirou’s memory. A young Tanjirou and Nezuko dance and play as their father
Tanjuurou watches them.

text:
Tanjirou? Look. It’s your father’s kagura
dance.
Our family
works with fire, so to ward off injuries and disasters, we offer this dance to Hinokami, along with our prayers, on
New Year’s Day.
Y.Tanjirou        Hey, Mother…
Y.Tanjirou        How
can Father dance like that in the snow for so long when he’s so frail?
I bet my lungs would freeze.
Tanjuurou        There’s a breathing technique. A way to breathe so that you won’t exhaust
yourself, no matter how much
you move.
Y.Tanjirou        Breathe?
Tanjuurou        Right. If you can master the correct way to breathe,
you’ll be able to dance forever, too.
The cold won’t bother
you, either.
Tanjirou, if nothing else, make sure this kagura and these earrings get passed down to you
uninterrupted.
That’s what I promised.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

text: Hinokami Kagura… Dance!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text: The threads…!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text:
Don’t stop! Keep running!
If you stop now, it’ll
bring on the repercussions of forcibly switching
from Water Breathing to Hinokami Dance Breathing!
When that happens,
I’ll be immobile for a while!
(Thoughts) That’s why I gotta do it now!
Run! You gotta protect
Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text: This guy…!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text: I see the Opening Thread!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text:
You gotta take him down now! Even if it means… getting
slashed by him at
the same time!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text:
Nezuko… Nezuko… Wake up, Nezuko.
You have to save your brother.
I know you can do it now, Nezuko.
Do your best.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In Nezuko’s
subconscious. Kie calls out to Nezuko.

text:
Please, Nezuko.
Or your brother will be killed, too!
speaker: Kie
scene:
In Nezuko’s
subconscious. Kie calls out to Nezuko.

text: Blood Demon Art… Exploding Blood!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the real world.
Nezuko wakes up.

text:
No way! The threads burned
and snapped!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the real world.
Nezuko wakes up.

text:
The bond between Nezuko and me… can’t be… severed by
anyone!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the real world.
Nezuko wakes up.

text:
Nezuko… Nezuko!
Ngh… I won… I won…
My father saved me…
I’m not sure why I
was able to unleash that attack with the kagura that’s been in our family for generations. But that was
what saved me! I was able to beat him!
Huh? I can’t
see Nezuko! Is it because
I took way too many breaths?
Agh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
This ringing in my ears is brutal!
My whole body is throbbing
with pain!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
I gotta… heal up fast!
I’m still not done fighting!
I gotta go save Inosuke!
Right away!
The scent of blood just got stronger!
Come to think of it, it didn’t
give off the smell of ash. Don’t tell me…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
Even though I chopped
off his head?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
You thought
you defeated me? Poor kid. Did your pathetic delusion
bring you joy?
I cut off my head myself
with my own threads… before
you could chop it
off.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
Enough. I’ll kill both you and your sister.
I haven’t been this enraged
in a long time.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
Get up! Get up right
now!
Get your breathing under control! Hurry!
Right now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text: But I wonder why you’re not burning up.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
It was only me and my threads that caught fire,
right? I don’t know if
it’s your sister’s power, but thanks for getting me super annoyed.
Now I can carve you up with no regrets.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
If you use the correct
breathing techniques, it makes no difference how exhausted you are!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text: Blood Demon Art… Murderous Eye Basket!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
Don’t panic! Don’t let it disrupt your breathing! Calm down… if you can calm
down!
I can’t raise… my arm!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text: Somebody’s here. Is it Zenitsu?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
You did a good job holding
out until I got
here.
Leave the rest to me.
speaker: Giyuu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
You’re like an endless
stream of lowlifes
always getting in my way!
Blood Demon Art… Cutting
Thread Rotation!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text: Total Concentration… Water Breathing… Eleventh Form. Dead Calm.
speaker: Giyuu
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text: Eleventh Form?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
Who cares
about your Eleventh
Form?!
What’s
going on? What did he do?
The instant I got up in his face, the threads scattered.
Not one of them reached him? The toughest
threads of all got slashed? That’s impossible! One more time!
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest of Mt. Natagumo. Rui’s
head falls to the ground, and his body collapses. Tanjirou also falls to the ground. The spider threads
holding Nezuko burn away,
and Nezuko falls to the ground.

text:
I messed up! I messed
up!
And I was the only one who never messed
up until now in this “Pretend
Family” game!
speaker: Sister
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
The Spider Demon Sister runs through the trees.

text:
We finally drove her into a corner!
Hey, look at that.
Huh?
speaker: Slayers
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
A demon?
It’s just a kid. But even if it
looks like a kid, it’s still a demon. If we let it go, it’ll devour humans.
speaker: Slayers
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text: Hey… Hey… You want me to save you?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text: Ah… Huh?
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
In return,
will you do what I ask?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
I’ll do anything! I’ll do whatever
you want, so please save
me!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
Then become
a part of my family.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text: I will! I’ll do it!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
What are they talking
about?
speaker: Slayer
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text: All right, it’s over for you!
speaker: Slayer
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
Welcome. Starting
today, you’re part of my family, too.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon Sister,
who is not yet a Spider
Demon, is being chased by a
group of Demon Slayers. She falls to the ground.

text:
Drink this. Our family’s
power belongs to
Rui.
Since we were all weak demons,
Rui shared his power with us.
Because Rui is one of that person’s favorites, he gets special
permission to do this kind of thing.
speaker: O.Sister
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon
Sister, who is not yet a Spider Demon, sits in a room with Rui and the older sister.
Rui cuts his finger and adds a drop of blood to a dish of water. The older sister offers the dish to the Spider Demon
Sister.

text: Ngh! Ah…
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon
Sister, who is not yet a Spider Demon, sits in a room with Rui and the older sister.
Rui cuts his finger and adds a drop of blood to a dish of water. The older sister offers the dish to the Spider Demon
Sister.

text:
Do you feel it? You don’t have to fear those demon hunters
anymore.
Now then, time for the finishing
touches.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon
Sister, who is not yet a Spider Demon, sits in a room with Rui and the older sister.
Rui cuts his finger and adds a drop of blood to a dish of water. The older sister offers the dish to the Spider Demon
Sister.

text:
All right,
you can look up now.
Congratulations. You’re
truly part of the family
now.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the past. The Spider Demon
Sister, who is not yet a Spider Demon, sits in a room with Rui and the older sister.
Rui cuts his finger and adds a drop of blood to a dish of water. The older sister offers the dish to the Spider Demon
Sister.

text: We’re only playing house.
speaker: O.Sister
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text:
We have no blood ties. We’re just a clan of assorted strangers.
form.]
speaker: O.Sister
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text:
I’m so sorry! I’ll do better,
Rui!
I’ll practice! Forgive
me! I’m so sorry I couldn’t do it well! It’s just that I revert by accident
sometimes!
speaker: Mother
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text: Ahh! Ahh… Ah…
speaker: Mother
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text: I don’t want to hear your excuses, Mother.
speaker: Rui
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text: Play the role of mother like you should.
speaker: Rui
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text: I know what I must do, Rui.
speaker: Mother
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text:
We were all so scared of the demon
hunters and just wanted companions.
It’s not like we wanted to take part in
this baffling “Pretend Family” game. But those who fail to go along with Rui’s demands
and orders get carved up or have their intellect taken from them or get strung up, exposed to the sunlight. I’ve
had enough of this.
speaker: O.Sister
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text:
I’m going to pretend
I never heard you say that…
speaker: Sister
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text:
I know you’re not a fool. Unlike all the others.
Let’s run away together.
I wouldn’t say this to anyone but you. You’re
the one person I truly think of as my younger sister.
speaker: O.Sister
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text:
Tomorrow, Rui is going to be summoned by that person and descend
the mountain.
That’s our chance to escape.
speaker: O.Sister
scene:
Sometime later.
The older sister explains the situation to the Spider
Demon Sister.

text: How disappointing.
speaker: Rui
scene:
The next day.
The older sister
and the Spider Demon Sister
run down the mountain. Rui is
waiting at the base.

text: They were all fools, but I’m not like them! Even so, I messed up!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon
Sister runs through
the forest.

text:
Rui… Rui! Mother’s
been killed! And our elder brother, too!
What should we do? The demon hunters
aren’t far behind… (Flashback) Listen…
speaker: Sister
scene:
Earlier in the evening.
The Spider Demon Sister informs
Rui of the situation.

text: Sh-Shouldn’t we make a run for it?
speaker: Sister
scene:
Earlier in the evening.
The Spider Demon Sister informs
Rui of the situation.

text: Don’t…
speaker: Sister
scene:
Earlier in the evening.
The Spider Demon Sister informs
Rui of the situation.

text: Ahh! Ah…
speaker: Sister
scene:
Earlier in the evening.
The Spider Demon Sister informs
Rui of the situation.

text: You know, don’t you? I really hate it when your face reverts.
speaker: Rui
scene:
Earlier in the evening.
The Spider Demon Sister informs
Rui of the situation.

text: What are you looking at? This isn’t some show, you know.
speaker: Rui
scene:
Earlier in the evening.
The Spider Demon Sister informs
Rui of the situation.

text: I only got my face slashed, so I got off easy!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Ah… A demon!
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: What the?! Ngh!
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
It’s futile.
You’ll never cut through them. You
see, my Ball of
Yarn may feel soft, but it’s
extremely hard.
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
First, the solvent will melt those clothes out of the way.
And then, it’ll be your turn.
You’ll be reduced
to mush in now time, and then I’ll feed on
you.
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Wow, how amazing! Do you release
those threads from the palms of your hands?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Good evening. The moon is quite
lovely tonight, don’t
you think?
Urgh… Ah… Ah…
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: I can see you have no intention of being my friend.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
W-W-Wait! I beg of you!
I’m being forced to do this! If I defy him, I’ll be slashed to shreds!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Ah… Is that right?
That does sound tragic! I’ll spare you! Let’s be friends!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Y-You’re going to spare me?
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Sweet young girl, how many people
have you killed?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Five.
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
But I was ordered
to! I had no choice!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
There’s no need to lie about it. Because
I already know.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Help me! Somebody!
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
That spell you cast to turn one of our men into a cocoon was most
impressive!
You’ve devoured at least
eighty humans, haven’t
you?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
No, of course I haven’t eaten that many.
I only killed those five.
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
But I came here from the west, you know. The west, my dear.
On the west
side of that mountain, I saw hordes of
cocoons hanging from the trees. The human captives inside
had been liquefied. All massacred. In that spot alone, I counted at least fourteen cocoons.
Fourteen humans. All dead.
Oh, it’s not that I’m angry.
I’m only trying to confirm
the accurate toll.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
What good will it do you to confirm
that?
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
You’ll receive the penalty
you deserve and be reborn!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Penalty?
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
That way, you and I can become friends.
If you go unpunished after having taken all those lives, your victims will never get justice.
Shinobu  I could gouge out your
eyeballs or slash your stomach
to rip out your organs. For every person you’ve killed, I shall torture you. And after you’ve suffered
through all of the pain and agony, your sins will be
forgiven. Let’s both give it our all!
Don’t worry!
Since you’re a demon, my dear, surely it won’t kill you and neither
will there be any after
effects!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Who do you think you’re kidding?!
Die! You damn witch!
speaker: Sister
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
I can see that we’ll never be friends.
Oh, what a pity!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Insect Breathing, Butterfly Dance…
Caprice.
My head… hasn’t been cut off!
(Thoughts) That’s the sword she’s using?
I see.
She’s too tiny and has no arm strength, so beheading is beyond her. That’s someone I can defeat!
Ah… Ahh… Ahhh!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
You mustn’t
think you’re safe just because
you haven’t been beheaded. Because
there are swordswomen like me who use poison.
Demon Slayer Corps, Insect
Hashira, Shinobu Kochou.
I may be the only swordswoman among the Hashiras
unable to decapitate demons, but as I’ve
created a poison lethal to demons, I’m also rather awesome.
Oh, pardon me! You’re dead, so you can’t hear me, can you?
Careless of me!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Are you all right?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Yes… Just barely!
What happened
to the demon? Shouldn’t you finish it off?
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
I killed her with wisteria poison.
She’s already dead, so if we leave her, she’ll
rot.
I’m a pharmaceuticals expert!
Your clothes did get dissolved, but your body is more or less unscathed! I’m so glad!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Eek… Ahhh…!
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text:
Now then, as for the whereabouts of the demon
that forced this girl to do his bidding… Did Tomioka beat me to it,
then?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the present.
The Spider Demon Sister continues running through the forest.

text: Nezuko… Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location.
Tanjirou crawls toward
Nezuko.

text:
I’ll kill them! I’ll kill them! I’ll kill those
siblings no matter
what! Siblings!
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location.
Tanjirou crawls toward
Nezuko.

text:
What is it that you want to do, Rui? What do you mean by “family”?
Rui         (Thoughts) I don’t know. Because I have no memories of when I was a human.
Mother        (Thoughts) Is that why you made us
pretend to be your family?
speaker: Mother
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. The Spider Demon Mother approaches Rui.

text:
I thought that if I could
feel a family bond, my memories would come back. (Thoughts) The bond of a real
family…
That’s right.
I…
speaker: Rui
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. The Spider Demon Mother approaches Rui.

text:
Ngh… There!
Woah! Hehehe… Mm… Ngh!
Hahahaha! Hahahaha!
There!
speaker: Children
scene:
In the past. A group of children plays in the
snow.

text:
Rui! Rui!
Rui! What are you doing? You know you’re
not supposed to be outside!
speaker: Mother
scene:
In the past. A group of children plays in the
snow.

text: I’ve always been very frail, ever since I was a child. (Narration) I was never able to run. Even walking was a struggle.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory. Rui, still a human child,
sits in bed.

text:
My parents weren’t
happy about it.
Because at the cost of a strong body, I could never see the sun again. I also had to start devouring humans.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory. Rui, still a human child,
sits in bed.

text:
What have you done? What on earth have you done?
Rui!
speaker: Father
scene:
In Rui’s memory. Rui has killed
a human. His father finds the body on the floor.

text:
Long ago, I heard a wonderful story.
It was about
a father who died saving his drowning
child.
I was deeply
moved. Such astounding parental love, and such a wonderful
bond, too.
The father
who drowned in the river had fulfilled his role as a parent. (Narration) And yet, for some
reason, my parents…
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory. Rui has killed
a human. His father finds the body on the floor.

text:
My own parents
tried to kill me.
All my mother did was sob, not even lifting
a finger to protect me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text: They must’ve been imposters. (Narration) The bond between us wasn’t real.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text: I’m sorry…
speaker: Mother
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text: She’s saying something. She’s still alive?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text:
I’m so sorry… for not giving
you a strong, healthy body.
Those were my mother’s
last words as she passed away.
(Thoughts) She’s dead.
speaker: Mother
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text:
It’s all right,
Rui. We’ll be following you soon.
speaker: Father
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text:
I had no choice but to look at
it that way. I couldn’t bear the weight of
what I’d done.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In Rui’s memory.
Rui’s father holds a knife,
ready to kill Rui in his sleep.

text:
Even knowing that I
had only myself to blame… day after
day, I missed my parents so
much that I could barely stand it.
Even after creating
a fake family, that feeling
of emptiness wouldn’t
go away. Since I was always
the most powerful, there was no one who could protect me, no one who could
shield me.
The stronger I became, the less I remembered from the time I was a human.
I was losing sight of what it was I wanted to do, seeking a bond that I
could never have.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present.
Rui has been beheaded. Tanjirou
protects Nezuko. Rui’s
body continues toward Tanjirou and Nezuko.

text:
It was simply
out of my reach, no matter who I strained
to get my hands on it.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present.
Rui has been beheaded. Tanjirou
protects Nezuko. Rui’s
body continues toward Tanjirou and Nezuko.

text: That small body gives off the scent of overwhelming grief.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present.
Rui has been beheaded. Tanjirou
protects Nezuko. Rui’s
body continues toward Tanjirou and Nezuko.

text:
So warm… Hands as warm and gentle as sunlight…
Now I remember it as clear as day. What I wanted to do was apologize.
(Thoughts) I’m sorry. Everything… Everything was my fault.
I hope
you can forgive me. But since I’ve killed so many people,
I’m going to hell, aren’t I?
Father…
Mother… I can’t
go to the same place as you, can I?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present.
Rui has been beheaded. Tanjirou
protects Nezuko. Rui’s
body continues toward Tanjirou and Nezuko.

text: That’s not true.
speaker: Father
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. Rui’s Father has his hand on Rui’s back.

text: Even if it’s to hell, we’ll be going together.
speaker: Father
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. Rui’s Father has his hand on Rui’s back.

text: Father… Mother…
speaker: Rui
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. Rui’s Father has his hand on Rui’s back.

text: Rui… No matter where you go, we’ll be with you.
speaker: Mother
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. Rui’s Father has his hand on Rui’s back.

text:
Everything… was my fault!
I’m sorry… I’m sorry…
I’m sorry… I’m sorry!
speaker: Rui
scene: In Rui’s subconscious. Rui’s Father has his hand on Rui’s back.

text:
Don’t waste your sympathy
on a demon that has devoured humans.
It doesn’t
matter if it looks like a child.
It’s still a hideous monster
that’s lived for decades.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the real world.
Rui’s body completely disintegrates.

text:
To avenge the people who were killed,
to make sure there are no more victims… I’ll bring
my blade down on any demon’s neck without mercy.
But as for those for whom being a demon meant despair, those who regretted
their actions, I will never trample over them!
Because even demons used to be human at some point! They were once human,
like you and I!
Please step off of him!
They’re
not hideous monsters
at all! Demons
are hopeless creatures! They’re tragic creatures!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the real world.
Rui’s body completely disintegrates.

text: Ah… You’re…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the real world.
Rui’s body completely disintegrates.

text:
Oh?
For whatever reason could you be getting in my way, Tomioka?
Weren’t you the one who told me man and demon could never become friends?
How should I put it?
This is exactly why nobody likes
you, you know. Fufu…
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the real world.
Rui’s body completely disintegrates.

text: Ngh… Ahh… Ahh… Ngh… Ahh… Ahh…
speaker: Slayer
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
Haa… Man, Lady Kochou’s
antidote is really effective.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
Yeah. And all it took was one look at the situation to finish preparing
it. She’s truly amazing.
That goes for him, too.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
Oh, that
guy?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text: Since he defeated the demon, the poison's circulation showed a bit.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
All right! This should
do it.
Looking good. Chances are, they’ll all pull through.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
Still, I’d like to wrap things up quickly
and leave this place as soon as possible, wouldn’t you?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
Yeah, same here. I mean, this place really,
really stinks!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Gotou of the Kakushi cleanup
crew injects a Demon Slayer
with an antidote.

text:
Now, now, Tomioka, please
move out of the way.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: I’m not… I’m not disliked by people.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text:
Ahh, I apologize. You have yet to realize
what people think
of you, huh? That was uncalled for. Please forgive me.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: Little boy!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: Yes?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: You’re protecting a demon there. I don’t want to hurt you, so please get out of the way.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text:
Y-You’re mistaken! Well, you’re not, but… she’s
my sister! She’s
my little sister,
so… you see…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text:
Ahh, is that right?
Poor thing.
In that case… I shall use a gentle
toxin to kill her so she won’t suffer, all
right?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: Can you move?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: If you can’t, force yourself to. Take your sister and make a run for it.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text: Tomioka… Sorry for the trouble! Thank you very much!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text:
Isn’t that against the Demon Slayer
Corps rules?
My whole body is aching!
It’s so painful! I want to scream from the pain! Deal
with it!
Deal with it, deal with it, deal with it, deal with it, deal with it, deal with it!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text:
Does this mean I’ll have to quit the Demon Slayer Corps?
Even if she’s my sister,
there’s no way they’d let a Demon Slayer
travel with a demon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Shinobu points
her sword at Tanjirou, Nezuko,
and Tomioka.

text:
I see you’re taking
this seriously, Tomioka.
Who would’ve thought
a Hashira would
ever defend a demon?
Unfortunately for you, I have no intention of joining you in stalling
for time. And with that, farewell.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tomioka
and Shinobu’s location. Tomioka and Shinobu
clash.

text:
Is that your attempt
at catching up with me?
I don’t mind if you want to try stopping me, but don’t forget about the other
one!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At Tomioka
and Shinobu’s location. Tomioka and Shinobu
clash.

text: Don’t stop! Keep moving! I’ve got to get as far away as I can!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text:
Ack!
Oh no! What happened?
It took all I had to keep running!
(Thoughts) Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text: A Demon Slayer!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text:
Ngh… Run, Nezuko!
Run! Make a run for it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text:
Don’t get caught, no matter what!
Hurry --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text: She shrunk and turned into a child?
speaker: Kanao
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text:
All she does is run away. She’s not even attacking me. But why? (Thoughts) No need to ponder it. My
only job is to slay this demon.
speaker: Kanao
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tanjirou continues running
with Nezuko.

text:
Tomioka? Earth to Tomioka.
Since the
purpose of my attack was to slay a demon, and therefore justified, I don’t
believe it would be construed as a violation
of the rules. But we can’t
say the same about your
actions, can we?
You’re actively interfering with my duties.
Just what might your intentions be here?
Don’t you have anything to say for yourself? This is your final warning.
Give me a reason at least.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tomioka holds Shinobu
in place.

text:
If I remember right,
it was two years ago.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tomioka holds Shinobu
in place.

text:
Please spare me the long, rambling
backstory. Are you doing this out of spite?
Are you perhaps still
angry at me for pointing
out why nobody likes you?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tomioka holds Shinobu
in place.

text:
Message! Message!
Caw!
I bring a message
from headquarters!
Tanjirou and Nezuko are to be taken back to headquarters alive! Caw!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tomioka holds Shinobu
in place.

text:
Tanjirou and the demon
Nezuko are to be taken back to headquarters alive!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tomioka holds Shinobu
in place.

text:
Tanjirou, dressed
in a checkered haori, with a scar on his forehead! Nezuko,
a female demon with a bamboo
muzzle! Bring them back! Bring them back!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Kanao stops attacking Nezuko as a crow makes its announcement.

text: Are you Nezuko?
speaker: Kanao
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Kanao stops attacking Nezuko as a crow makes its announcement.

text:
Bring them back! Bring them back! Caw!
Tanjirou, dressed
in a checkered haori, with a scar on his forehead! Nezuko,
a female demon with a bamboo
muzzle!
Bring them back! Bring them back! Caw!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Tomioka and Shinobu
sheath their swords and leave the area.

text: He has a scar on his forehead.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
The Kakushi cleanup
crew finds Tanjirou.

text: All right, take him into custody.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
The Kakushi cleanup
crew finds Tanjirou.

text:
Look. His jawbone seems to be broken, doesn’t
it?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
The Kakushi cleanup
crew finds Tanjirou.

text: Hmm… I feel bad about tying him up.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
The Kakushi cleanup
crew finds Tanjirou.

text:
Ah! Wh-Who the hell is this?
I don’t know. A demon? Couldn’t
be, right?
Is it a human?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Other Kakushi members
find Inozuke tied
up.

text:
He’s wearing our uniform’s
trousers.
Oh, hey, this is a mask! He’s a human! All right, let’s bring him in.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Other Kakushi members
find Inozuke tied
up.

text:
Wow, this guy’s really
banged up!
Why’s he strung up like this?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Other Kakushi members
find Inozuke tied
up.

text:
There was nothing
I could do…
I couldn’t even kill a single demon on my own!
(Thoughts) Y’know what? Maybe I’m not that strong…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Other Kakushi members
find Inozuke tied
up.

text:
They wrapped us up like mummies.
Who are these people? They seem to be cleaning
the place up really
efficiently.
And that
girl over there… Isn’t she the girl from the Final Selection? She has the same kind
of hair ornament as the lady who wrapped us up.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Zenitsu sits up against a tree, wrapped
up in bandages. Kanao directs the Kakushi members.

text: Should we bring them to the Butterfly Mansion?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Zenitsu sits up against a tree, wrapped
up in bandages. Kanao directs the Kakushi members.

text:
Yes, bring all the wounded to our place.
I’ll be hunting down the demons in the area so
you can work uninterrupted.
speaker: Kanao
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Zenitsu sits up against a tree, wrapped
up in bandages. Kanao directs the Kakushi members.

text:
Actually,
I’ve heard of them. The cleanup crew, the Kakushi.
They’re the unit that cleans up after the Demon
Slayers battle demons.
They say that most of its members
are people who have no swordsmanship
skills.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Zenitsu sits up against a tree, wrapped
up in bandages. Kanao directs the Kakushi members.

text:
Ah… The sun’s coming
up.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the forest.
Zenitsu sits up against a tree, wrapped
up in bandages. Kanao directs the Kakushi members.

text:
Wake up.
Hey, I told you to wake up!
Wake… Hey… Hey, you! Come on, dude! C’mon!
Are you gonna nap all day?! Rise and shine already,
will ya?!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
You’re in the presence
of the Hashira!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
Wake up.
Hey, I said wake up.
Wake… Hey! Hey, you! C’mon, you! C’mon!
Are you gonna sleep
all day?! Wake the hell up, will
you?!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
Bummer. I heard he was a Demon Slayer
with a demon in tow, so I was looking
forward to seeing someone more flamboyant… but that’s one drab-looking
dude, huh?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
Yes! And now, we’ll
put this boy on trial!
I see!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
To think that he’s been protecting his sister who’s now a demon… Now that's a beautiful sibling love! How
brave!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text: Wh-Who are these peop --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
Don’t open your mouth just yet, you moron!
Just who do you think is standing
before you?!
You’re in the presence
of the Hashiras!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
Hashiras? What is a Hashira? (Thoughts) What’s he talking about? (Thoughts) And who are these people exactly?
Where am I now?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
This is the Demon Slayers’ headquarters.
And you’re about to be put on trial…
Tanjirou Kamado.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning, at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
lies asleep and tied up on the ground.

text:
Before we start the trial, why don’t you explain the crime you’ve
comm --
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: There’s no need for a trial!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Protecting a demon is a clear violation of the code! We’re within our rights
to deal with him on our own!
We’re going to behead him along with the demon!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
In that case, I’ll be glad to decapitate him flamboyantly. I’ll show you the most flamboyant blood spray you’ll ever
see. I’m talking max flamboyance.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
What? You’d kill such an adorable child? That pains my heart!
It fills me with
anguish!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Ah, what a pitiful
sight this boy is. The poor soul…
I pity him for having been born at all.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Um, what was the shape of that cloud again?
What was it called again?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Where’s
Nezuko? Nezuko!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Hey, you… The Hashiras
are speaking. What are you looking at?
These are the nine highest-ranking swordsmen in the Demon
Slayer Corps.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Hashiras…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Let’s put him out of his misery.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Let’s do it. Flamboyantly.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Nezuko… Nezuko, where are you?!
Nezuko! Zenitsu!
Inosuke! Murata!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Forget that.
What will we do with Tomioka?
speaker: Iguro
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Seeing him there without
any restraints is giving me a headache. Based on what Kochou told us, Tomioka is just as
guilty of breaking Corps rules.
How will we deal with him? How should
we make him take responsibility? What kind of lesson should we teach him?
Don’t you have anything
to say, Tomioka?
Because of me, now even Tomioka…
speaker: Iguro
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Iguro,
you’re as serpent-like as ever! Such a nag! I love how pesky you are!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Tomioka!
All by himself at a distance! How cute!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Oh, where’s the harm? He did come along without resisting.
Let’s come up with a penalty
later.
What I’m more interested in is hearing
this boy’s story.
The reason he’s going on missions
with a demon in tow despite being a Demon Slayer.
I’d like to hear the reason from the boy himself. Needless to say, what he’s
done is against the Demon Slayer Corps rules.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
You are aware of that, aren’t
you?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Tanjirou Kamado… Why are you travelling with a demon when you’re
a Demon Slayer?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: No need to ask.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: I do believe you need some water.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
You’ve injured your jaw, so please drink slowly.
It contains a painkiller, so it will make you feel better.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Haa…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
It’s not as if your wounds
are healed, so you mustn’t
push yourself.
Now then, Tanjirou Kamado…
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Haa… That demon is my younger
sister! While I was away, my family
was attacked by a
demon, and when I got home, they were all dead!
My sister got turned
into a demon, but she’s never devoured
anyone! She never has
and never will! She’ll never hurt humans, no matter what!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Spare us your absurd
ravings. If she’s family, no wonder you’re
defending her. I can’t trust a single word you’re
saying. I, for one, don’t believe you.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Ahh… She’s been possessed by a demon.
Let us kill this poor child immediately so that she can be
liberated!
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Listen to me, please!
I became a swordsman so that Nezuko
could be cured!
It’s been two years since Nezuko became a demon! And in all that time,
she hasn’t devoured one human!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Your story’s
spinning in the most drab way possible, idiot. The fact that she hasn’t eaten anyone, that she won’t from now on…
Don’t just give us lip service. Prove it to us with max flamboyance.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: What was that bird again? Um…
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Excuse me? I
do have my doubts, you know. I just
can’t imagine the Master being in the dark about this situation.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Do you really think
it’s okay to deal with him without
his permission?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Yes…
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Shouldn’t we at least wait until he arrives?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
My sister… My sister
will fight with me by my side!
She can fight as a Demon Slayer to protect humans!
So please…
Shinazugawa     Well,
well, I see you have some fun brewing here.
Is that the moron Slayer who has a demon with him?
Shinazugawa     What
the hell are you trying
to pull here?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Shinazugawa! You’ve gained even more scars! How gorgeous you look! Kakushi  This won’t do, Master Shinazugawa! Please, would you mind putting
down that box? Kanroji      (Thoughts)
Shinobu looks pretty angry! Now that’s unusual! She’s so cool!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Shinazugawa, please
don’t act out of line.
Shinazugawa     What
did you say about that demon, kid?
That she can fight as a Demon Slayer
to protect humans? You know what we call that?
A total delusion, you moron!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: Ah! Ngh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Anyone who hurts my sister… Hashira
or not, I won’t let you get away with it!
Shinazugawa     Hahahaha…
Shinazugawa     Is that right?
Good for you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Stop it! The Master
will be arriving soon!
Shinazugawa     Ngh…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Pft! Pardon me.
Shinazugawa     Damn
you!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Even though Tomioka
ran interference, he still landed a blow on
Shinazugawa.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
If you can’t tell the difference between good demons and bad, you should just quit being
a Hashira!
Shinazugawa     You
little…
Shinazugawa     I’ll
destroy you!
The Master has arrived.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text: So good of you to come…
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
… my beloved
children.
The Master has arrived.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In the morning,
at the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters. Tanjirou
faces the Hashiras.

text:
Mm… Good morning, everyone. The weather is amazingly good today.
I wonder if the sky is blue.
It pleases me that we’ve made it to our semiannual Hashira Meeting with no personnel
changes.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
He’s wounded… No, is he sick? So that man is the Master?
So quick! I couldn’t even react! This…!
Shinazugawa     I am pleased
to see you in good health as well, Master.
I fervently pray for your continued
good fortune.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text: Thank you, Sanemi.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
I wanted to say that! Offer my greetings to the Master!
Shinazugawa     If I may, Master…
Before we start the Hashira
Meeting, would you mind enlightening us about this swordsman, Tanjirou Kamado, accompanied by a
demon?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
He didn’t
seem to have a drop of intelligence or logic, but he’s speaking
so formally now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Right. I apologize for startling you
all.
As for Tanjirou
and Nezuko, I’ve sanctioned their situation.
And I’d also like you all to accept it.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Ahh… Even if it’s what you desire, Master,
I cannot agree to it.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
I’m flamboyantly opposed as well! A Demon Slayer travelling with a demon
is unacceptable!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
I shall do whatever
it is you wish, Master!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
I’m fine either way… I’m going to forget
soon, anyway.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
I won’t trust them. I won’t trust them. In the first place, I loathe
demons.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Although I respect you with all my heart,
that’s an incomprehensible notion, Master! I oppose it with everything I’ve got!
Shinazugawa     The Demon
Slayer Corps’ mission
is to annihilate demons. I request that you penalize both Kamado and Tomioka!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text: The letter.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text: Yes, Master.
speaker: Hinaki
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
“… Sakonji Urokodaki and Giyuu Tomioka
will atone by committing ritual
suicide.”
Shinazugawa     So what if they commit ritual suicide?
If you want to die, then rot for all I care!
It’s no guarantee! Not by a long shot!
speaker: Hinaki
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Shinazugawa is right! If she kills and devours
a human, there’s
no coming back from
that! It won’t bring back the people who were killed!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
You do have a point.
Shinazugawa     In that case…
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text: Master!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
We can’t guarantee that she won’t
attack humans. We can’t prove
it.
That said… we also can’t prove
that she will attack humans.
Shinazugawa     Ngh…!
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
The
fact is that Nezuko has refrained from devouring humans for more than two
years, and also that there are three people risking their lives for her. To reject this notion, those who reject it must offer an even
more convincing argument.
Shinazugawa     Ngh…
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text: Do you all have the will to do so?
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Also, there’s something I’d like to relay to you, my children.
Tanjirou here has met Kibutsuji.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
No, impossible! Even when no Hashira has ever crossed
paths with him?!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
This kid did?!
What did he look like?!
What about his powers?!
Where did this take place?!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Did you battle him?
Shinazugawa     What
was Kibutsuji doing?!
Did you find his stronghold?! Hey, answer me!
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text: Shut up! I asked him first! First, tell us what powers Kibutsuji has!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Kibutsuji has sent pursuers
after Tanjirou. Though
his purpose may simply be to silence him, now that Kibutsuji’s given
himself away for the first time, I don’t want to let go.
I also believe something’s happening to Nezuko
that Kibutsuji never
saw coming.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Can you try to understand?
Shinazugawa     No, I can’t understand, Master.
If it were
human, I’d be okay with letting it live, but not a demon! Not after all that we
Demon Slayers have gone through
in battle! Not after so many people
have lost their lives!
It’s unacceptable!
Shinazugawa     Ngh…!
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Huh? Huh? What are you doing? What are you doing? You’re
soiling the garden!
Shinazugawa     Master! I will prove it to you myself!
The sheer ugliness
of a demon!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Sanemi…
Shinazugawa     Hey,
demon! It’s time to eat! Sink your teeth into this!
Shinazugawa     No need to force yourself to hold back. Just
show us your true colors,
and I’ll obliterate you right here!
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters. Kagaya
has arrived.

text:
Shinazugawa, it’s no good doing it in the sunlight.
We have to go into the shadows, or the demon won’t show its face.
Shinazugawa     Master, please forgive this discourtesy.

Corps headquarters. Kagaya

text: Stop it!!

it’s the human blood you love so much!

has arrived.

Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

Kamado, if you use any breathing

Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
His veins will burst!
I like it! Sounds flamboyant! Come on! Start
bursting!
Poor soul. Such a weak, pathetic
child… Namu Amida Butsu.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Ngh… Ngh… Grrr…

text: Ngh… Nezuko!

Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
She’s my sister!
She’s my younger
sister! Nezuko is different!
(Flashback) Though I don’t know how it happened!
Urokodaki         (Flashback) All humans are your family. (Flashback) Protect humans.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Humans are to be protected and saved. Never hurt them… I will never hurt them.
Grrr… Grr…
speaker: Nezuko

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Ngh! Shinazugawa  Ah… Tanjirou Haa…
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Ngh… Ngh… Ngh…
speaker: Nezuko

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: What just happened?
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: The demon girl turned her back in disgust.
speaker: Hinaki
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Although she’d
been stabbed three
times by Shinazugawa, and despite his flaunting of his bloody arm in her face, she
restrained herself and did not bite.
Shinazugawa    Tsk…
speaker: Nichika
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
So now, it’s been proven that Nezuko won’t
attack humans, right?
speaker: Kagaya

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
What do you think
you’re doing, Tomioka?
speaker: Iguro

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
I’m sure that even after this, there are some who can’t accept

You must prove it to them starting now… that you and Nezuko
can fight as Demon
Slayers, that you can be useful.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
What is this feeling? It’s like I’m floating.
His voice… Is it because
of this man’s voice that I’m feeling
light in the head?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Go out and defeat
a Twelve Kizuki.
Do that, and you’ll be accepted by all. And it will give
more weight to your words.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
I… Nezuko and I will defeat
Muzan Kibutsuji!
Nezuko and I will do it for sure! Strike with the sword
that will stop the chain
of grief!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
As you’re
ill-equipped to do so right
now, Tanjirou, let’s
start by defeating a Twelve Kizuki, all
right?

scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Erk! Yes, sir…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Pft!
You mustn’t laugh!
You mustn’t, you mustn’t, you mustn’t!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
It goes without saying
that the Hashiras
of the Demon Slayer Corps have phenomenal
skills.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Fufufu…
speaker: Himejima
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
After training
themselves to death,
they have defied
death, and they’ve
also defeated Twelve Kizuki.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Yes! A good attitude
to have!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
That is why Hashiras
receive respect and preferential treatment. So, Tanjirou, mind your
manners when you speak.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Y-Yes, sir.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
One more thing, Sanemi,
Obanai… Don’t torment
the younger ones too much.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
As you wish.
Shinazugawa    As you wish.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Tanjirou, we have concluded our business with you. You may step back.

scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
In that case, allow me to take Kamado
into my house.

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: All right, then! Take them away please!
speaker: Shinobu
