At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Erk!
speaker: Kakushi

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Pardon me for cutting
in front of you!

Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Now then, let us begin the Hashira Meet --

Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Hold on a second!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

Come back here!
Please allow me to headbutt that man covered
in scars! I gotta --

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Shut up! Keep your mouth shut!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
I gotta headbutt him as many times as he stabbed

Headbutting isn’t
a violation of the Corps rules, right?
speaker: Tanjirou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Shut up! Settle down now!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Let go of me!
speaker: Tanjirou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Cut it out!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Gah… Gah… Urk!
speaker: Tanjirou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: You’re not allowed to interrupt the Master.
speaker: Tokitou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: We beg your pardon!
speaker: Gotou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
We beg your pardon,
Master!
speaker: Kakushi

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Master Tokitou!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
We beg your
pardon!
speaker: Gotou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Muichirou! What a fine boy! So cool!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Yes, sir!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

Tanjirou… Give Miss Tamayo my regards.

Miss Tamayo’s name!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Ow!
speaker: Tanjirou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Don’t you say another

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
I thought I’d pee my
pants!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Erk…
speaker: Tanjirou

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: You don’t know how terrifying the Hashiras are!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

Try to read the room! Read

never forgive you as long as I live!
Gotou         I’ll never forgive you!

At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Apologize!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: Apologize! Apologize!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text: I… I’m sorry…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. Nezuko stares at Shinazugawa’s arm.

text:
Hello! Is anyone home?
Hello! Is anyone home? Hello… Ugh…
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: Haa… Hey, walk on your own.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
I’m sorry. It’s just that my whole body is aching
like crazy.
The headquarters was huge, too, but this mansion’s something else, huh?
Come to think of it, was this place called the “Butterfly Manor”?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: Hey, there’s someone. Someone’s here.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
That would be, um… Oh, right!
The Tsuguko… Her name is…
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: Tsuguko?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
It’s Master Kanao Tsuyuri.
It’s the girl from the Final
Selection.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
Hey, somebody’s forgotten how they got stomped on by Master
Kanao last night.
A Tsuguko is a swordsman trained
by a Hashira. Only the ones with mind-blowing skills
and talent get chosen.
She’s a girl, but she’s awesome!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
Please forgive us, Master
Tsuyuri.
We were ordered to come here by Master
Kochou. Permission to enter the mansion?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: Uh, do you mind?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: You don’t mind, do you?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: What?! Uh…
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
We were ordered by Master Kochou!
Please come this way.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: Uh, right!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text: She’s fast…
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
The Kakushi members
carrying Tanjirou and Nezuko arrive.

text:
Five times?!
I gotta take this five times?!
Per day?!
And I have to keep taking this medicine for three months?!
If I take this, I can’t
eat anything, you know! I mean it’s really bitter! It’s such an ordeal!
So, you mean my arms and legs will heal just by taking medicine?! For real?! Listen, are
they really gonna heal?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Please stop shouting…
speaker: Kiyo
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Tell me how they’re
gonna get healed!
Somebody explain
this to me better!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Listen! My arms and legs! What’s
gonna happen to my arms and legs?! Hey!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Ah… Ah! Zenitsu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Hey! Hey!!
Really now!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Zenitsu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Are you okay? Did you hurt
yourself?
So you did come up the mountain after
all!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: T-Tanjirou…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Ahh! Tanjirou! Listen to me, will you?
I got stung by this sinky spider, and the poison
hurt like crazy, okay?!
And that girl’s been yelling at me all this time!
I hate my life!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Ugh… I almost got turned into a spider.
My arms and legs are really short right now.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Is that right?
Where’s Inosuke? Have you seen Murata?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
I don’t know about
anyone named Murata,
but Inosuke’s right next to me.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Hey, you’re right!
He’s been here all this time! And I didn’t notice!
Ngh… Inosuke, I’m so glad you’re
all right!
I’m so glad you’re
all right… I’m so sorry! I couldn’t
rescue you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: It’s okay. Don’t worry about it.
speaker: Inosuke
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Paper! Paper!
Do something about this!
speaker: Gotou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Your voice… Is that you, Inosuke?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Wipe it! Hey!
speaker: Gotou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: I heard he lost his voice or something.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
I don’t have all the details,
but I heard he, like, got hit in the neck, and when he yelled at the top of his lungs at the end, that
finished it off, and that did a number on his throat.
He’s depressed now, so it’s made him gentle,
and it really cracks me up! Hehehehe…
Hehehehe!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Why are you cackling
in that creepy
way all of a sudden?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Hehehehe!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: Eek…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
I’m sorry for being
so weak.
speaker: Inosuke
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Hang in there, Inosuke!
It’s not like you to get depressed!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Come on, you did good! You’re
awesome!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
I’m just so happy
that you’re alive!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Ahh!! Did I take my morning
meds?!
Did you see me take them?!
Somebody?! Did you see?! Somebody?! Did you see?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text:
Zenitsu… Inosuke… Thank goodness…
You’re alive.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu complains.

text: It’s all right now. They said you could use this room, Nezuko.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late evening. Tanjirou
places Nezuko’s box on the ground and closes the curtains.

text: Ugh! Ouch, ouch, ouch…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late evening. Tanjirou
places Nezuko’s box on the ground and closes the curtains.

text:
I really got roughed
up on Mt. Natagumo.
It hurts a lot. To be honest, it hurts like crazy.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late evening. Tanjirou
places Nezuko’s box on the ground and closes the curtains.

text:
Nezuko… Thanks for protecting me on the mountain.
Who would’ve
guessed that not only you, but Mr. Urokodaki and Mr. Tomioka,
as well… They’re all risking
their lives for us. They’re all taking care of us.
I need to… become stronger.
Even today…
the Master more or less saved both your life and mine. That man’s voice… It was so soothing
in a mysterious way.
Just listening to him speak made my head feel light. I wonder what kind of person he is.
Oh, right. You’re sleep-deprived, aren’t you?
I’m hurting, and this is rough,
but I gotta keep on fighting. Because… I’ll be a grown man one day.
And then, I’ll become
an old guy and die. And then, the demon Nezuko will end up all
alone.
That would be too lonely, wouldn’t
it, Nezuko?
I promise you I’ll turn you back into a human,
okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late evening. Tanjirou
places Nezuko’s box on the ground and closes the curtains.

text:
Just as you’ve all reported, the demons’ carnage
has increased more than ever.
The threat to human
life is greater
than it’s ever been.
We’ll have to bolster
the ranks of the Demon
Slayers. What do you all think?
Shinazugawa    The incident on Mt. Natagumo
made it crystal clear.
The caliber
of Demon Slayers
has nose-dived to unbelievable levels.
Most of them are
useless.
The trainers must be blind.
You’d think they could at least
tell if someone’s competent or not.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Well, that kid today
sure seemed competent.
He did land that flamboyant blow on you, Shinazugawa. He’s got potential.
Shinazugawa    Tsk…
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
The more the human
population increases, the harder it becomes to control and unify
them.
Not to mention that the times have changed
considerably in this era.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Other than those who’ve had their loved ones brutally massacred
and joined the Corps,
or those of distinguished pedigree who have hunted demons for generations, to
ask anyone to harness as much or even greater resolve and drive to produce results would be cruel.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Still,
considering that boy ran into a Twelve Kizuki so soon after joining the Corps… He may have the power to draw them! Even
we rarely get the chance to confront one! It makes me envious!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Agreed. But the fact that Lower
Five made such a drastic
move probably means that
Muzan is nowhere near Mt. Natagumo.
After all, as in the case of Asakusa,
whenever Muzan wishes
to hide something, he creates a clever diversion to throw us off.
It’s really quite frustrating.
But those demons are still freely
devouring humans, gaining
strength and surviving. For the sake of those who have died, there is only one thing for
us to do.
I believe that among you Hashiras who are present
today, I’ve assembled
the finest unit since the First Breathing swordsmen
of the feudal era.
Tengen Uzui,
Kyoujurou Rengoku, Shinobu Kochou, Mitsuri Kanroji, Muichirou Tokitou, Gyoumei Himejima,
Sanemi Shinazugawa, Obanai Iguro, Giyuu Tomioka… My children,
I look forward to your success.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Muzan Kibutsuji, I swear I’ll defeat you if it’s the last thing I do.
We will bring you down without
fail.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
Later
that night. Kagaya
sits alone in his room.

text: Be careful.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon
Slayer Corps Headquarters. Rengoku prepares to head off.

text:
No~!! I can’t possibly
take any more!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text:
We go through this every single
day!
You’re the most severely
injured, Zenitsu! Take your medicine
this second!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text:
Seriously…
Tanjirou, your medicine is right over there.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text:
Hey! Tanjirou’s medicine goes down easy, doesn’t
it? Right?! It’s different from mine, isn’t it?!
I call favoritism! I call favoritism!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text: Zenitsu, this is a hospital ward! Pipe down!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text: You seem to be doing well!
speaker: Murata
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text: Ah… Ahh! Murata!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text: Blegh!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu complains about his medicine.

text:
Well,
I came this close to getting melted away,
but I made it somehow. But I heard you guys
really got banged up.
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: It looks like it’s going to take some time.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
And Wild Boar Kid, in your case, was it the throat?
Huh? What’s the matter
with him?
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
He went through a lot. If you could
please let him be…
Murata      But for this guy of all people to be
so listless -- Zenitsu     Tanjirou!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Oh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Who is that person?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
He’s Murata.
He fought with us on Mt. Natagumo.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
I’m Murata! Nice to meet you!
Hey, your arm…
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
I almost got turned
into a spider, and my arms and legs are still short…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
And that’s
why you need to take this medicine!
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
Don’t come crying to me if your arms and legs don’t go back to normal!
Zenitsu
speaker:
But it tastes so gross! There’s only so much gross a
person can take! Aoi
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
You don’t know how good you have it. I mean, if
you take this medicine and get lots of
sunlight, there’ll be no lasting effects.
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: I can’t do it!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Gross is gross! No two ways about it!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Hehe… Looks like fun. Lucky you.
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
I
was summoned to the Hashira
Meeting to give my report on
the Mt. Natagumo incident, but it was like hell! Those
Hashiras are way too terrifying!
All pissed about
how the quality of the newer Slayers
has gone downhill…
because there were some of us
who didn’t follow orders on Mt. Natagumo. And they were like, “Who trained
them?”
What good would it do to ask someone
of my rank, anyway? Ugh…
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
Hashiras terrify
me!
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Hello!
speaker: Shinobu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Hashira! Lady Kochou!
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Oh, hello! Goodbye!
speaker: Murata
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
Oh my! Goodbye!
How is your recovery
coming along?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
I think we’re a lot better
now.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
Then, let’s have you start your Rehabilitation Training,
shall we?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Rehabilitation Training?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text: Forgive me for being weak…
speaker: Inosuke
scene: In the hospital room. Murata sits down near Tanjirou’s bed.

text:
Tanjirou and Inosuke were taken
away by the Hashira, Lady Kochou, and started something called
“Rehabilitation Training”.
Lady Shinobu’s voice is totally
unique. I don’t think I’ve ever heard anything
like it.
It lacks regularity, and it scares
me a little.
But when she was treating
the people who got turned
into spiders, she sure
seemed like a goddess. No wonder everyone ran to Lady Shinobu in tears.
Not only that, but she’s unbelievably cute! I bet she could
make a living on her looks alone.
So, this cute lady has taken Tanjirou and Inosuke to Rehabilitation Training
to rebuild their stamina. And
any minute now…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Two weeks later, at the Butterfly Mansion. Zenitsu sits alone in the hospital
room.

text: How did it go today?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Two weeks later, at the Butterfly Mansion. Zenitsu sits alone in the hospital
room.

text: What happened? What’s the matter? Hey…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Two weeks later, at the Butterfly Mansion. Zenitsu sits alone in the hospital
room.

text: Don’t mind us.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Two weeks later, at the Butterfly Mansion. Zenitsu sits alone in the hospital
room.

text:
You gotta tell me about it! I’ll be joining you a little
late starting tomorrow!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Two weeks later, at the Butterfly Mansion. Zenitsu sits alone in the hospital
room.

text: No~!!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Two weeks later, at the Butterfly Mansion. Zenitsu sits alone in the hospital
room.

text:
Scary! Scary! Scary!
I don’t wanna go!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
All right,
since you’ll be joining us from today,
Zenitsu, I’ll explain
the process again
now.
You’ll start over there.
Hmm!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
Those girls will make your bodies
limber again after having been bedridden for so long.
Hmm!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
Next, reflex
training.
These cups contain medicated
water.
The objective is to throw that medicated
water onto each other, but if your opponent
blocks your cup before you can pick it up, you can’t move that cup.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Go!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Mmph…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Again!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Ha!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
That’s it!
Last up, full-body training.
In simpler
terms, you’ll be playing tag. You’ll be up against
myself, Aoi, and Kanao over there.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Excuse me. May I ask you something?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
Hm? Is there something
that’s not clear to you?
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Not going.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
Just shut up and come with me like I said!
Erk…!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: Come on!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text: What the hell are you doing?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
The next day, at the Butterfly
Manor. Inosuke and Tanjirou walk through the halls with Zenitsu
clinging to Tanjirou’s shirt.

text:
Sit up straight! I said sit up straight!
You miserable bastards!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
What did you say?!
What were you thinking, Zenitsu?! Tell Inosuke
you’re sorry!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
Huh?! You guys say you’re sorry!
Apologize to me! How dare you act like you’d
come back from hell when you were in heaven!
All you did was frolic with girls all day, so why did you look so haggard?!
Get down on your hands and knees and apologize! Commit
ritualistic suicide!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text: How can you say such a thing?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
Shut up, you goody-goody talking forehead! Just shut up and listen,
got that?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
You’re allowed
to touch girls! You get to have your bodies
massaged! When you play that cup game, you get to touch their
hands! When you play tag, you get to touch their whole freakin’ bodies!
Each girl has two boobs, one behind, and two thighs! They smell so nice when they pass
by, and it’s mad fun just to look at them!
Ahhh!! Heaven! Sheer heaven!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
Cut the crap! You’re
not making any sense! When you lose to someone
smaller than you, it destroys your soul!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
Oh, poor you! Inosuke,
you’ve never been chummy with a girl before, right?!
Right, you were raised in the
mountains! No wonder you’re a late bloomer! Ahh! I feel so sorry
for you!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
Grrr!
What?! Oh please, I’ve stomped on female kids before!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text:
That’s the worst thing you could
do!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside the butterfly manor.
Zenitsu yells at Tanjirou and Inosuke.

text: Not good, no good! That’s not gonna get you any girls!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Inside
the Butterfly Manor.
Aoi, Kanao, Kiyo,
Naho, and Sumi listen to the trio outside.

text:
What?! I can get as many girls
as I want!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Inside
the Butterfly Manor.
Aoi, Kanao, Kiyo,
Naho, and Sumi listen to the trio outside.

text:
Please train me well! Hehehehe~!
Hmm!
Mmm!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text:
Hehehe!
Mmm!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text: Hehehehe! It’s all good! All good!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text:
That guy has what it takes. I’m always
fighting back tears from the pain, but he’s
laughing.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text: I shall take you on.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text: Begin!
speaker: Naho
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text:
I would never splash
tea on a girl.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text: Hehehe!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Back inside the Butterfly Manor.
Zenitsu eagerly awaits his training.

text: Now then, full-body training! Begin!
speaker: Naho
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text: I win!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text:
I won the battle
but lost the war!
Inosuke     I’m gonna kick some butt, too! Tanjirou    Ah…!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text: All right!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text: Ouch!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text:
I’m the only one on a losing
streak and soaked.
How embarrassing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text:
But… I just can’t beat Kanao.
None of us can get to her cup before her or grab it away from her.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text:
For the next five days, I continued
to lose to Kanao.
So
did Inosuke… and Zenitsu. We couldn’t so much as lay a finger on a strand of her hair. And then one day, the other two stopped
coming to the training room.
Z-Zenitsu?
Inosuke? Ahh… Please train me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi faces
off against Zenitsu
for full-body training.

text: Thank you for the good workout…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Why can’t I beat her? What gives her the edge over me?
First of all,
her reflexes are way faster.
Even if I were at 100 percent,
I’d probably lose to her.
Her scent is totally different. It’s similar to the scent
of the Hashiras.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text: Master Tanjirou?
speaker: Sumi
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text: Also… her eyes? Her eyes are different…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text: Master Tanjirou? Tanjirou    (Thoughts) … it seems. Sumi
speaker: Sumi
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text: Oh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Master Tanjirou,
are you all right? We’ve
been calling you over and over.
speaker: Sumi
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Sorry! I didn’t hear you. What’s
up?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text: Here’s a towel for you.
speaker: Sumi
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Wow! Thanks! That’s a big help!
You’re all so kind!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Um, Master Tanjirou, do you maintain
the Total Concentration Breathing state around
the clock?
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Morning, noon, and night,
and all throughout the night while
you’re asleep. Do you use the Total Concentration Breathing
technique nonstop?
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
No, I don’t. I’ve never done
that.
Is that even possible?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text: Yes! We’re told that being able to do that makes all the difference in the world!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Even just using that technique for a short time really
takes its toll on me, but I should
do it around the clock, huh?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Some people have already
mastered it.
speaker: Naho
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
All of the Hashiras
and Miss Kanao!
Please work hard at it!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
I see!
Thanks! I’ll give it a try!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
at the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou
has finished his training.

text:
Isn’t it about time you came to training,
Inosuke?
Sulking and feeling sorry for yourself
won’t do you any good. Zenitsu, you should come, too!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu sits on his bed and Inosuke lies in his while Tanjirou
prepares to go out.

text:
Yes. For me, that was a good job!
Just tell them my injury’s taken a turn for the worse!
Hey, Kakushi lady over there! Would you like to have some tea with me?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor. Zenitsu sits on his bed and Inosuke lies in his while Tanjirou
prepares to go out.

text:
Total
Concentration Breathing. Morning,
noon, and night.
Even while I’m asleep, I said I’d try to keep it up
around the clock, but…
… I can’t do it at all! I can’t do it!
If I try to do Total Concentration Breathing longer, it makes me feel like I’m gonna die!
It’s too painful! My lungs hurt! My ears hurt! My ears are ringing
like crazy! (Thoughts) My
eardrums!
That scared
the heck out of me! For
a second there,
I thought my heart had burst through my ears!
I’ll never make it at this rate! When you’re in trouble, go back to basics!
You spineless fool!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Out in the courtyard. Tanjirou practices his breathing.

text:
Breathing is all about the lungs.
If I can’t get the hang of it, that means my
lungs are too weak.
Work at it! All I can do is work hard! That’s
the story of my life!
Hard work is the sum of daily efforts! It can be one step at a time! Move forward!
Right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Out in the courtyard. Tanjirou practices his breathing.

text:
Master Tanjirou
is working hard every day!
speaker: Kiyo
scene: Out in the courtyard. Tanjirou practices his breathing.

text: Yes! Let’s bring him some rice balls, okay?
speaker: Sumi
scene: Out in the courtyard. Tanjirou practices his breathing.

text: Good idea! And also…
speaker: Naho
scene: Out in the courtyard. Tanjirou practices his breathing.

text: Blow into these gourds?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
That’s right.
Whenever she trained
Lady Kanao, Lady Shinobu often
had her blow into
gourds.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
Oh, really?
That’s a neat training
technique, huh? So, you make some sort of sound?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
Oh, no. She blew into it to make the gourd
explode.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
Oh, really?
Explode?
What? You mean this?!
Something this hard?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
Yes! Not to mention,
this is a special kind of gourd,
so it’s harder than normal
ones.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text: A girl that petite was able to do that something that hard?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
The gourds get bigger
and bigger as you progress. The one that Lady Kanao can explode
right now…
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text: … is this gourd.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text: Gigantic! I’ll give it my all!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou with two gourds.

text:
They’re not coming today,
either?
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, in the training
room. Tanjirou meets with Aoi.

text: I’m sorry. I’ll bring them tomorrow. I’m sorry.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next day, in the training
room. Tanjirou meets with Aoi.

text:
No, you don’t have to concern
yourself with those two anymore!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
The next day, in the training
room. Tanjirou meets with Aoi.

text: I’ll work hard.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next day, in the training
room. Tanjirou meets with Aoi.

text: I’ll work hard!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next day, in the training
room. Tanjirou meets with Aoi.

text:
While
throwing myself into the drills
that Mr. Urokodaki pounded into me, I’m
also maintaining my Total Concentration Breathing state.
Imagining
I’m running down a mountain, I race all around the mansion’s
garden! All of the obstacles are stand-ins for the trees on that mountain!
Hard work! Urahhh!
Hard work! Hard work! Hard work!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Over the next few days. Tanjirou
continues his rehabilitation.

text:
I’ve regained most of my stamina.
And now, I can run farther than I did before,
and my lungs are getting stronger! I’m making good progress!
During the day, I run all over the place and put my lungs into overdrive with swift moves, so now, I’ll breathe slowly.
I’ll take slow, deep breaths and send air
all the way to my fingertips.
Meditation boosts concentration. Mr. Urokodaki said so himself. (Thoughts) Mr. Urokodaki…
Haganezuka    (Imagination) How dare you break my
sword!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Please forgive me.
They’re reforging my sword for me now, but I’m really, really sorry. (Thoughts) Concentrate! You need to concentrate! Concentrate on your breathing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: Yoo-hoo… Yoo-hoo! Yoo-hoo… Yoo-hoo!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
I can see you’re
working very hard.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Even though your friends
went off somewhere…
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Don’t you feel lonely
all by yourself?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: No! Because once I’ve mastered it myself, I can teach them, too!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
You have a beautiful
soul, don’t you?
Um… Why did you bring us all here?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Nezuko’s existence
has been officially acknowledged, and the three of you were injured
so seriously.
And also, I’d like to entrust
my dream to you.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Dream?
My dream
that we can become friends
with the demons.
I’m quite sure you can accomplish that.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: Are you angry?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
For some reason, I’m always picking
up an angry scent from you even though you’re always smiling.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Yes… You’re right. It might be true that I’m in a constant
state of anger.
Ever since my
beloved older sister was slaughtered by a demon, every time I see the tears of those who’ve lost their
loved ones to a demon,
every time I hear those cries of despair… the anger keeps building up
inside me and continues to swell.
Deep down in the innermost depths
of my body, there’s a revulsion that I can’t fight. I’m sure the other Hashiras feel something similar, as well.
Well, this time,
they saw Nezuko, who’s never devoured a human, with their own eyes, and they’ve
memorized her presence. Out of respect
for the Master’s
wishes, I don’t think
anyone will raise a hand to her.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
My older
sister was a kind-hearted person like you. She had sympathy for demons. Even when she was on the brink of death,
she still felt pity for them.
I couldn’t
bring myself to feel that way. How can you feel sorry
for something that’s
killed humans? I’ve never heard of anything so absurd.
But if that was
how my sister truly felt, then I must carry it on. If there’s a way not to kill
these pitiful demons, I have to keep trying to come up with it… without ever extinguishing
the smile that my sister said she loved.
Sister…
Sister! Sister!! But now, I’m
a bit exhausted.
Demons do nothing but lie. Losing
all reason out of self-preservation, they murder humans
with their instincts laid totally bare.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Tanjirou, please do all that you can. Please find a way to protect Nezuko until the end.
Knowing that you’re working
so hard in my place reassures me to no end. I can rest easy now.
Your Total Concentration Breathing
has come to a halt.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
I’ll work hard at it!
Total Concentration Breathing!
Mother,
Hanako… Takeo, Shigeru,
Rokuta… Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
I’m going to turn Nezuko
back into a human for sure!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: Naho! Kiyo! Sumi!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi are hanging the laundry.

text:
I’d like you to help me train.
If I stop doing Total Concentration Breathing while I’m asleep, can you clobber
me with these carpet beaters?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi are hanging the laundry.

text:
Please help me!
Ahh… Very well!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi are hanging the laundry.

text: Thank you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Manor.
Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi are hanging the laundry.

text: It’s all good, right?
speaker: Naho
scene:
At night. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
sleep soundly. Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi watch
Tanjirou.

text: Master Tanjirou’s doing a good job!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
At night. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
sleep soundly. Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi watch
Tanjirou.

text: Ah!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou,
Zenitsu, and Inosuke
sleep soundly. Kiyo, Naho, and Sumi watch
Tanjirou.

text:
I’m a spineless fool… Please let me try
again!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou bows to Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho.

text:
If you please!
Give it all you’ve
got!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou bows to Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho.

text:
This time, for sure!
One more time please!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou bows to Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho.

text:
I’ll give them another
nudge later!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning.
Tanjirou goes to practice with Aoi.

text:
Ngh… Ugh… Urgh…
I’m starting to get used to training
while doing Total Concentration Breathing!
Although I can’t sustain it all day unless I really get myself pumped up, the
longer that I can keep doing Total Concentration Breathing, the bigger the stamina boost I
get!
You can do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning.
Tanjirou goes to practice with Aoi.

text:
Hey, I can chase after her! I’m able to chase right after that girl! I can keep up
with her!
Ouch, ouch, ouch…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the training room.
Tanjirou practices with Kanao.

text: Ah… Hmph.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the late evening.
Tanjirou finishes his training for the day.

text: Zenitsu! Inosuke!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late evening.
Tanjirou finishes his training for the day.

text:
I refuse to get
involved.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the late evening.
Tanjirou finishes his training for the day.

text:
Mmph!!
You can do it! You can do it! You can do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath and blows into the gourd.

text: Mmmph!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath and blows into the gourd.

text:
It broke!
Yay~!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath and blows into the gourd.

text: Now all you have to break is this huge gourd!
speaker: Naho
scene:
A new day. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath and blows into the gourd.

text:
I did it! Just a little
more! Thanks, all of
you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath and blows into the gourd.

text: Oh, crap.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath and blows into the gourd.

text: Ngh… Ngh… Mm…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text:
So, Tanjirou’s already
gone off to train. Jeez, it’s the crack of dawn.
Putting in effort isn’t my thing. There’s
nothing more draining
than persevering every day.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text:
Oh, it’s you.
Maybe getting
left behind by Tanjirou is making me panic, but I can’t
get the hang of anything
even if he shows me for hours.
Now I realize that we’re a total lost cause.
Wait, did you just say, “Yes,
you are”? How can you be so cruel? Would it kill you to say
just once, “You’re working hard, too”?
Did you just say, “Work harder”?
Haa… I guess there’s no way out of
it.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text: Gross!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text: Come on, Monitsu.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text:
What Tanjirou is trying to master
is a skill called “Total
Concentration, Constant”.
By continuing to do Total Concentration Breathing
every second of the day, your
basic stamina level will skyrocket.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak
with Shinobu.

text:
Heh… Let’s just go ahead and try it!
Impossible!! Seriously
impossible!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak
with Shinobu.

text:
I still
can’t sustain Total Concentration Breathing all day unless
I really throw myself into it, but I bet you two can do it!
You just go
like this to make your lungs expand!
When that rattles
your blood, your bones
and muscles will go “Boom, boom”, and you gotta stop it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
All that’s left to do is train like
crazy!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Now, now. We’re talking
about a basic skill, or should I say a beginner skill,
so why wouldn’t you be able
to do it? But it’s also true that one must put great effort into mastering it,
right?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: Ah… Mm…
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: Well, why wouldn’t you be able to do it, though?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
I
was sure it would be child’s
play for you, Inosuke. Are you sure you can’t do it? Even
though there’s no reason you can’t do it?
It can’t be helped, then, if you can’t do it.
Can’t be helped, can’t be helped.
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Ugh… Ngh…
Huh?! I can do it,
all right! Why wouldn’t I?! Don’t mess with me, or I swear I’ll rip off your
breasts!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Please give it your all, Zenitsu!
I’m your biggest
cheerleader!
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: Yes, ma’am!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: Wow! Hahaha!
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Kanao, you’re in the same class,
so why don’t you join them?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: More! More! Boom! Boom! Boom!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: You damn wimp!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Boom!!
Yeah! You got this, Zenitsu!
It hurts… I’m hungry… I’m sad… I feel hopeless…
I’m in agony… I’m lonely…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
That was my life. But then,
one day, I heard a sound like a snap… and I never
knew pain again.
speaker: Kanao
scene:
In the past. A young Kanao
is beaten by her father.

text:
I never knew pain again.
While living in poverty, even when my parents sold me,
it didn’t make me feel
sad.
speaker: Kanao
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Excuse me, do you have a minute?
speaker: Kanae
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Could you tell us why that child is all tied up? Is she a criminal, perhaps?
speaker: Kanae
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text:
Isn’t
it obvious? She’s flea-ridden, and her face is dirty.
Not to mention, she might try to escape.
speaker: Owner
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text:
Hello, there. Nice to meet you.
My name is Kanao Kochou. What’s
your name?
speaker: Kanae
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text:
She’s got no name, all right?
Her parents never gave her
one.
Happy now? Get away from her.
speaker: Owner
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Wha…!
speaker: Owner
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Please don’t touch my sister.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: What’s your problem, you two?! If you wanna talk to this kid, pay up!
speaker: Owner
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: All right, then, we’ll purchase her. Would this be enough?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Hey! Come back here, dammit!
speaker: Owner
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text:
I’d pick it up right now if I were you! After all, there’s a crowd here,
and the wind is strong!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Ahh, are you sure about this?
speaker: Kanae
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: It’s fine!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Please excuse us!
speaker: Kanae
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Hands off! It’s my property!
speaker: Owner
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Oh my, oh my.
speaker: Kanae
scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Sister! Sister! Sister, this child is hopeless!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text:
She can’t
do anything without
being told! That goes for meals, as well! She won’t touch her food unless I tell her to eat!
Even as her stomach growls and growls!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text:
What exactly are we going to do with
her?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text:
Now, now, don’t be like that, okay? I just love that smile of yours,
Shinobu.
But we can’t do anything with a kid who can’t even think for herself!
It’s dangerous!
speaker: Kanae
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text: Well, you do have a point.
speaker: Kanae
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text:
She can’t do anything
on her own! She can’t
decide for herself!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text:
All right, when you’re on your own, you can decide by flipping
this coin. Right,
Kanao?
speaker: Kanae
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text: Sister!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text: You don’t have to take this so seriously, you know, since Kanao is so adorable!
speaker: Kanae
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text: That’s not a good reason!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text:
As long as it’s given a chance, a person’s soul will open up,
so don’t worry. When you fall
in love with some boy someday, you’ll change too, Kanao.
speaker: Kanae
scene:
At the Kochou
manor. Shinobu cleans
Kanao up and goes to Kanae

text: You’re doing great! Keep it up!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Kanao
looks at the coin in her hand.

text:
Right now! Harder! Bam! That’s it! You can do it, Zenitsu!
You’ve got this! Looking
good!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Kanao
looks at the coin in her hand.

text:
Inosuke! Inosuke!
They’ll be bringing our reforged Nichirin
swords soon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: For real?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text:
Yeah! I just heard
it now from the crow!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: That’s Mr. Haganezuka’s scent!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: Yahoo!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: Let’s go! Let’s go!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: Yeah! Yahoo!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: Mr. Haganezuka! Hey! Hey! Mr. Haganezuka!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: Long time no see!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: How have you been…?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text:
M-Mr. Haganezuka?
Haganezuka    How dare you snap my sword in two… You’ve
got a lot of nerve!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text:
I’m sorry!
B-But to be honest, I came this close to being killed!
My opponent was insanely
strong!
Haganezuka    Not true! That has nothing
to do with it! You’re
the one to blame! It’s all your fault!
You’re pitifully weak! That’s why it broke!
Otherwise, my sword would never snap like that!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text:
But…
Haganezuka    I’m going to kill you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text: Is that a new training regimen?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text:
Probably not.
Kanamori         Well, Mr. Haganezuka is a very passionate man.
Kanamori         He loves his swords
more than anyone.
There’s no one like him even in the sword- forgers’ homeland.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Sometime later.
A Kasugai crow goes to Tanjirou.

text:
You’re probably right.
Haganezuka    Grrr…
Kanamori         Oh, my name is Kanamori. I was the one who forged Master Inosuke’s swords.
I would be thrilled
if they prove useful in battle.
Kanamori         Ahh,
beautiful, aren’t they? The dull sheen of that indigo-grey hue is so cool.
It’s a fine color for a sword.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text:
I’m happy for you, Inosuke, since your sword was chipped
all over.
Kanamori         How do you like the grips? The thing is, this is the first time I’ve ever forged swords for
dual-wielders.
Kanamori         Master Inosuke?
Kanamori         Hm?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text:
Ngh… Grr!
Kanamori         Gahhh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text:
Better.
Kanamori         I’ll kill you, you miserable brat!
You bastard!
Are you flaunting
it?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text: We’re sorry! We’re sorry!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text: Hmph…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text:
Ngh! Ngh! Ngh!
Kanamori         Bastard! That’s it! You’re a dead man!
Kanamori         Unbelievable! He’s unbelievable!
Kanamori         Taking a stone to those swords?
Unbelievable!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Inside the Butterfly Manor.
Kanamori sits with Tanjirou. Haganezuka lounges to the side while Insouke sits on the veranda.

text: We’re sorry!
speaker: Tanjirou

Haganezuka and Kanamori

text: Looks like he’ll be fine.
speaker: Naho
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou sleeps soundly
as Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho watch.

text:
After all, Master Tanjirou
was really giving
it his all!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou sleeps soundly
as Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho watch.

text: Let’s make him some rice balls again!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou sleeps soundly
as Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho watch.

text:
My body’s changed!
I can’t wait to swing my sword with these hands! My Nichirin sword!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: I did it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: Good move! You can do it!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text:
Urahh! Don’t let up for a second!
You can do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text:
I did it!
Go!!
This medicated water stinks. It would be cruel to splash her with it.
Ah! Urk…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: He won!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: Does that count as winning?
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: Either way, it’s the same thing!
speaker: Naho
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: Yeah! I did it! I did it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: Ngh… Urahh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou continues his rehabilitation training
with Kanao.

text: All right! Open up!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
Okay! Looks like your jaw is as good as new! All right,
you can close your mouth
now.
That concludes
this exam. Since you’re physically sound now, you may take on your missions without any misgivings.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: So I’m done with my training?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Yes. All that’s left for you now is actual combat.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
Right!
Oh, before I forget,
Lady Shinobu… There’s
something I wanted to ask you.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: What would that be?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Have you ever heard of the Hinokami Kagura Dance?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: I have not.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Huh?! Uh, w-well then, how about Fire Breathing?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Never heard of it.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
Hiih!
A-Actually, this is something
that happened during
my childhood.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Yes, yes.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
I see. So, for some reason,
Tanjirou, your father
used Fire Breathing.
All I can tell you is that while Flame Breathing
does exist, it’s not Fire Breathing.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Huh? They’re not the same thing?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
I’m not familiar with the details
myself… Please forgive
me. But I do know that they’re very strict about the exact
phrasing.
“Flame
Breathing” must never be
referred to as “Fire Breathing”. The Flame Hashira,
Rengoku, might know something about this, but unfortunately, he is out on a mission.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
Understood!
Thank you for all that you’ve taught
me. I’ll ask Mr. Rengoku
if I ever get a chance to see him again.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Right.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Now then, please excuse me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text:
I’m expecting great things
of you.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: Ah… Right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
A new day. Shinobu
examines Tanjirou.

text: She’s been asleep all day again today.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou goes to Nezuko’s room. Nezuko is asleep.

text:
I
know they said you could be sleeping
to recover your stamina, but it does worry me if
you don’t open your eyes once in a while.
Hey, I’ll probably be leaving this place soon to go on my next mission.
I’ve healed
physically and I’ve gotten a little stronger, too. And I’m still doing
Total Concentration, Constant right now.
I think Zenitsu and Inosuke will be with me, too. Having those two by my side gives me confidence.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou goes to Nezuko’s room. Nezuko is asleep.

text:
I see… You think
so, too, Nezuko?
They’re both good guys.
To turn you back into a human, I gotta bring
down the strongest demons that I can and
send Miss Tamayo their blood samples.
Am I capable
of doing that?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou goes to Nezuko’s room. Nezuko is asleep.

text: I know you can do it, Big Brother.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou goes to Nezuko’s room. Nezuko is asleep.

text:
Thanks, Nezuko. You just encouraged me, didn’t you? I’ll try my hardest,
all right?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou goes to Nezuko’s room. Nezuko is asleep.

text: Amazing…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: Look at them go…
speaker: Inosuke
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: That’s it!
speaker: Aoi
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: Phew… You sure are fast, Kanao!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text:
Your record
is now ten wins and ten losses.
speaker: Aoi
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text:
I’m totally not done
yet.
Let’s go for a run. Are you up to it?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: You mean while doing Total Concentration, Constant?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: Keep this up the whole time?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: Monjirou!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: That’s nothing!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text: Ngh… You’re all brawn and no brains!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: At the Butterfly Manor. Tanjirou does his reflex training with Kanao.

text:
Well, let’s see…
Ahh… This is like a dream for me. To
die by your hand in person, and I
so enjoyed hearing the other demons’
last gasps!
I feel so blessed…
Because I love to see others in despair and agony.
Because it’s like a dream come true
for me! I thank you for leaving me for last!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Ugh! Gah…
What’s
this? I see something! It’s gushing into me along with Master
Muzan’s blood…
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Fufu… Fufufu… If I kill the Hashira and this kid, I can get more blood! It’s like a dream!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: It’s morning! Wake up!
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the present, at the Butterfly Manor. A Kasugai
crow flies to the window.

text: What the heck?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the present, at the Butterfly Manor. A Kasugai
crow flies to the window.

text: Huh? What’s going on?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present, at the Butterfly Manor. A Kasugai
crow flies to the window.

text:
The casualties of the Infinite Train are increasing.
More than 40 are now missing. You are to join Kyoujurou Rengoku
on site. Head west at once!
speaker: Crow
scene:
In the present, at the Butterfly Manor. A Kasugai
crow flies to the window.

text:
I have decided to send Tanjirou
and the others
on the Infinite Train mission.
Shinobu, may I ask what made you recommend Tanjirou?
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Tanjirou has a pure soul and is capable
of striving hard on a daily basis.
And the upside that he showed exceeded my expectations.
Above all else, he has a clear goal in mind. To defeat
Kibutsuji.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
As far as that goes, I’m in agreement
with you.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Also, Tanjirou himself told me that his father
had used the Fire Breathing
technique.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text: Oh?
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
At
this time, there’s no denying
that he still has a way to go, but perhaps Rengoku,
the Flame Hashira, might be able to provide some guidance.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Yes. Considering his sister, who won’t devour humans even after becoming
a demon, as well as his encounter with Kibutsuji,
it might very well be Tanjirou’s destiny.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text: All right, time to go!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

text:
Oh? Someone’s coming.
He
bumped into me even though I got out of the way. (Thoughts) Huh? That guy just now… Was he at the Final Selection? (Thoughts) He got such an
amazing build in such a short time. (Thoughts) But I wonder why… his scent…
Long time no see! Glad to see you’re
doing well!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

text:
Is that so? You’re
heading out now?
It was only for a short time,
but I’m glad we got to spend
that time together. Good luck to you.
Take care.
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
Thank you so much for looking
out for us when you were so busy! Thanks
to you, we can go back into
battle!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
No need to thank me.
After all, I
survived the Final Selection only by luck. And then I was too afraid to go into
battle. I’m a coward.
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text: Hey, that doesn’t matter.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
Since you helped me out, Miss Aoi, you’re
part of me now. And
I’m carrying all of your emotions onto the battlefield with
me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
All right! Look after me if I get hurt again,
okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
Hey! There you are!
Kanao!
We’re heading out now. Thanks for everything!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Oh! What’s that?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
All I did was follow the Master’s orders.
There’s no need for you to thank me. Farewell.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Hey, she talked
to me!
What was that you just flipped?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Farewell.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Money? It says “heads”
and “tails”, huh? Why did you flip it?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
You really
made it twirl
around!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
I flip this to decide what I haven’t
been ordered to do. I just decided
whether or not to
speak with you.
“Don’t speak” was heads, and “speak”
was tails. Because
it came up tails, I spoke to you.
Farewell.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Why don’t you decide
for yourself? What did you want to do, Kanao? Kanao        It doesn’t matter.
Nothing matters to me,
so I can’t decide for myself. Tanjirou I don’t think there’s anything in this
world that doesn’t matter.
I guess…
the voice in your heart is really
tiny.
Hmm… Sure, following orders
is important, but… Ah! Hey, can I borrow that for a
second?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Huh? Yes…
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Thanks!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Okay! Let’s
toss this to
decide!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Decide what?
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Whether or not… you’re
going to listen
hard to the voice in your own heart from now on!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Ahh! I flipped it too high!
Heads! Let’s make it heads! If it comes
up heads, Kanao, you’re going to follow
your heart!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Ah! Huh? Where did it go? Ahh!
Oh, is that it? Ngh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Got it! Got it,
Kanao!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Ready, Kanao?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Which is it? His back was blocking
it, so I couldn’t see it the moment it fell.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
It’s heads!
Kanao!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Good luck!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
It’s the heart that drives people.
So, your heart can grow as strong
as you want it to!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: All right! See you again someday!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: H-How did you make it come up heads?
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
I saw his hand when he flipped
it. I’m sure he didn’t
cheat.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Just by chance. And if it was tails,
I was going to keep tossing it over and over until it
came up heads! Hehehe!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Take care!
You can do it! You can do it! You can do it!
Yay!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Here you go.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
Don’t eat it now!
Kiyo, Sumi,      Please go out and defeat tons of demons.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: We’ll do our best.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: I told you not to eat it now!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: Don’t tell me to shut up!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: Mr. Tomioka!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: Are you heading into battle now?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: I hear that you’ve mastered Total Concentration, Constant.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
You should keep at it.
Mr. Tomioka… About Nezuko…
Thank you very much.
I had no idea you were putting
your life on the line. I just don’t know how I can ever thank
you.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
You can thank me by doing good work.
Our mission as Demon Slayers is to kill demons. That’s
all.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
Right!
Wahh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: Take care, you guys!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
You’re all heartbroken to say goodbye
to me, aren’t you? I can stay behind if you want!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
Master Zenitsu,
please try to learn how to be considerate and respectful of girls.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: Right…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: I’m feeling giddy.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
But you do feel a little
sad that I’m leaving, don’t you?!
We are not sad!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text: Okay! You guys! We’re heading out now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Kiyo, Sumi, and Naho present
Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
with large gourds. The three boys blow into the
gourds.

text:
Hey… Hey! Hey!
Wha… Wh-Wha… What the hell is this creature?!
I bet this is that thing!
The master of this land! The ruler of this land!
See how long it is? So intimidating! No mistake! It looks like it’s asleep
right now, but don’t let your guard down!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the late evening, at the train station. Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
prepare to board the
Infinite Train.

text:
Uh, no, it’s a train. Haven’t
you ever seen one before?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the late evening, at the train station. Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
prepare to board the
Infinite Train.

text: Shush! Calm down! I’ll lead the charge!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the late evening, at the train station. Tanjirou, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
prepare to board the
Infinite Train.

text: Hold up, Inosuke!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

text: Hey! You stop that right now!
speaker: Hanako
scene:

text:
Falling deeper
into sleep, deep in their dreams…
Forget to breathe, deep in their dreams…
And even if a demon comes,
deep in their dreams… Even in
their stomachs, deep in their dreams…
It looks like fun. You’re starting
to have a happy dream, aren’t you? Fufu… You are falling… You are
falling… into a dream.
It’s a deep slumber.
They can… no longer awaken.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On top of the Mugen Train.
Enmu continues to contemplate.

text:
All you have to do is destroy the spiritual core. You can just kill them like that!
All human
hearts are the same. So fragile and weak, like glasswork.
You are falling… You are falling… into a dream.

text:
It’s a deep slumber.
They can… no longer
awaken.

The dream world I show them isn’t

with the dreamer in its center.
The realm of the subconscious exists just outside

That’s
what you must destroy. Do that, and the dreamer
will become crippled.

What a strong survival instinct

Fight! Fight!!
