text:
Ahh…
I wish I could stay here… forever. (Thoughts)
I wish I could turn around and go back.
By rights, I should’ve been living like this forever.
Right here.
If none of this had happened… they’d all have been alive and well now.
And Nezuko would’ve lived in the sunlight, under the blue sky.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In Tanjirou’s dream. Nezuko’s fire appears on Tanjirou’s wrist.

text:
If none of this had happened… If none of this had happened… I should
be here making charcoal every day. I never would’ve laid a hand on a
sword!
If none of this had happened… If none of this had happened…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In Tanjirou’s dream. Nezuko’s fire appears on Tanjirou’s wrist.

text: Ah… Mm… Ahh…
speaker: Rokuta

text: But I’ve lost them now. I can never go back!

scene: In Tanjirou’s dream. Nezuko’s fire appears on Tanjirou’s wrist.

text:
Big Bro! Don’t leave

Ngh… Ah…

text:
Sorry… I’m sorry,
Rokuta!
We can’t be together anymore.
But I’ll always
be thinking of you, okay? I’ll be thinking of you all!
There are lots of things
to thank you for. Lots of things
to be sorry for!
But I will never forget
you! No matter
what, my heart
will always be with you! So please… forgive me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In Tanjirou’s dream. Nezuko’s fire appears on Tanjirou’s wrist.

text:
I have to destroy
his spiritual core right away.
So this is the inside
of his heart?
How can it be so beautiful? It’s so endlessly
vast and… also warm.
speaker: Boy
scene: In Tanjirou’s dream. Nezuko’s fire appears on Tanjirou’s wrist.

text:
They’re having
trouble, aren’t they?
I wonder why.
They haven’t destroyed any of the spiritual cores yet. Oh well… I guess it doesn’t matter,
since they’re buying
me some time.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On top of the Mugen Train.
Enmu turns toward
the back of the train.

text:
Not here. But I can smell a demon, faintly.
What’s this, though?
It’s like there’s
a film over everything!
There’s a faint demon scent everywhere! I can’t tell the exact location! I have to hurry! Nezuko
is bleeding! If everyone else is asleep,
we’re in big trouble!
(Thoughts) What should I do?
Am I unable to use Total Concentration Breathing now?
Am I just asleep right now?
Tanjuurou        Tanjirou…
Tanjuurou        Take up your sword.
There’s something you must cut.
There’s something… I must cut.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s dream.
Tanjirou trudges through
the snow.

text:
There’s
something I must cut… in order to wake up. (Thoughts) I think I know what it is.
But what if I’m wrong?
If what happens
in this dream has an effect
on reality, too… there’ll be no
going back.
Don’t hesitate! Do it! You have to do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s dream.
Tanjirou trudges through
the snow.

text:
My death in this dream
will lead me to reality!
In other words…
what I have to cut is… my own neck!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s dream.
Tanjirou trudges through
the snow.

text: There’s something… I must cut.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

Tanjirou searches for a way out of the dream in a
forest.

text:
There’s
something I must cut… in order to wake up. (Thoughts) I think I know what it is.
Don’t hesitate! Do it! You have to do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s dream.
Tanjirou searches for a way out of the dream in a
forest.

text:
You must be the incarnations of this boy’s
soul.
The air is so clear, and it feels
good.

recruit toward his spiritual
core.

In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Fragments of Tanjirou’s soul lead Enmu’s
recruit toward his spiritual
core.

In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Fragments of Tanjirou’s soul lead Enmu’s
recruit toward his spiritual
core.

In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Fragments of Tanjirou’s soul lead Enmu’s
recruit toward his spiritual
core.

text: Ngh… Ah…
speaker: Boy

text:

Haa… What’s with this realm of the subconscious?

naked boar… Seriously, this is insane.
What are you doing in the realm of the subconscious?! You stupid naked boar!
Eek… Eeeh!
speaker: Girl

Ngh… It’s pitch-black.
It’s
pitch-black, and I can’t see a thing… Dammit… What’s with that blond brat’s realm of subconscious?
Do I have to grope around to find his spiritual core? You must be kidding
me.

Nezuko!!

Zenitsu… Inosuke… Rengoku!
Who are these people?
They’re

text:

Ngh! If we don’t chop this demon’s head off soon,
we won’t be able to make it!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: At the front of the train. Tanjirou hangs on to the side.

text: I know! Let’s get moving!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At the front of the train. Tanjirou hangs on to the side.

text:
Inosuke! Synchronize your breathing
with mine.
Let’s chop off the demon’s head. Let’s attack together!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At the front of the train. Tanjirou hangs on to the side.

text: No good! If I fall asleep now…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At the front of the train. Tanjirou hangs on to the side.

text:
Damn you!
Come on! Follow me!
Beast Breathing, Fourth Fang! Slice and Dice!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: At the front of the train. Tanjirou hangs on to the side.

text:
Father, please protect
me!
I’m going to sever that bone… with this blow! (Thoughts) Hinokami Kagura… Clear
Blue Sky!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At the front of the train. Tanjirou hangs on to the side.

text:
Urgh… Ngh…
Conductor       Gah!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train.
Inosuke is preparing to destroy Enmu’s main body. The train conductor
runs down toward Inosuke with an ice pick.

text: I’m okay…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train.
Inosuke is preparing to destroy Enmu’s main body. The train conductor
runs down toward Inosuke with an ice pick.

text: Not good! If I fall asleep now…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train.
Inosuke is preparing to destroy Enmu’s main body. The train conductor
runs down toward Inosuke with an ice pick.

text:
Damn you!
Come on! Follow me!
Beast Breathing, Fourth Fang… Slice ‘n Dice!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train.
Inosuke is preparing to destroy Enmu’s main body. The train conductor
runs down toward Inosuke with an ice pick.

text: Hinokami Kagura… Clear Blue Sky!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Ah… Ahhhh!!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Because of its screams
and tremors, the train is turning over!
Inosuke, are you… Gah!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Ah! Hey, is your belly okay?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Y-Yeah! Inosuke, protect the passen --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
I can’t die. If I die, that’ll
make him a murderer!
(Thoughts) I can’t die!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: I don’t want to let anyone die!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Gah! Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Ahhh! Woah! Wha… Gah!
Ah… Are you okay, Santarou?!
Hang in there!
I was lucky I could bounce off the demon’s
flesh! Cool, huh?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Is your belly okay?!
Your belly that got stabbed!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: I’m… all right. What about you?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Never felt better! I didn’t even catch a cold!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
I won’t be able to move… for a while.
Help the others, will
you?
Was anyone injured? What about the engineer near the head?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: It’s okay if that bastard dies!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: It’s not okay…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Ngh… He’s the one who stabbed
you in the belly, remember?! He’s got his leg stuck and can’t move!
His leg’s shattered, and he can’t walk anymore!
Just leave him there, and he’ll die!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Then he’s already atoned
for his sin. Help him, will you?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Please…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Hmph! I’ll go for you, then! Because I’m the boss! Because my minion asked
me to!
After I rescue him, I’m going to pluck
out all of that guy’s hair! Hmph!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
That’s really not necessary…
It’s almost dawn.
Get your breathing
under control.
We have to… save the injured… before
it’s too late.
Nezuko… Zenitsu… Rengoku…
I’m sure they’re
all safe! You have to believe!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
My body is disintegrating. I can’t regenerate. (Thoughts) Did I lose? Am I
going to die? Me?
Ridiculous. Ridiculous! I haven’t been able to go all out!
I couldn’t devour a single human! My plan to fuse with the train and devour humans en masse just went up in
smoke!
And look what I’ve been reduced to! After
all the time and trouble
I’ve taken! (Thoughts) It was
him! It’s all his fault!
Even though I’d taken 200 humans hostage,
I still struggled! I was held at
bay! Is this the power of a Hashira?
And him… He was fast, too. Even though
he never broke the spell completely!
Not to mention
that girl! She’s a demon!
What’s that about?!
A demon, joining forces with Demon Slayers? Why
hasn’t Master Muzan killed the traitor?!
Dammit…
Dammit! In the first place…
it all started going downhill
once that brat broke my
spell! That brat is to blame!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Ngh… Urgh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
I’m Akaza.
Kyoujurou… Let me tell you why you can’t enter the realm of the highest.
It’s because
you’re a human.
Because you’re going to grow old. Because
you’re going to die.
Become a demon, Kyoujurou. Do that, and you can go on training
for a hundred, for two hundred years. You can become
stronger.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: I see.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: I can’t follow their movements!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Rengoku!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Ol’ Google-eyes!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Destructive Death… Rengoku         Fifth Form… Flame Tiger! Akaza
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Ohh… Did he do it? Did he win?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Don’t tell me… No way!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Let’s fight more.
Don’t die on me, Kyoujurou.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Third Form… Blazing Universe!
Fourth Form… Blooming Flame
Undulation!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Rengoku
and Akaza are locked in battle.

text: Destructive Death… Rengoku       Fifth Form… Flame Tiger! Akaza
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Rengoku
and Akaza are locked in battle.

text: Kyoujurou!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Rengoku
and Akaza are locked in battle.

text: Ngh! Urah!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Rengoku
and Akaza are locked in battle.

text: Don’t die on me, Kyoujurou.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Rengoku…
Rengoku… Rengoku!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Even if you fight to the death, you can’t win, Kyoujurou.
Those impressive slashes you inflicted on me have already healed completely.
But what about you? A smashed
left eye, shattered
ribs, and damaged
internal organs… All
irreparable.
If you were a demon, you’d heal in the blink of an eye. Those would be mere scratches for a demon.
You can struggle all you want, but a human can never beat a demon.
I want to go help him…
Ngh!
… but there’s no strength in my arms or legs!
It’s partly because
of my injury, but this always happens
after I use the Hinokami
Kagura technique!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text: Kyoujurou, you…
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
I… I will fulfill
my duty! I will not allow anyone
here to die!
I’ll damage his body as much as I can in an instant!
(Thoughts) Flame Breathing… Esoteric Art!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Ahh… What a tremendous fighting spirit! Amazing
aura despite all those injuries! That mental strength! That airtight stance!
Hahahaha… You have to become
a demon, after all, Kyoujurou! Let’s fight each other for all
eternity!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Set your heart ablaze. Go beyond your limits!
I’m the Flame
Hashira… Kyoujuryou Rengoku! Ninth Form… Rengoku!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Destructive Death…
Annihilation Type!
Ngh! Uahhh!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Rengoku…
Rengoku!
I see him…
Ren… goku… Ah!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text: Ahhh… Ahh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text: You’ll die! This will kill you, Kyoujurou!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Become a demon! Say that
you’ll become a demon! You are… strong and one of the
chosen ones!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

text:
Kyoujurou…
Y.Rengoku        Yes, Mother?
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
I want you to think hard… about what I’m about to ask you.
Do you know why you were born stronger
than others?
Y.Rengoku        Mm…
Ah… I don’t know!
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
So that you can save weaker
people.
Those who were born blessed with more gifts than others
are obligated to use those gifts for the world and other
people.
You must never use that God-given
strength to hurt others or for personal
gain.
It is the duty of those born strong to help the weak. It is a mission
they must fulfill responsibly. Make sure you never
forget that.
Y.Rengoku        I won’t!
Y.Rengoku        Ah…
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
I
don’t have much more time to live. I
was blessed to be the mother
of such a strong and gentle child.
I will entrust everything to you.
Mother… It was an honor for me to have been born to such a person as you! Urahhh!!
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
He stopped it?!
What unbelievable strength! I’ve pierced through
his solar plexus
with my right arm!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Damn! It’ll be daybreak soon! (Thoughts) I have to kill him and get out of here! Ah…
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
I can’t… pull my arm
out!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: I won’t let you escape!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Ngh… Grr…!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
No matter what Rengoku says…
I have to… do it right now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
I have to slice off the demon’s
head! Quickly!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
The sun is coming up! There’ll be sunlight here! (Thoughts) I have to get away… I
have to get away!
Ngh… Uohhh!!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
No way am I ever letting go! Not until I chop off your
head!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Urohhh!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Move, Inosuke!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Move your body for Rengoku’s sake!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Beast Breathing, Fang One… Pierce!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Ngh! Ngh… Grr…
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
I have to find refuge
from the sunlight!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
That took too long!
I have to get away from the
sun!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
Don’t run away! Don’t
run away, you coward! Don’t run away!
What the hell is that brat talking
about? Doesn’t he have a brain in his
head?!
I’m not running
away from you! I’m running
away from the sun!
And besides, the battle’s already
been decided! He’ll run out of strength
and die soon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
The Demon
Slayer Corps… is always fighting
you demons in the dark of the night where you have the advantage! That’s
right, us flesh and blood humans!
Our wounds won’t close up that easily! And we cannot regenerate a limb once it’s lost! Don’t run away, you bastard! You
bastard! You coward!
Rengoku is way more amazing than you! He’s stronger!
Rengoku didn’t lose! He didn’t let anybody die!
He fought
to the end! He protected them to the end! You’re
the one who lost! It’s Rengoku who won!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Ngh… Ahhh!! Ahhh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Heh… Stop yelling already.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
You’ll reopen that stomach
wound. You’re badly
injured, too, remember?
If you die, young Kamado, it’ll mean I’m the loser.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Rengoku…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Come over here. Let’s talk a bit, one last time.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
There’s
something that I remembered… while I was dreaming. You should go to my parents’
home, the Rengoku residence. There should be some notes left by the preceding
Flame Hashira.
My father read them often, but since I never did, I don’t know what’s in them.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
There might be some kind of record of that Hinokami
Kagura that you mentioned.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
R-Rengoku, please
don’t talk any more. Please
stop the bleeding
with a breathing technique! Isn’t there a way to close up your wounds?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: No. I’ll be dead soon.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
I’m going to tell you all I can while I can still talk, so listen, will you?
Tell my little brother
Senjurou… to follow
his heart… and to walk down the path that he
feels is right.
Tell my father…
that I want him to take care of himself. One more thing, young Kamado…
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
I believe in your little sister.
I accept her as a member of the Demon Slayer Corps.
I saw her bleeding
as she protected the humans
inside the train.
Anyone who risks their lives fighting
demons to protect
humans… is a rightful member of
the Demon Slayer Corps, no matter what anyone else says.
Go ahead and live with your head held high!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
No matter
how devastated you may be by your own weakness
or uselessness… set your heart ablaze.
Grit your teeth and look straight
ahead.
Even if you stop and crouch down, time won’t wait for you… or snuggle you and grieve along with you.
Don’t feel bad that I’m going to die here. As a Hashira,
of course I would shield
my juniors.
Any other Hashira would’ve
done the same thing. We never let the young buds get nipped.
Young Kamado…
Boar Head Boy… Yellow Boy… Keep learning
and grow. And then
become the next Hashira supporting the Demon Slayer Corps.
I believe in you. I believe
in you all.
Mother…
Do you think I did it right?
Did I carry out what I had to do… and my duties?
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: You made me proud.
speaker: Ruka
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
When the train went off the rails, Rengoku
had unleashed all these techniques… He must’ve kept the damage to the cars to a minimum.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: I guess he did…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: I can’t believe he’s gone… I mean, did an Upper Rank demon really show up?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Yeah…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
Why would an Upper Rank demon come here?
Was it that strong? I mean…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
I’m so frustrated…
As soon as I master one thing, I find another
thick wall right
in front of me…
While more powerful people
are fighting far beyond it… I just can’t make it there yet!
If I’m still stumbling around in a place like this, can I… can I… ever become like Rengoku?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Stop whining already!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
Stop asking dumbass things
like whether you can or can’t be like him!
He said he believes
in you, so just think about how you’re going
to measure up to that!
All living
things just go back to the earth
when they die! Sobbing or sniveling won’t
bring them back!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Don’t cry even if you have regrets! No matter how pathetic or humiliated you feel, you still have to go on living!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
But you’re crying, too. There are tears flooding
out from that
headpiece…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: I’m not crying!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Ahh… Ahh! Ahhh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Get over here! We’re gonna train!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
Is that so… Rengoku
is…
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the city. Rengoku’s kasugai crow informs
other members of the Demon Slayer Corps of his death.

text:
So, even Rengoku couldn’t
beat an Upper
Rank demon?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the city. Rengoku’s kasugai crow informs
other members of the Demon Slayer Corps of his death.

text: I don’t believe it.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
In the city. Rengoku’s kasugai crow informs
other members of the Demon Slayer Corps of his death.

text:
Namu Amida Butsu…
Shinazugawa    I’ll
exterminate those repulsive
demons!
Ubuyashiki        So, not one of the 200 passengers lost their lives?
Kyoujurou did a great job, then. What a remarkable child.
I’m not sad. I don’t have much longer
to live, either.
Soon, I’ll be joining
Kyoujurou and the others in the land of the dead.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In the city. Rengoku’s kasugai crow informs
other members of the Demon Slayer Corps of his death.

text: Ngh… Rengoku… Rengoku… Rengoku!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
continues to mourn.

text: Rengoku… Rengoku… Rengoku…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later,
at the crash site of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou, Inosuke, and Zenitsu cry following
Rengoku’s death.

text:
Stop that crying!
And you! Snap out of it, for crying
out loud! We’re gonna train now!
Ubuyashiki      I see. Tanjirou
said that?

Kibutsuji goes to a bookstore before returning home to a large manor where his adoptive parents

Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents

Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents

Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents

text:
So even Tanjirou

Well, why not? Even someone
who sounded as well-trained as Rengoku
ended up dead.
That would make anyone sad and fall apart.
Look at Inosuke.
Even he was bawling. I guess he was beyond
frustrated. (Thoughts) Even the strongest person can suffer and feel
sorrow, huh?
Even still, since
there’s no point in cowering
forever, they beat their wounded souls again and again and get back
on their feet.
I’m sure that Rengoku was that kind of
person, too. That’s the kind of sound
he gave off. Not that it wasn’t a little odd, but his sound was strong and
kind.

of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Don’t be ashamed.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Whoever survives
wins. Don’t overlook
your chance.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Come back here, old man!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
You think he can’t
trust us because
we’re the lowest rank?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Hey, our rank is Kanoe. We’ve already moved up.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Do you remember all the rankings?
Remember how we used to be Mizunoto at the very bottom? Now we’re fourth from the bottom, Kanoe!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Oh, snap! You caught up to me!
speaker: Murata
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Gahahah!
Eat it, you pissant crybaby!
We’ll be moving
past you in no time!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
What was that, you stupid
boar?!
speaker: Murata
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: You wanna fight?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Ready? Watch this.
Show me my ranking.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: How do you like that?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: What…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Huh? They fiddled with your arm on Wisteria
Mountain, didn’t they?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
I remember them fiddling
with it, but I was exhausted.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
It’s called
“Wisteria Flower Engraving”, and you say that phrase
and flex your muscles to invoke it.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: I had no idea about that.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: It’s a sign that you’re a Demon Slayer.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Hey, cheer up!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Wait! We don’t have time for this! Sorry!
As soon as night
falls, I’ll head over to your Ogimoto
House!
So wait for me until then. It’d be dangerous to make a move on your own!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Why should I do that?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: I’ll be done investigating my own House today!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Grr… I told you, the demon’s
at my House, so you’d
better come with me right now!
How stupid are you, anyway?! For crying out loud!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Hmph! Hmph! Hmph!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Uzui was patrolling outside
the Houses during
the night, right?
Ow, ow, ow!
Even still, Zenitsu disappeared, and the demon at your place is nowhere
to be seen right now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
Hey! Could you stop smacking me around?!
I think there must be a passageway inside
the building.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Ah… A passageway?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
That’s right.
And since it’s not coming
in and out, there’s a good chance that the demon is working on the inside.
If the demon’s working
in the House and cleverly
disguising itself as a human, then it’d be all the more careful about killing
people to make sure its cover won’t be blown.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
I get it… Cleaning
up after a murder would be a hassle. And wiping away bloodstains
would be a chore.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
This is a nightlife
district. It can be convenient for demons in more ways than one, but
also just as inconvenient for them.
They have to work at night.
It would seem suspicious if they weren’t
around.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: You’re right.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text:
I think that not only Zenitsu,
but Uzui’s wives,
as well, are all still alive.
I’m going to take action with that in mind. I’m going to rescue them,
no matter what!
I want you to take action with that
in mind, too. And no matter
what… I don’t want you to
die.
Are you okay with that?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop
of a building. Tanjirou and Zenitsu meet up.

text: Now then, I’ll be off.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. At the Tokito
House. The servants
prepare tea for Koinatsu.

text:
Not good. The sun’s almost
set completely. I gotta get to Inosuke’s place fast!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
runs across the rooftops.

text:
There’s a scent.
A sweet smell.
It’s faint.
It’s a demon…
It’s the scent of a demon. It’s nearby! No way!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night. Tanjirou
runs across the rooftops.

text:
Late. It’s almost nightfall, and he’s not here yet! Souichirou, you moron!
I’m going to take action! With the spirit of “Comin’ through” in my heart!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text: Hey, mice! My swords!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text: That guy has mad skills.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text:
Muscles… Muscles…
Muscles!
speaker: Mice
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text:
Setting me up with these Muscular
Mice subordinates… I wanna boss around some ninja
animals, too!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text:
Muscle… Muscle…
Muscle muscle!
speaker: Mice
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text:
Let’s go slay some demons!
Comin…
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text: … through!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
At the Ogimoto House.
Inosuke waits for Tanjirou.

text:
What happened
to Zenko and
Hinatsuru?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text:
Give me the short
version.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text: No questions from you, got that?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text: Zenko disappeared. Hinatsuru fell ill and left for Kirimise…
speaker: Owner
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text: Tell me everything that you think might be relevant. Who are you suspecting?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text: You can trust me, so speak up.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text:
I’ll kill whoever it is if it’s the last thing I do.
I’ll get revenge for you.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text:
Omitsu…
An Oiran named Warabihime. She’s in a room on the north
side that has no light.
speaker: Owner
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text: Not here… She must be on the prowl for humans.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text:
I’ll head to where Hinatsuru
is as I try to pinpoint the demon’s presence.
If she’s still alive, she should have some information for me.
Either way, the demon should
be back here by daybreak. I’ll dispose of it with my own two hands.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At the Kyougoku House.
The owner looks at Omitsu’s
bloodstained kimono. Uzui approaches
him.

text:
The scent is strong. There’s
no question!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: Miss Koinatsu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Are you a Demon
Slayer?
So you came.
How many of you are there?
I know one is that yellow-haired, ugly little brat. Is there a Hashira with you? Or
will he be here soon?
I know you’re not a Hashira. You seem weak, after all.
I have no use for anyone
who’s not a Hashira. Got that?
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Her body… What’s
going on?
I don’t see Miss Koinatsu’s body. She’s not bleeding. There’s
no scent of blood!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
I never devour dirty old people or anyone ugly.
Upper… Six!
Let that person go!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Who do you think you’re talking
to?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
She’s so fast… I never saw that coming!
(Thoughts) Upper Rank…
I have no strength in my limbs.
My body’s numb!
Calm down!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: My body’s responding fine. Otherwise, I wouldn’t be alive right now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
I have no strength in my limbs… because I’m afraid! (Thoughts) My body’s numb because I hit my back hard, so no wonder!
That demon’s weapon
is her belt. It has supernatural abilities. She can absorb humans inside it!
That’s why no matter how hard we searched inside
the building, I couldn’t find a secret path that a human could fit
through!
All she needs
to abduct humans is a crack big enough for that belt!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Oh, you’re still alive?
Oh? You’re
not as fragile as I thought.
I do like your eyes. They’re lovely.
I’ll just gouge out your eyeballs
and devour them.
The box… It’s not broken.
But the next time she attacks me, it’s sure to be destroyed!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Sorry, Nezuko. The shoulder
strap broke. I can’t carry you while I fight!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Don’t you leave that box. Unless
your life is in danger.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: Water Breathing, Fourth Form!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Striking Tide… Turbulent!
Ngh! Ugh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: Fufu!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: Ugh… Gah! Urgh… Ugh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Your midair
moves weren’t half bad.
Also… you certainly did a fine job separating her, right where I’d trapped
Koinatsu. I mean, how cute is that? As ugly as you are!
I’m starting to get rather fond of you. You’re
like a rat on the brink of death.
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text:
Upper Six… Can I do it?
Without
Uzui, Zenitsu, or Inosuke… Can I take on an Upper Rank alone?
(Thoughts) No, it’s not a matter of if I can do it!
I have to do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: Fu…
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the town. Tanjirou lowers
himself from a rooftop.

text: Ah… Hinatsuru!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the entertainment district.
Uzui is on the search for his wives. He stops in front of a
house, where he finds Hinatsuru tied up by Daki’s obi sashes.

text: Forgive me, Lord Tengen…
speaker: Hinatsuru
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text: Never mind. Stop talking.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
I realized
Warabihime-oiran was a demon, but she became
suspicious of me, as well. So I drank some poison and tried to
slip out of the House, but it seems this belt that I was given by
Warabihime-oiran was for spying on and killing me.
Lord Tengen, do not trouble yourself
with me. Please
go now.
You heard that sound
just now, did you not? The demon is on a rampage.
speaker: Hinatsuru
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text: You’re sure you’re going to be all right?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
Yes… I am sorry I couldn’t
be of use to you.
speaker: Hinatsuru
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
There’s no need for you to do anything
more.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
Once the antidote starts
working, leave Yoshiwara. You hear me?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
The battle has already begun. (Thoughts) Where is it? Search
for its presence!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text: It’s here. Underground.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
I can hear the sound of someone
battling.
I can hear it well thanks to the reverberations. (Thoughts) There’s
something here!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text: Sound Breathing, first form. Roar!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the house where Hinatsuru
was captured. Uzui gives Hinatsuru
a pill.

text:
What an infernal racket,
you piece of trash!
What is that sound? What are you doing?
Where? From the Ogimoto
House? And also Hinatsuru…
How many of you are here? Four?
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: I’m not telling you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
If you tell me the truth, I’d be willing to spare your life.
We clashed for maybe an instant,
but look at your sword!
It’s already nicked.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Some hack of a swordsmith must’ve
forged that blade, am I right?
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
You’re wrong! The person
who forged this sword is amazing! He’s a brilliant swordsmith!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Then how did it get nicked,
moron?
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
It’s starting
to get noisy all over the place.
It’s annoying me, so this time,
I’m going to kill you.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
The blade gets nicked when its wielder
is subpar. It’s my fault!
I… When all is said and done, I… can’t handle… the Water Breathing technique!
My body’s not suited for Water Breathing!
I can’t become
like Mr. Urokodaki
or Tomioka with the Water Breathing
technique!
I just can’t
help striking harder
with the Hinokami
Kagura. It’s just compatible
with my body!
But…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: Ngh… Would it kill you to hold back a little, idiot?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Ngh… That would
be no way to train!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Hinokami
Kagura!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Flame Dance!
Clear Blue… Urgh! Ahh…!
Tanjirou! Are you okay? Inosuke       (Flashback) What? Are you hungry?!
Zenitsu (Flashback) Dummy!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: Boar!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Because
of its sheer force… I couldn’t unleash
multiple strikes.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: Hang in there! I’ll go fetch Shinobu!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
It’s different now! I should
be able to do it! No… I’m doing it! (Thoughts) That’s what I’ve been
training for!
Don’t go down in defeat! Ablaze!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Ablaze…
Ablaze… Set your heart ablaze! (Thoughts) Hinokami Kagura!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Raging
Sun!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
His swordsmanship style just changed.
It’s sharper than before.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
What the hell is this sound?
Such an unpleasant sound! The sound of breathing?
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Flame
Dance!
Flame Dance is a two-hit
strike! Even if she dodges it, there’s
one more!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
That was nothing
to write home about. In the end, this is all it amounts to!
Where is he?
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Hinokami
Kagura… Fake Rainbow.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
An opening… The opening thread!
I can do this!
Hinkami Kagura… Fire Wheel!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
So slow. You’re making
me yawn.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Go on the defensive! Defensive!
Urk! Ngh… Ugh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
This is the fallout from using the Hinokami Kagura! (Thoughts) All that built-up
fatigue is making
my muscles tighten
up!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Oh, so you’re still
alive.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: Calm down. Get your breathing under control!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Recover!
Hurry! Recovery Breathing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
This belt is like a powerful blade! Even if I glimpse
an opening thread,
it vanishes just like that!
My attacks are too slow!
Raise your body temperature! Get your body temperature up!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: I’m going to inform Lady Shinobu, all right?
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Kiyo, please! I’m begging you! Just keep it between
us! I’m fine, okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: But…
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
I’m feeling fine,
see? I’m fine!
Never felt better!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text:
Just look at this thermometer. 38 degrees celsius!
Just like yesterday and the day before that, remember? It’s been like that
for days!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

text: Uh… Ahh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the town.
Daki hears the explosion from Uzui’s attack.

Shinjurou         (Flashback)
Dear Kamado… I know that I wronged you. (Flashback) Thank you for shedding tears over Kyoujurou.
I hear that you’ve also been exchanging letters with Senjurou
for the past four months. He seems to be in a much better place now.
I’m ashamed that our first meeting went the way it did.
At a time when my own incompetence had left me shattered, things went
from bad to worse when my wife succumbed to illness.
Since then, I’ve done nothing
but drink myself
into a stupor and wallow. There’s no bigger fool than me.
Unlike me, Kyoujurou was a fine son.
Even after I abandoned him as his instructor,
he trained by reading the Guide
to Flame Breathing and became a Hashira. Even though there were only three
volumes.
He must have had more of Ruka’s…
of his mother’s blood. Both Kyoujurou
and Senjurou are fine boys.
And Kamado… you have an even more amazing power.
I hear that those who are chosen to wield Sun Breathing… are born with the

text:
No, Shinjurou… I wasn’t born with this scar.

brazier. Later, I injured myself
there during the Final Selection, and that’s how it
ended up the way it is now.
I hear
that my father
was born with a faint mark on his forehead,
but that wasn’t the case with
me.
I must not be a chosen wielder. Ngh…
But… even so… even if I’m not one of the chosen ones, even if I’m not up to the task…
… there are times when I just can’t back down! Because in this world,
there are those who lack human hearts!
Killing
for no reason without a second thought,
without any hint of remorse!

The parts of my body that were split
off to take control of this red-light district… Now that it’s whole
again, my speed is in a class of its own.
You could barely
hold your own against my non-Blood Demon Art attacks,

text:
Thank goodness Nezuko’s
asleep.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Tanjirou
carries Nezuko on his back as he runs through the streets.

text:
Nezuko!
Stop it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Tanjirou
carries Nezuko on his back as he runs through the streets.

text: ♪ Hushabye, baby bunny on the hill… Tell me why your eyes are so very red.
speaker: Kie
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Tanjirou
carries Nezuko on his back as he runs through the streets.

text: Wahhh!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Tanjirou
carries Nezuko on his back as he runs through the streets.

text:
You sleep tight now.
I can still fight.
I can still move. This time… I’m going to fight to the end… to the very end!
Gyuutarou       Tsk… This really pisses
me off. You’re good-looking, you have three wives, and on top of
that, you’re full of swagger.
You’re
different, aren’t you? You’re not
like any of the other Hashira I’ve killed. You must’ve been special
since the day you were born. A chosen talent,
right?
That makes me so jealous. I need
you to die as soon as
possible!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Tanjirou
carries Nezuko on his back as he runs through the streets.

text:
Talent? Ha.
Gyuutarou       Huh?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Do I look like someone with any talent?
If someone like me gives that impression, you really are living a blessed life.
Gyuutarou       Huh?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
You may be centuries
old, but if you’ve
stayed shut up in a place like this, I guess
you can’t help but be ignorant of the real world.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text: What do you know about it?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
I know, all right.
But you have no clue, do you? See, this country
is vast. It’s teeming with people who’d blow your mind.
Some are complete enigmas.
Some can take up a sword and become a Hashira in two
months.
Me, chosen?
Don’t give me that crap! Just how many lives do you think I’ve let slip through my fingers until now?
That’s
right… I can’t be like Rengoku!
Gyuutarou       Grr…
Then how do you explain
it?
My Blood Sickles are drenched with deadly poison,
yet you simply
refuse to die!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
I come from a line of shinobi. I’ve become resistant, so poison doesn’t
work on me.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text: The shinobi were wiped out during the Edo Period. Don’t give us that crap!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
That’s no lie.
The shinobi exist.
I had nine brothers and sisters. Seven of them died by the
time I turned 15.
Panicked
by our clan’s decline, my father, just like a man possessed, forced us to submit to brutal training.
The only survivors
were myself and my brother,
who was two years younger.
My
brother was exactly like my father. The same mindset, the same mannerisms. His subordinates were pawns. His wives were expendable if they produced heirs. No one else ever had any
say. Resolutely indifferent.
And I… didn’t
want to become like him!
Ubuyashiki      (Flashback) It’s hard, isn’t it, Tengen?
The path you have chosen.
Rejecting the values that shape you, that were instilled in you during your
childhood, even as you place yourself on the battlefield… That’s surely
agonizing.
Carrying
all that conflict
and quandaries inside
yourself, you still…
all of you still persist in moving forward and battling on. Isn’t that
right? So that you can protect other people’s lives.
Thank you. You’re
a remarkable child.
I’m the one who should
be grateful.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Master,
for your sake,
I’d never think twice about laying down my life.
I can surely accomplish
anything.
Those who have baggage like conflict or quandaries are spineless fools. That’s always been the story of my
life.
Gyuutarou       Hm?
Hm? Hmm?
Hehe… Hehehehe…
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
What the hell are you laughing
about?
Gyuutarou       The
poison’s slowly affecting you, after all. Slowly but surely.
Claiming it didn’t work on you was just bravado! Pretty
humiliating, huh? Hehehehe…
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Oh, no! It has absolutely no effect on me! Wanna see me dance?
I’m so on fire that I could eat 100 bowls of tempura
udon! In a flashy way, that is!
Gyuutarou       Grr…
Don’t you dare kick my little sister!
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
You scumbag!
Gyuutarou       Ah…!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Well, those are unique explosions. They can inflict
damage to a demon’s body and explode with the slightest
friction from a strike.
She got hit because she slashed one without realizing
that. She’s always taking a hit, that one!
Gyuutarou       Ah!
Guh…
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) The blade is extending…!
Gyuutarou       What…?
He’s holding onto the tip of his sword. What kind of insane grip does he have?!
Gyuutarou       Guh…!
Gyuutarou       Ngh…
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Tsk… Damn, I botched
the chance to finish off this one!
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Urahhh! He beheaded me again!
Damn you! Damn you… I’ll make you pay for this!
It’s not fair… It’s not fair. Why am I the one who’s always getting
beheaded? Ahhh!!
Gyuutarou       You…
You’re onto us, aren’t you?
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
About what?
Gyuutarou       Not that finding out about
us will do you any good!
You’re going to die a slow and steady
death, anyway.
Even as we speak,
we’re creeping toward victory, aren’t
we?
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
I don’t know about
that!
Better not forget me! Not only yours truly, Lord Inosuke,
but his minion is here,
as well!
Gyuutarou       Who
the hell are these guys?
Gyuutarou       Ah…
Huh?
Prostitutes      Ahh…
Gyuutarou       Tsk…
speaker: Inosuke
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Hey, you guys… Talk about flashy
entrances! That’s what I like to see!
Gyuutarou       Ha! You can summon all the underlings you want, but there’ll still be no blissful future waiting for you!
You’re all going to die, anyway,
so stop staring with those sparkling eyes!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Gyuutarou and Daki prepare
to fight against
Tanjirou, Inosuke, Zenitsu, and Uzui.

text:
There are two demons now. How did that happen?
Also, the Belt Demon isn’t
dead. Are they both Upper Six? Splintered off from each other?
If that’s the case… the main unit has to be this man!
His scent is different. The weight of his scent…
It feels like the back of my throat’s gone numb!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
My hands are shaking. I wonder if it’s from fatigue. Or… is it fear?
(Thoughts) No! Even so, I… we…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: We’re going to win! Us, the Demon Slayers!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
There’s no way you can win! Not when the Hashira
who’s your only hope is ravaged by poison.
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: Ah… Poison?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Oh, we’re going to win easy, you dumbass
bottom-feeders! I’m at the top of my game
when I’m shackled by poison in my system!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Oh, spare us your
bravado!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Shut up! Don’t you dare underestimate humans!
All three of these boys are my brilliant
Tsuguko! They have relentless grit!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: Haha! Yeah, we do!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Even if their limbs fall off, they won’t let
go! And I’ve already
identified how to bring you down!
Beheading you at the same time!
Both of you at the same time!
Am I right?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Otherwise, there’d
be no reason to disperse
your respective skills,
rather than assimilating your
weak sister into yourself!
Haha~! Easy-peasy, you two!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Hahahaha! I see! It’s that simple!
We’ve as good as won,
huh?
Gyuutarou       All
those Demon Slayers
perished because they couldn’t do that simple thing.
Not even the Hashira!
Fifteen for me and seven for my sister.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
You heard him! Not a single
one lived to see daybreak!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Long nights are always
on our side, after all.
Every last one of you, just
die!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Leave that worm woman to me and Sleepyhead! You two go defeat that praying mantis!
Got that?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: Watch your back!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Sure thing!
Gyuutarou       I
won’t let you kill my sister.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
You! You’re the one
from…
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
I have something to say to you.
Apologize to the girl you hurt by pulling
her ear.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Even if it was your earnings
that provided them with their basic needs… that still doesn’t
make those girls your belongings. You have no right to do whatever you want to
them.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Don’t bore me with your stupid
lecture.
In what world does someone as ugly as you get to speak to me as an equal?
In this city, women
are merchandise. The same as objects. Getting
sold, bought, and destroyed… The owner is free to do
with them as she chooses.
Ugly people have no right to eat any meals. The inept shouldn’t be treated as humans.
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
You shouldn’t do the same horrible
things to others that were done to you.
You’re wrong about that.
The horrible
things done to us, the things that made us suffer… We do them back to others and collect on those debts.
We can never make up for our own misfortune unless we collect
it from the blessed.
Because that’s the way we live our lives!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
We’ve killed off everyone
who’s ever leveled
false accusations at us, right?
We’re going to slash your windpipes just like we did to the others!
speaker: Daki,
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Unbelievable bloodlust! It’s giving me chills from my elbows to my neck!
(Thoughts) No wonder. You’re up against the Upper Six demon! Get ahold of yourself!
(Thoughts) Uzui has been poisoned. I have to protect him!
Strike
with your sword the instant
he moves! The second he moves an inch! In that instant!
Swing
it! Swing your sword! Evade it! Evade it! Bend backward! Bend…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
What are you doing? He protected you instead, and now you’re
a hindrance!
Tons of Belts from up above!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Hahahaha! Hahahaha!
Woah! Three eyes?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
I can see everything! All of your movements!
Now that my brother’s awake, what you’re
seeing now is my true power!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Shut up! Stop screeching in that damn shrill voice!
Gyuutarou       Fufufufu… Them being your Tsuguko was a lie, right? Your movements are so out of
sync! What a total bust!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Gah! Ngh!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Haha! Hahahaha!
You can’t even get close to me!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Shut up, worm woman!
If you want to prove anything, why don’t you shut your trap and see if you can kill us?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Heh… All right, as you wish!
Gyuutarou       Haha…
Gyuutarou       You
can just die!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
So quick! He really is like a praying mantis!
What’s up with these slashes?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
There’s
no way out of this!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Urah…!
Grr… Heavy! These slashes are so heavy! Ngh…!
Sidestep
it! Ward off the blow! If
you take the blow head-on,
it’ll snap your blade in two!
If
it’s power versus power, the weaker side always loses! (Thoughts) Don’t misjudge the flow of power and ward it off as you should! (Thoughts) The flexible Water
Breathing technique is better for defence!
If it’s only to ward off the blow… my blade never would’ve gotten nicked!
Sound Breathing, Fifth
Form.
String Performance!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) You can assault
me with your noisy moves, but it’ll do you no good!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Hahahaha! Die! Die! You ugly toads!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Gahhh! It’s not just the Belts! Now we have blood blades flying toward us!
What’s going on? I can’t get near that worm woman!
Dammit!
These blood blades are big trouble!
I can feel it all over my body that just a scratch
would be deadly!
Gyuutarou       Tsk…!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Be useful! Don’t let him attack as much! Find a way to win!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
He’s not going to hold up much longer! It’s a miracle
he can still move at
all.
That shoulder wound must be really deep. He seems
to have stopped
the bleeding, but it’s touch and go!
That left hand tied to his hilt is the only thing keeping his sword in his grip! (Thoughts) All because I got
poisoned…!
I have to take care of this, or we’ll be wiped out!
I can’t breathe.
This furious attack
is leaving me gasping!
I’m about to black out! I
have to find a way… to start
Recovery Breathing!
Gyuutarou       Haah~!
Hinatsuru        Ngh… Ugh…
Gyuutarou       Ngh…
What are those? Kunai?
It’s going to be a pain, dealing
with this many of them in front of a Hashira.
It’s so annoying
that they’re so small. There are still
three fledgling Demon Slayers, too…
Well,
even if they hit me, those things
are no…
No. Would they really try to pull off such a meaningless attack? (Thoughts) Blood Demon Art, Rampant Arc Rampage!
Hinatsuru        (Thoughts) He’s creating a dome with the slashes!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Hey, hey, hey! What’s going on here? He’s coming
at me! (Thoughts) There’s one
stuck in you. A kunai, piercing you, too!
That’s
right, he’s a shinobi. Not a swordsman. This guy’s always
had otherworldly senses.
Gyuutarou       What
the…!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) My legs won’t regenerate. I knew it! They’re laced with something!
This kunai! Probably
with something extracted from wisteria! M-My body’s
going numb!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Hey, not too shabby! Starting
to get in sync in such a short time! Pretty
amusing!
Hinatsuru        (Thoughts) Please!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: If my siblings were still alive…
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
… maybe we would’ve
gone drinking one day.
Sorry, but I still
haven’t managed to die yet. But
I did bring some fine sake,
so cut me some slack.
One day, we’ll all drink together
over there.
Now, in their honor, dig in and be as flashy
as you can!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Woah, these are tasty! Don’t hold back, you three.
Hinatsuru         Lord Tengen, do you…
Hinatsuru         Lord Tengen, do you still think about your deceased siblings?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Sure. Not a day goes by that I don’t
recall them.
Hinatsuru         Ah…
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Even now, it seems like yesterday that I left my homeland
with you three.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Hey, this one’s tasty,
too! Come on, join me!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text: Ah… Delicious!
speaker: Suma
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Hey! Would it kill you to show some restraint?
Hinatsuru         Now, now…
speaker: Makio
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
But Lord Tengen told us to dig in!
Here you go, Makio!
speaker: Suma
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Mmph…!
Mm… Delicious.
speaker: Makio
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text: Isn’t it? Hahaha! Fufufufu…
speaker: Suma
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text: Someday, I’m going to Hell.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Whoops! I shouldn’t have said that.
I don’t need another tongue-lashing from you three.
I’m going to live the flashiest life possible for my siblings’
sakes. With you three, that is.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Oh… Ahh…
Hinatsuru         How lovely.
Hinatsuru         Ah…
Th-Thank you very much.
speaker: Wives
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text: Sure.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Lord Tengen! Lord Tengen!
Me, too! Me, too!
speaker: Makio
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text: You plastered them on yourself, didn’t you?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
You’re so cruel, Lord Tengen!
Hinatsuru         Lord Tengen, would you mind giving me that petal?
speaker: Makio
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
I don’t mind at all, but there are tons of them everywhere.
Hinatsuru         That’s the one I want.
Hinatsuru         Heh… Thank you very much.
Lord Tengen, I want one, too!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
Huh? Just pick up one of these petals
yourselves!
Hinatsuru         Ah…
You’re so cruel!
Hinatsuru         Mm…
Hinatsuru         (Thoughts) Lord Tengen!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past, at the Uzui family grave.
Uzui places incense
on the grave as Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma stand behind him. Everyone prays.

text:
He regenerated his legs?!

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text:

I can’t cut through! It’s too hard! The poison

Gyuutarou       Urahhh!!

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

I was so close to…!

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

Don’t give up! Don’t give up! Don’t

scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text:
His attack speed…

He’s breaking down the poison!

Gyuutarou       Urahhh!

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text:
Don’t give --

That enabled him to temporarily stop the poison from circulating!

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text:

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text:
Ichi!

Slashes!

scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
Amazing!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) “Score”?
Did he say “score”?! Did he turn my Blood Demon Art into a song and deflect it?! Even when he only
has one arm?! No way is this possible!
Don’t give me this crap!
Gyuutarou       Urahh!

scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
Ngh! Ugh! Gyuutarou
Ngh! Hah!
Gyuutarou       Urahh!
Gyuutarou       Urahhh!!
speaker: Gyuutarou       Grr… Uzui
scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
Amazing! He’s holding
his own!
But that’s not enough to defeat him! Uzui’s going to reach
his limit first! (Thoughts) I have to do it before

Gyuutarou       Urahhh!
Gyuutarou       Ngh!

scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text: Don’t stop!!

text:
Jump!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) You’re too slow… you little

Gyuutarou       (Thoughts)
Even if you have someone
to pave the way for you, a loser is still a loser! It’s all over now! The poison will kill
you!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text:
I’m gonna slash

Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Damn you! Still swinging your sword! You fool! You couldn’t behead
me before! What makes you think you can now?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
I can’t do it with just my arms! I have to slash him with every ounce of strength
I have! From the top of my head to the tips of my toes! Use it all!
Ignore all the pain in your body! Hang on! Striking with all your might won’t be
enough!
One hundred times more power…

scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
… summon it by force!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts)
Crap! Not by a brat like him! (Thoughts) This is bad! I’m about to be beheaded!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) No, I’m good! Even if I get beheaded, as long as my sister’s
head is still intact…
First,
I’m going to finish this one off!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
Dammit!
I have no more strength!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text: I’m going to chop you into little pieces before you can decapitate me!

Gyuutarou.

text:
What’s
he doing here?
Didn’t my brother
impale him through

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
Don’t underestimate the flexibility
of my body! Shifting the position of my internal organs is child’s play for me! And since I grew up on a harsh mountainside, poison
doesn’t work on me, either!

scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
Brother! Do something, will you, Brother?!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) I have to unleash the Rotating Circular
Slashes!
Gyuutarou       Ahh…
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks
Gyuutarou.

text:
They beheaded them…
They beheaded them! Beheaded

They beheaded them, Hinatsuru! Please take a look from beyond the grave!

In the entertainment district. Daki watches as Tanjirou attacks

text: What the… Do you even know what you’re saying?!

Th-The

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

I can’t… move my body.
No. Why am I able to move at all? Why am I alive?
I was poisoned!

scene:
Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

scene:
Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

look!

Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

Not that I don’t deserve pity,

Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

scene:
Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

text:

I have to neutralize the poison!

Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

text:
I know! What about sunlight?
Daybreak

I do?!
Send a crow to Lady Shinobu? No, there’s not enough time! If I don’t
do something right now, Inosuke is going to die!
Why was my life spared?
Why was I the only one?!
His skin, inflamed
by the poison… It’s starting
to heal!

scene:
Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

text: I’m starving! Gimme something to eat!

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

text: Ah… Ngh…

Sometime later,
in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

text: Wahh! Thank goodness! Thank goodness!

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

in the ruins of the entertainment district. Tanjirou lies on the ground.
Nezuko, having returned to her smaller size, pats his chest.

Wahhh!

of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

My life until now --
