of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

text: Ahh! Hey!!
speaker: Suma
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

speaker: Suma
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

text:
Hold up a second!
Hinatsuru         Ah…

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

text:
How do you explain

The poison

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

text:
Lord Tengen!
Hinatsuru         Ahh!

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

text: You three… Sorry to make you worry.

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

I think that Nezuko’s

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around

Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

text: Thank you…
speaker: Suma
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

I’m going to go search for the demons’
heads. I can’t rest easy until I find them.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins
of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio, and Suma sit around
Uzui, whose body is mottled by Gyuutarou’s poison. Suma cries.

text:
Nezuko! That way! I can smell
demon blood!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: Is that a pool of blood? Demon blood?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: All right! It won’t be attacking anymore.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
I was able to collect
the blood of an Upper Rank demon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: Take this to Miss Tamayo.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
There’s no one in sight.
So Makio and the others
managed to evacuate everyone. That’s a relief!
Nezuko! This way!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
I want you to head this way!
The demon scent is getting
stronger.
Gyuutarou       Who
the hell gets beheaded by those two bottom-feeders?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
So you were watching
after all! Why didn’t you save me, then?!
Gyuutarou       I was battling
a Hashira, you know!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
So what if you were? Why didn’t
you finish him off?! You could’ve just split his head into two!
Gyuutarou       I was about to do that!
Gyuutarou       But
that kid with the earrings
was still alive,
so I was going to kill him off first!
Since you didn’t do a damn thing yourself,
you could’ve at least finished
off the Hashira!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Then you should’ve controlled me so that I could do that! But you did nothing! You let your guard down!
Gyuutarou       Shut
up!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
They’re still alive.
Gyuutarou       Look, if you’re going to call yourself an Upper Rank…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Not only that, but they’re
arguing!
But it looks like their bodies are starting to disintegrate.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
No one as ugly as you… could possibly
be my brother.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
I bet you and I… aren’t even related
by blood! We don’t even look anything
alike!
You’re so useless!
Your one saving grace is your strength!
Nothing else! You have no
value at all if you lose! You worthless, ugly freak!
Gyuutarou       Grr… Don’t
give me that crap! If you
were on your own, you’d be long dead by now!
How many times have I saved you?!
You’re the worthless one, and
you know it. You’re weak, and you have no value
whatsoever!
I wish I hadn’t
protected someone like you all this time!
If it hadn’t been for you, my life would’ve been different! Right,
if it hadn’t been for you!
Gyuutarou       Why
do I always have to clean up your messes?
Gyuutarou       You
just never should’ve
been born --
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
That’s a lie. You don’t really feel that way at all. You don’t mean any of that.
Try to get along. In this world,
you two siblings
have no one but each other.
There’s no one who will forgive
you for what you did. You’ll be resented, despised,
and denounced by all those you’ve killed.
Nobody will ever be on your side. So if nothing
else, you two… shouldn’t be cursing each other out like this!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Wahhh! Why don’t you shut up?! Don’t you dare lecture
us! You stupid brat!
Get out of here! Just get lost!
I’m so pissed!
I’m so pissed! Fix this somehow, Brother! I don’t want to die, Brother!
Brother! Bro --
Gyuutarou       Ume!
That’s
right. My little
sister’s name was Ume.
(Thoughts) Not Daki. What a god-awful name.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts)
No… Ume was pretty bad, too. Since you were named after the disease
that killed our mother.
The
Rashomon Riverbank. We were born into the lowest class of the Entertainment District. Children were seen as extra mouths to feed, so we were cursed
just for living.
My mother nearly
killed me more than once before I was ever born.
And she also tried to kill me
numerous times after I was born, since I was nothing but a burden. And yet, I
still survived.
My body was weak like a withered
leaf, but I clung to life as hard as I could.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Worm! Dimwit! Sad sack! Coward!
Good-for-nothing!
I was mocked
for my ugly voice and appearance, and rocks were thrown at me for being filthy.
It was as if all the abuse and insults
in the world were created
just for me.
Not only was I ugly, but I was filthy,
too. Always covered
in grime and dandruff
from head to toe. Giving off the stench of fleas.
I was especially despised in the Entertainment District,
where beauty was the
measure of your value. As if I were a monster.
When
I got hungry, I ate mice and insects. (Thoughts) My only toy was a scythe that a customer
left behind.
Things
started to change for me… after Ume was born.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Ume… You were my pride and joy.
Even at a tender age, grown-ups would reel at the sight of your beautiful face.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Ngh… Eek!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) I discovered that I was good at fighting and started working
as a debt collector.
I revolted everyone,
and they all feared me. That made me feel so good.
My ugliness became
a source of pride… and having a gorgeous sister
like you dispelled my sense of inferiority.
I had the feeling that we were on the fast track to a better life.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Until you turned thirteen, Ume.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts)
Because you stabbed a customer, a samurai’s eye with a hairpin, blinding him, you were bound hand and foot
out of retaliation and then burned alive!
I wasn’t there. I got home from work to find you burnt to a crisp.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text:
Ugh… Ngh…
Gyuutarou       Ah…
Ahhh!! Stop! Stop!
Stop!
Don’t collect from me! You’re collecting from me after never giving
me a damn thing?!
I’ll never forgive you! I’ll never
forgive you!! Turn my sister back to the way she was! Or else… I’ll kill the gods, Buddha,
every one of you!
Gyuutarou       Gah…
speaker: Daki
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text: You’re sure he’s the one?
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Yes! That’s him, all right!
I appreciate this! I’m so glad to be rid of that troublemaker!
He was such a savage, severely
injuring the people
he was collecting from! And lately,
he’s really been out of control!
It’s a shame that we lost Ume, but when I find another
pretty girl, I’ll send her your way. So, um, about the money…
speaker: Woman
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Hold on. After I finish him off.
Gyuutarou       Hey,
you… That’s a fine kimono
you’re wearing, huh?
Gyuutarou       You’re clean, and you have a good complexion. I bet you always have plenty
to eat and you sleep in a
nice, clean bed.
I bet that’s all you’ve ever known. Living
in a house that shelters
you from the rain and wind. Lucky you… Lucky you!
A guy who has it so good doesn’t
get to make such a racket. Sniveling
and moaning…
Gyuutarou       …
over one measly
eyeball.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) No one would help us. No surprises
there.
That was just the story of our lives. No one ever offered us a helping
hand.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) It started snowing.
We were never shown the slightest mercy, no matter
what the situation.
Why was that?
What happened to “fortune and misfortune are intertwined”?! Both fortune and misfortune should come by turns!
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Hey, what’s the matter?
You poor things.
I happen to be kindhearted, so I can’t
look the other way.
That girl is probably going to die any minute now.
Ah… I’ll give you some blood! Both of you!
If he chooses you, you can become demons.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Life is a sacred
thing. You should treasure it.
Now then… can you become demons…
a Twelve Kizuki
like me… and rise up to the Upper Ranks, I wonder.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) I don’t regret
becoming a demon.
No matter
how many times I’m reborn,
I’m going to be a demon every time. I’ll never show mercy to anyone who has a
better life. I’ll always be the Gyuutarou who seizes and collects!
But… if I did have one regret, that would be… Ume… You might’ve turned out
differently than me.
If you’d worked
at a better House, you could’ve become
a respectable oiran… If you’d been born to normal
parents, you could’ve been a normal girl… If
you’d been born into a good family, maybe you would’ve become a well-bred young
lady.
You have such an impressionable, pliant nature. Maybe you only turned out this way because I was the one who
raised you.
“Take before someone
takes from you.”
I taught you to collect from others,
and that’s why you stabbed that samurai in the eye. But if you’d done as he
said, you might’ve followed a different path.
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) My only regret…
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Ah… Fufu!
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) … was you, I guess.
Gyuutarou       What
is this place? Is this Hell?
Gyuutarou       Ah…
speaker: Daki
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
It’s awful
here! I don’t like this
place!
Where are we? I want to leave! Do
something!
Gyuutarou       You…
Look at you…
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
Is the exit that way?
Gyuutarou       Listen. Don’t follow me anymore.
Daki   B-But why? Wait, I -- Gyuutarou       I
said don’t follow me!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text: Are you mad about what I said? I’ll apologize, so forgive me!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
I
don’t think you’re ugly, Brother!
I was just bitter!
I was bitter because
we’d lost! I didn’t
want to admit that we’d lost because of me!
I’m sorry!
For not fighting
better! If only I
could’ve been more useful, then we wouldn’t have lost! I’m sorry I’m always
dragging you down!
Listen, Brother!
Gyuutarou       You’re not my sister
anymore. You’re nothing
to me.
I’m heading this way, so you go in the opposite
direction, toward the light.
Gyuutarou       Ah…
Hey!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
No… No!
I’m not leaving you! I’m never
going to leave you, okay?
We’re always
going to be together! No matter how many times
I’m reborn, I’m always
going to be your little sister! No matter what!
Please don’t hate me! Don’t scold me! Don’t leave me all by myself! I’ll never forgive
you
if you leave me behind!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
Wahhh! Because
we’re always going to be together!
You’re so mean. You’re
so mean! Don’t
you remember the promise we made?
Gyuutarou       Ah…
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
Have you forgotten?
Gyuutarou       (Flashback) The two of us together
can’t be beat! Being cold or hungry
doesn’t bother us at all!
I promise you! We’re always going to be together!
I’m never going to leave you!
See? You’re not afraid of anything now, are you?
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
I wonder if they made up.
It’s over, huh? I’m
exhausted.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present.
Tanjirou and Nezuko hold the last of Gyuutarou’s head in their hands.
His particles float into the sky and disappear.

text:
Oh? I see. Hmm. Six, huh?
That would be the lowest of the Upper Ranks. Well, six or not, you still defeated
an Upper Rank, so yes,
congratulations are in order. Right, six or not.
I don’t mind offering
you my praise.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
Well, not that your praise will do anything
for me.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text: That’s right!
speaker: Suma
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
You sure took your time getting
here.
speaker: Makio
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text: Y-Y-You took too long to get here! Way too long!
speaker: Suma
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text: Ahhh! Scary!
speaker: Suma
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text: Ow…
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
What are you going to do now that you’ve lost your left hand and left eye? How long will it take you to return to duty after battling this lowly Upper Six? Who’s
going to fill in for you until then?
speaker: Iguro
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
I’m retiring. There’s just no way I can still fight.
I’m sure the Master
will accept that.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
Don’t
be ridiculous. I refuse
to accept it. As it is, too many of the youngsters are dying on us before reaching their potential.
There’s still a vacant
Hashira spot now that Rengoku
is gone. Even someone as uninspiring as you would be better than
nothing at all. Battle on until you die.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
Nope, there is a youngster who’s about to reach his potential for sure.
That young guy you hate.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text: Hey… No way. Then, he survived? This battle… That Tanjirou Kamado?
speaker: Iguro
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district.
Iguro finds Uzui, Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma.

text:
Is that right? They defeated it? An Upper Rank?
Good job, Tengen, Tanjirou,
Nezuko, Zenitsu, Inosuke!
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon
Slayer Corps Headquarters. Two kasugai crows deliver the news to Kagaya.

text: Master Kagaya…
speaker: Amane
scene:
At the Demon
Slayer Corps Headquarters. Two kasugai crows deliver the news to Kagaya.

text:
For a hundred years…
For a hundred years, nothing
had changed! But now it has!
Amane…
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon
Slayer Corps Headquarters. Two kasugai crows deliver the news to Kagaya.

text:
Do you see? This is an omen!
Fate is about to take a dramatic turn!
The consequences will be widespread! Sweeping up everything around them, shaking them to their core! And finally,
they will reach that man.
Muzan Kibutsuji! We will defeat
you without fail during our generation! You, the sole blemish on my family!
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon
Slayer Corps Headquarters. Two kasugai crows deliver the news to Kagaya.

text:
Children, go boil some water. And fetch his medicine and some towels!
Hurry!
speaker: Amane
scene:
At the Demon
Slayer Corps Headquarters. Two kasugai crows deliver the news to Kagaya.

text:
The alternate dimension… The Infinity Castle.
The fact that I was summoned here means… that an Upper Rank was killed
by the Demon Slayers!
Oh, damn!
This hurts like hell!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Akaza is summoned.

text: But thank goodness, Lord Tengen!
speaker: Suma
scene:
In the ruins of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma help Uzui walk.

text:
Really. Thank goodness you’re
alive.
Hinatsuru        So, it’ll be all four of us returning
intact, right?
speaker: Makio
scene:
In the ruins of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma help Uzui walk.

text:
Yeah. Let’s
go home to a hero’s welcome. And be flashy
about it!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the ruins of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma help Uzui walk.

text:
Wahhh! Thank goodness!! We’re
alive!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the ruins of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma help Uzui walk.

text: Yeah! Yeah!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the ruins of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma help Uzui walk.

text:
You guys… I’m so glad you’re
alive!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the ruins of the entertainment district. Hinatsuru, Makio,
and Suma help Uzui walk.

text: Ah…    Found them!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At night, in the ruined entertainment district. Gotou searches
the area.

text: Everyone! I need you to come! They’re here!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At night, in the ruined entertainment district. Gotou searches
the area.

text: Is that right? They defeated it? An Upper Rank?
speaker: Kagaya
scene: At the Demon Slayer HQ. Kagaya hears the news of Gyuutarou and Daki’s deaths.

text: Master Kagaya?
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Demon Slayer HQ. Kagaya hears the news of Gyuutarou and Daki’s deaths.

text:
For a hundred years…
For a hundred years, nothing
had changed. But now it has!
Do you see? This is an omen!
Fate is about to take a dramatic turn!
The consequences will be widespread, sweeping up everything around them, shaking them to their core. And
eventually, they will reach that man!
Muzan Kibutsuji… We will defeat
you without fail during our generation! You, the sole blemish on my family!
speaker: Kagaya
scene: At the Demon Slayer HQ. Kagaya hears the news of Gyuutarou and Daki’s deaths.

text:
The alternate dimension… The Infinity Castle.
The fact that I was summoned
here means… that an Upper Rank was killed by the Demon Slayers!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Kibutsuji summons the Upper Rank demons.

text:
Hoho!
Well, well, if it isn’t you, Lord Akaza!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
So lovely
to see you in such good health!
How long has it been? 90 years? The thought that you might’ve
perished made my heart sing… Ah! Ahem! It
made my worried heart fill with anguish! Hoho!
Hantengu         Terrifying, terrifying! In the time we’ve been apart,
you’ve forgotten how to count, Gyokko.
It’s been 113 years since we were last summoned.
An indivisible number, unlucky
and uneven… An odd number!
Terrifying, terrifying!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Biwa woman! Is Lord Muzan not
here?
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: He has not yet arrived.
speaker: Nakime
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Then where’s Number One? Don’t tell me he’s been killed.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Woah, woah, woah!
Hold up a second, will you, Lord Akaza? Aren’t you even a little bit worried about me?
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
You don’t
know how dreadfully worried I was since you are all cherished comrades
of mine. And I’d be heartbroken if I lost any of my comrades.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Hah! Lord Douma…
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Hey there! Long time no see, Gyokko!
Is that a brand-new pot? It’s
a beauty! You know the pot you gave me? I’m displaying a woman’s head in it! It’s in my room.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Get your hand off me!
Hantengu         Eeek!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Wow, that was some punch. A bit stronger
than before, wouldn’t
you say, Lord Akaza?
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Search and detection aren’t
my strong suits,
either. I’m at my wits’
end.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Gahh! That’s hardly
fair! I’m the one who got the information in the first place!
How annoying is that?
But that’s what makes it
intriguing!
Ahh~…
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Lord Gyokko! What kind of information do you have?
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: I’d like to tag along.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: No, that wouldn’t be…
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Can’t you let me in on it? Please,
I’m begging --
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Did Lord Muzan give you any orders?
Get lost.
Hantengu         Eeek!
Kokushibou     Akaza…
You always go too far.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: It’s all right, Lord Kokushibou.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
I don’t mind in the least.
Kokushibou     It’s not for your benefit that I speak.
Disrupting the hierarchy… which, in turn, undermines
subordination, is what dismays me.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Oh, is that right? I see.
Kokushibou     Akaza…
If you are disgruntled, you should battle for a replacement.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Well, well!
If I may, Lord Kokushibou, even if he were to challenge us, Lord Akaza
could never defeat us.
And in my case, since I became a demon after Lord Akaza yet was promoted before him,
I’d be angry, too, if I were in his shoes. Don’t be so hard on him!
And besides,
I didn’t dodge that blow on purpose.
It’s just a little harmless
horseplay! This is how you
nurture friendship, you know.
Those of us on top shouldn’t
give our subordinates a hard time. Don’t you think --
Kokushibou     Akaza.
Kokushibou     Do you understand… what it is… I’m trying to say?
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
I understand.
I’m going to kill you… if it’s the last thing I do.
Kokushibou     Is that right?
Then do your best.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Goodbye, Lord Kokushibou! Goodbye!
Hantengu         Eeek!
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
It kind of feels like I got shut out of the conversation. But that’s just me overthinking it, right, Lord Akaza?
Hantengu         Eeek!
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Lord Akaza!
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Hup… Hup…
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Hey, I was talking to you…
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Please send Hantengu and myself to the same location!
Hantengu         Eeek!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Wait! Me, too! Ah… Hey! Biwa lady!
If you’re interested, would you join me for…
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: I respectfully decline.
speaker: Nakime
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Ugh… You’re all so cold to me.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In Douma’s
room. Douma finds himself back in the real world.

text: Lord Founder, your disciples have arrived.
speaker: Cultist
scene:
In Douma’s
room. Douma finds himself back in the real world.

text:
Oh, is that right? Sorry to keep everyone
waiting.
Here we go. All right. Let me put this on first.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In Douma’s
room. Douma finds himself back in the real world.

text:
Ready when you are! Please send them in.
Sumiyoshi       I’ve
brought you some tea.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In Douma’s
room. Douma finds himself back in the real world.

text:
Right. Thank you.
Sumiyoshi       Heh… Wow, look how soundly he’s sleeping.
Sorry about this. Looks
like my wife’s fast asleep,
too.
I really must apologize, making our guest
babysit like this.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
No need to apologize. She must be exhausted. It’s a lot of hard work,
giving birth and raising a child.
I’ll be leaving after I’ve had this.
It wouldn’t be right to keep eating for free here.
Sumiyoshi       Ah, don’t
say that! You saved our lives! If it hadn’t
been for you, not only would we be
dead, but this child wouldn’t have been born, either.
Sumiyoshi       Very
well. Then the least I can do is pass down your name to
posterity.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
No need for that.
Sumiyoshi       But didn’t you say you were at
a loss because you have no heirs? Even if a humble charcoal seller like myself can’t
do it, I’m sure that one day somebody will.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
No need for that.
Sumiyoshi… Those
who have mastered
their skill… share the same fate.
Even if it’s
a new era, even if you must take a different path to get there, you’ll
always find your way back to
the same place.
You seem to perceive
me as some kind of special person,
but you’re wrong about that.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
I failed
to protect anything
that was important to me, and throughout my life, I was unable to do what I was supposed to do.
My name is as worthless
as I am.
Sumiyoshi       Ahh… Please
don’t… Please don’t say something like that… Please,
I’m begging you! Don’t think of yourself like that!
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
So sad… So sad…
It… was a dream…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the Butterfly Mansion.
Tanjirou wakes up in an infirmary bed with tears in his eyes.

text: Where… am I?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the Butterfly Mansion.
Tanjirou wakes up in an infirmary bed with tears in his eyes.

text:
Are you okay? You’ve
been in a coma for two months ever since
that battle!
speaker: Kanao
scene:
In the present,
in the Butterfly Mansion.
Tanjirou wakes up in an infirmary bed with tears in his eyes.

text: Is that right? I see…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present,
in the Butterfly Mansion.
Tanjirou wakes up in an infirmary bed with tears in his eyes.

text: I’m so glad you woke up!
speaker: Kanao
scene:
In the present,
in the Butterfly Mansion.
Tanjirou wakes up in an infirmary bed with tears in his eyes.

text:
My name is Gotou. I’m a member
of the Demon Slayer Corps Cleanup Crew, a Kakushi.
During
the Hashira Meeting,
someone said to Tanjirou Kamado,
“Are you going to sleep all
day? Wake the hell up, will you?” That was me.
It seems fate tends to draw us together.
I was also the one who found him and his friends two months ago in the Entertainment District.
Since I found them like this, I thought, “They’re
pretty close!” Or so I thought,
until I saw that all three of them were critically wounded and comatose.
They’re
younger than me, and they became swordsmen who risked their lives
in battle, so I respect them wholeheartedly.
I have no clue about this one. What’s his
deal?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Hmph!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
And what I have here in my hands is premium castella.
To be honest,
it’s taking everything I have to stop myself
from gobbling it up this second.
But this is a gift for him since he’s still unconscious.
(Narration) They say he’s got a great sense of smell, so maybe…
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Clean up this mess! I swear, this girl never sees anything through! Gee, Kanao.
You never talk, and you’re such a weirdo! It’s all because
they made you slay
demons since you were a kid!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Ugh… Well, it’s not like I can scold her since she’s higher ranked
than me… even though I’m
already 23.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Excuse me. I’m going to set this castella
down, so please clear it away
after a while.
If it seems like it’s about to go bad, you can have it.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Oh, thank you… very much.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Hey, he’s out of his coma!!
Make some noise about that!!
You really are scatterbrained, you know that?!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
You’re supposed to call for someone!!
Say, “He’s regained
consciousness!”
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
You little idiot!!
Everyone’s worried,
okay?! Seniority doesn’t
mean jack, all right?! At least not in this case!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Kiyo! Sumi! Naho! Aoi! Tanjirou woke up from his coma!!
Wahhh! Wahhh!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Thank goodness
you’re okay!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Hehehe…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: You can have my sweet bean bread!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
There’s castella
on the bed!
speaker: Naho
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Geez.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Ahh! Oh my gosh, it’s a ghost!!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Oh, it’s just Aoi tangled up in the laundry!
speaker: Naho
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Thank goodness
you woke up! You went in my place! You guys… Wahhh!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Thank you. What about the others?
Are they all right?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: The kid with the yellow hair… Was it the day before yesterday?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
He’s back to work. I hear he’s already
out on a mission… against
his will.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Zenitsu woke up the next day.
speaker: Sumi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
The Sound Hashira walked
out with his wives’ help.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Man, ow! So annoying!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
The Kakushi all recoiled
at the sight. Too tough
to believe.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Wow…
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: I mean, they were reeling.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Hey Come on, now!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
So scary!
He’s standing on his own!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: We’re heading home! Come on!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
It’s scary!
It’s insane, huh? With those injuries?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
I see… What about
Inosuke?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Inosuke was also on the brink of death at one point.
speaker: Sumi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Inosuke was in such terrible shape!
Because of all the poison
in his body, he couldn’t stop the bleeding with his
breathing in time!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
I see… So I must be hallucinating Inosuke
stuck on the ceiling above
me.
Gotou, Sumi    Ahhh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: How are you doing that?!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Wahahaha! Good on you for noticing
me, Tanpachirou!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Well… I am lying
face-up…
I’m the guy who woke up seven days before you did!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
I’m so glad… Inosuke.
You’re amazing.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Fufufufu… Keep heaping on the praise!
And you! You’re
a weakling! Shame
on you for making us all worry!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
It’s you who’s not normal, Inosuke!
Lady Shinobu said as much herself, remember?
speaker: Naho
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Oh, wait, Tanjirou! Please
take a look at this book!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
This is a weasel
from a foreign country called a honey badger! It has a thick hide-like armor! Even getting bitten by a
lion can’t hurt it!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: It’s so cute.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Since it’s poison-proof, it’ll
just eat up poisonous snakes,
too!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Lady Shinobu
said that Inosuke
is just like this honey
badger!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Lady Kochou makes some irresponsible comments,
huh.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Maybe she just got tired of thinking about
him?
Hey… Come on! Get down from there!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: In other words, I’m immortal! Wahahaha!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
In your dreams. Are you an
idiot?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Who are you calling
an idiot?! Huh?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Ouch, ouch…
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Ahh! Stop it, please!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Hey! Knock it off, will you?!
Poison doesn’t have much effect on you, but neither does medicine, so you need to be careful like Lady Shinobu said!
You forget so easily!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: B-Be quiet…
speaker: Kanao
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Shut up! Quit yanking
at me, you shrimp!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
What’s that?
You’re not that much taller
than me!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Tanjirou is asleep, so please be quiet!
speaker: Kanao
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Oh, man! He went back into a
coma!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Would you mind not saying ominous
stuff like that?! Please just be quiet!
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Kanao? Let’s go cook some rice gruel.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Let’s hope he recovers
soon so he can eat tons of food!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: Yay!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou
stands up and holds Kiyo in the air.

text:
It’s like I’m the
wind!
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou
stands up and holds Kiyo in the air.

text: Let me go next!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
In the morning. Tanjirou
stands up and holds Kiyo in the air.

text:
A week later,
Tanjirou was back on his feet.
When we notified Gotou, who was away on an expedition, he was stunned
by the speed of Tanjirou’s recovery.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text:
Are you kidding
me? Beasts, all of them! Aoi        (Narration) Soon afterward, Inosuke
returned to duty. Inosuke      (Flashback)
I’m the strongest of all!
Sumi, Naho  (Flashback) Mmm…
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text:
Heading
out now!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text:
No!! I’m so cold! I’m so scared!
I’m going home! (Flashback) I’m lonely! No! Let me
go! Tanjirou!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text:
Oh, yes. Zenitsu
is still out on a mission far away, and the other Corps
members say it’s like a nonstop racket.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text:
Aoi! You just remembered me now!
Do you miss me? You miss me, right? Of course you miss me, don’t you?!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text:
Shut
up!
As for Tanjirou, he’s been doing his rehabilitation training every day.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Outside, in the yard of the Butterfly Mansion.
Aoi hangs sheets to dry.

text: Ouch, ouch, ouch…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: Ngh… So frustrating! I’ve got a long way to go before I gain back my stamina!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text:
Hey, wait! Did a new sword come while I was asleep? To replace the one I chipped!
Kiyo, Naho       Erk!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: A sword? A sword…
speaker: Naho
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text:
You did get some letters from Mr. Haganezuka… Would you like to see them?
Haganezuka    “I have no sword for the likes of you!”
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: This is… really bad…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: It is, isn’t it?
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text:
Two months went by, but no sword ever arrived.
And it was only chipped this time! I snapped it in two last time!
speaker: Sumi
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text:
Mmm… Swords are always getting damaged,
but Mr. Haganezuka just happens to be a bit difficult, doesn’t he?
speaker: Sumi
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: Why don’t you go to the village?
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: Maybe it would be best to talk to him directly.
speaker: Naho
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: The village?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: The village where all the swordsmiths live.
speaker: Kiyo
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text: Huh? I can go?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the training room.
Naho stretches out Tanjirou’s legs.

text:
Nice to meet you. As the Master has granted approval,
I shall be guiding you there.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Outside
the Butterfly Mansion.
A Kakushi greets Tanjirou.

text:
Nice to meet you! I’m Tanjirou
Kamado. Thank you for taking
me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside
the Butterfly Mansion.
A Kakushi greets Tanjirou.

text:
As your guide, I cannot tell you my name, but I look forward to serving you.
Now then, put these on.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Outside
the Butterfly Mansion.
A Kakushi greets Tanjirou.

text: What are they?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Outside
the Butterfly Mansion.
A Kakushi greets Tanjirou.

text:
A blindfold
and earplugs.
The village is hidden.
Also, I will be carrying
you on my back.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Outside
the Butterfly Mansion.
A Kakushi greets Tanjirou.

text:
Moreover, as you are known to have an acute sense of smell…
take these nose plugs.
Have a safe journey!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Outside
the Butterfly Mansion.
A Kakushi greets Tanjirou.

text:
The Swordsmith Village,
where Nichirin swords
are forged, is an extremely vital place for the Demon
Slayer Corps.
Its whereabouts must be kept secret to protect it from attacks.    That’s why
nobody knows where the village is.
Needless
to say, this lady doesn’t
know where it is, either.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text: I’ll leave him to you.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
Meaning
that after travelling a certain distance,
I get passed to another Kakushi.
Please leave
it to me! I hate bugs.
Reading is my hobby.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
Not only
that, but both routes and the Kakushi
get changed up again and again.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
I’m craving eel!
I want a girlfriend!
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
The Kakushi are guided to the next Kakushi by crows, but the crows do a lot
of switching up, too.
Please be careful on your way back!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
Haa… What a good
kid.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
I’m told that the mansion
where the Master
lives is hidden in an even more complex way. Seriously, smart people
are incredible!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere outside
the Butterfly Mansion. Several Kakushi carry Tanjirou
along the route to the Swordsmith Village.

text:
I’m going to remove
this now.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou finally arrives
at the Swordsmith Village.

text:
Ahh… Wow…
Wow, these buildings sure are amazing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou finally arrives
at the Swordsmith Village.

text:
Everyone who comes here says the
same thing. Tanjirou       And this scent… There must be a hot spring nearby! Kakushi     Yes, you’re right about that!
Please go there later to refresh
yourself. But first
things first, turn left at the end of this street, and you’ll find the chief’s
home. Please go there to greet him before you do anything else.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou finally arrives
at the Swordsmith Village.

text: Right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou finally arrives
at the Swordsmith Village.

text: I’ll be taking my leave now, but I wish you the best.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou finally arrives
at the Swordsmith Village.

text:
I just heard an echo of gratitude.
Does that mean someone’s here? I think
I feel my heart pounding!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the late afternoon. Tanjirou finally arrives
at the Swordsmith Village.

text:
Hello there! I’m the chief of this village,
Tecchin Tecchikawahara. Nice to meet you!
The smallest
person in the village… and the most important is me. Wel, why don’t you bow your head so low that your
forehead touches the mat?
I’m Tanjirou Kamado! It’s a privilege
to meet you!
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text: Well, what a fine boy. Come here. Have some sweets.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text: These are delicious!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
Aren’t they?
Oh, about
Hotaru, at this time,
he seems to have gone missing. We’re searching for him,
too, so please be patient.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text: Hotaru?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text: That’s right. Hotaru Haganzuka.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
That’s such a cute
name!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
Right? I’m the one who named him! But Hotaru himself
said it was too cute and blasted me.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text: That’s sad.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
Haa… That boy’s been like this since he was a child. He loses his temper just like that and falls off the face of the earth.
Sorry about that.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
No, please! It’s my own fault for breaking
my sword and chipping it so easily!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
No, you’re wrong about
that.
He’s the one who forged a faulty sword, so it’s all on him.
Swordsmith     As soon as he’s found, we’ll apprehend him and bring
him back here, so please
rest assured.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text: Uhh… You… aren’t gonna hurt him, right?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
I hear that you haven’t healed
enough yet to hunt down demons. If Hotaru hasn’t
forged another sword by then, I’ll assign someone else to be your
swordsmith.
Our hot spring can work wonders
on a weakened body, so go have a good,
long soak.
Swordsmith     I’ll
show you the way.
speaker: Tecchin
scene: At Tecchikawahara’s office. Tanjirou finds Tecchikawahara.

text:
I hope this won’t
turn into an
argument.
Swordsmith     There
are foundries and workshops all over this
village.
Swordsmith     That’s
how all your swords are forged.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
It’s thanks to you all that we can wield our swords, isn’t it? Thank
you very much!
Swordsmith     Oh, please. It’s our job, so no need to thank us.
Swordsmith     The hot spring is at the top of this hill. It has all kinds of healing properties. Cuts, burns, hemorrhoids, bleeding piles, constipation, everything
from gout to the pain of a broken heart. It works on anything, so please treat
yourself to a leisurely soak.
Swordsmith     I’ll
be down here preparing your meal.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Right! Thank you so much!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
Ahhh! It’s you, Tanjirou!
Tanjirou!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
Ah! Watch out!
Please be careful! Your breasts are this close to spilling
out!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
Listen to me! Listen,
will you?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Gah… Watch out!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
Wahhh! Just now, up there, I got ignored!
I said hello, but he ignored me!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Who ignored you?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
I don’t know!
So I asked
his name, only to be ignored!
Isn’t that awful?
I’m a Hashira, you know?! And now all the good vibes I got from my
bath have been cancelled out!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
I hear dinner will be ready soon. It’s supposed to be matsutake
rice!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: What?! For real?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Wow! It’s so spacious!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Ouch… Hm?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: A front tooth? Did somebody drop a tooth?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Guh… Ngh…
speaker: Genya
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
Ah… That mohawk-style haircut…
Right, the name I heard from Sumi…
Genya Shinazugawa!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Ah… Die!
speaker: Genya
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Hmph! Ngh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
Long time no see! How’ve you been? I meant to ask.
Are you and the Wind Hashira
related?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text: Stop talking to me, dammit!
speaker: Genya
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou leaves Tecchikawahara’s office.

text:
And here I thought
we could bond in our nakedness… Making
new friends sure is tough.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the hot spring by himself.

text: Mmm~…
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the hot spring by himself.

text: Wow, that’s impressive!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: You think so? I really only nibbled today.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text:
I’m going to eat plenty, too, so I can get strong!
Oh, I almost forgot.
The guy you met at the hot spring
was Genya Shinazugawa, who was my fellow swordsman.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Huh? Is that so?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Mm… Mm?
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text:
That
would make him Mr. Shinazugawa’s younger brother, right? But Mr. Shinazugawa
said he didn’t have a younger
brother. I wonder
if they’re on bad terms. That’s just heart- wrenching.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Is that right? I wonder why.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Mm, mm…
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Hm? What is it, Nezuko?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Mmm~!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text:
There, there!
There are five of us siblings
in my family, and we all get along, so it’s hard for me to fathom. I thought, “Those Shinazugawa
brothers are scary!”
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text:
Genya still hasn’t shown up. I was hoping
we could at least have a talk.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text:
I
don’t think he’s coming. I heard the villagers saying
that he never takes meals.
I wonder if he brought something
with him.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: I wonder if he’s all right. I’ll bring him some rice balls later.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Good idea! Let’s do that!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

text: Nezuko, Nezuko!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
You know what? The sight
of these rice balls is making me hungry again!
Don’t tell anyone, okay?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Why did you join the Demon
Slayer Corps, Ms. Kanroji?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Hm? Me?
This is embarrassing! Oh dear,
what should I do? You want to hear? Well,
it’s… to find the gentleman with whom I’ll be spending eternity!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
I mean, any girl would prefer
someone stronger than herself, right?
Because we want to be protected! Do you know what
I mean? Or maybe it’s hard for a boy to understand!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
See, Hashira are powerful,
right? But it’s not like you can just meet up with one!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Huh…?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: So I knew I’d have to become a Hashira myself!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Gahh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: And I worked really hard!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Genya doesn’t seem to be here.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Lady Kanroji?
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
They’ll be done honing your sword soon. We’d like you to come to the workshop to make
some final adjustments.
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Oh my, it looks like I
have to go now.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Please don’t mind us. I’ll be happy to walk you over.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
That’s all right. I’ll probably be leaving in the middle
of the night.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Oh, but… I see, then… Mmm…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Tanjirou… We might not live to see each other again,
but let’s fight the good fight!
You took on an Upper Rank demon and survived. That kind of experience is
priceless!
Nothing can ever top what you’ve
learned from firsthand
experience. It’s equal to five years, no, ten years of hard
training!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Right now, Tanjirou, you’re
far stronger than you ever were before!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Mitsuri Kanroji is rooting
for the Kamado siblings! Hehehe!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
But I’ve still got a long ways to go. Mr. Uzui
just let me win, that’s
all.
I’ll work even harder…
to defeat Muzan
Kibutsuji!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Mm~…
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Oh~!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: My…
speaker: Kakushi
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Tanjirou, you’ve been granted
permission for a long stay, right?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Uh, yes, that’s what I’ve been told.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
They say there’s a secret
weapon in this village that will
make you stronger.
Try to find it, okay?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Bye now!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text: Grahhh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Mm?!
You’re starting me off with a feast this morning!
Swordsmith     These wild vegetables were all picked
on the mountainside here. And the fish was caught fresh from the river this morning.
Swordsmith     The chief sent word that he’ll be contacting you as soon as they’ve
found Mr. Haganezuka. Until
then, please build back your stamina and get some rest.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou carries a tray of tea and rice balls.
Kanroji walks with Nezuko.

text:
Thank you for this
meal!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Back inside the lodge. Tanjirou sits down for breakfast.

text: Mm… Mm…
speaker: Nezuko
scene: Back inside the lodge. Tanjirou sits down for breakfast.

text: Hey, listen, Nezuko…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Back inside the lodge. Tanjirou sits down for breakfast.

text: Mmm?
speaker: Nezuko
scene: Back inside the lodge. Tanjirou sits down for breakfast.

text:
… I know I have to rest up,
but while I’m waiting for Mr. Haganezuka, I wanna look for the secret weapon that’ll make you stronger,
the one Ms. Kanroji told me about.
Wanna come with me?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Back inside the lodge. Tanjirou sits down for breakfast.

text: I wonder what kind of weapon it is.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
It has to be a sword,
right? You think it’s buried
in the ground, maybe? Isn’t this exciting, like a treasure hunt?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
I really like it here, but that hot spring smell is so overpowering.
Mmm… I guess not being at full strength
is affecting my sense of smell.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Quit pestering me! Give it a rest!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
I’ve had enough of you holding
out on me. You’re wasting
my time, arguing
with me.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: A kid? And the other one is…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Which part of “no” don’t you get? Get lost!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Huh? That’s a Hashira.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Why should I have to hand it over to you?!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
What did Ms. Shinobu
say his name was?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: I don’t care if you’re a Hashira or whatever! You’re too full of yourself!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Just get out of my sight!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
The Mist Hashira, Muichirou Tokitou!
So there’s another Hashira
here at the village.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Give me the key.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
I’m not handing it over! My ancestor made this, and it’s precious
to me!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: Huh? Wait, is there someone else behind them?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text: I said I’m not giving it to you!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
Ah… Is that… a person? Who could it be?
I know him. I’ve… seen that man before!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later. Tanjirou explores
the village.

text:
Get lost, will you?! I’m not giving you that key, no matter
what! And don’t think I’m ever going to show you how to use it!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text:
What’s going on? Are those
two fighting?
What should I do? It’s bad manners
to eavesdrop! But if they’re
fighting, I should try to
mediate…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text:
What do you think you’re doing?!
Take your hands off him!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text: Your voice is very annoying. Who are you?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text:
How could you do that to a little
kid? Take your hands… Ngh! (Thoughts) He’s not even budging!
He’s got thinner
arms than me, and he’s not even that big!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text:
You take your hands
off me.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text: You’re quite weak.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text:
It’s a wonder you got into the Demon
Slayer Corps.
I’m getting a strange
vibe from that box. A demon’s presence,
perhaps?
What’s inside? That box there…
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text:
Don’t you dare touch
it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Kotetsu argues with Tokitou. Something that looks like Yoriichi stands behind Kotetsu.

text: Ahh… Huh?
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: He took him.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: L-Let go of me!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: You must be dizzy. That’s dangerous!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: Get out of here!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
I’m not… I’m not giving that key to anyone! Not even if you torture
me! One more time, and it’s
going to break down!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
Have you been through
torture training?
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
Even most grown-ups can’t take it. You’d never last. I can see that you’re
stupid beyond belief.
So what if it breaks down? Just make another one. How
many people do you think will
perish while you drone on and on about trivial matters?
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
That’s what it means to obstruct a Hashira in his duty. A Hashira’s time is worth far more than time spent by you people. If you
think a little, you’ll eventually get that, won’t you?
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: Swordsmiths can’t fight.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: You can’t save lives.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: Making weapons is all you’re good for.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
Come on. The key. Remember your place whenever
you take action.
You’re not a baby
anymore.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
I just… I
don’t know why, but… I can’t
stand you! What is it? Tact, maybe?
You have no tact, and you’re cruel!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text: You think this is cruel? You…
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
You’re not wrong! I admit that what you’re
saying is mostly
true, and it’s probably not wrong! But being a swordsmith is an
important, vital job!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
Swordsmiths have amazing skills
that are totally
different from ours! The fact is that if we didn’t have them to forge our swords,
we couldn’t do anything, could we?
Swordsmen and swordsmiths need each other!
We’re all fighting
the same battle!
Day in and day out, each in
our own way, we’re fighting --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
Sorry… but I don’t have time to stand
here listening to your boring speech.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: In the Swordsmith Village. Tokitou looks at his hand.

text:
What should I do? Can I carry
him down by myself? Haganezuka       No, I’ll carry him, as long as he doesn’t come to soon. Tanjirou    Ngh…
Haganezuka    Huh? His eyelids are twitching! He’s about to wake up!
See you!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Huh? Hey!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Ah… Are you okay?
You shouldn’t get up so fast.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Was Mr. Haganezuka here?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Wasn’t he here just now?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Uh, no, he wasn’t
here! Haha~!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
I see. So I was just imagining things.
Ah… Where’s that Hashira?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: I handed over the key, so he took off.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
So you handed it over, huh? I know you didn’t
seem to have a choice.
Well, since I don’t know what’s going on, I shouldn’t
be making a fuss about it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Oh no, don’t say
that!
It made me happy.
I’m a stranger to you, but you stood up for me. Thank
you very much!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
No, I wasn’t that much help!
Where’s that man or whatever who was standing
here?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: That was a mechanical doll.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Mechanical doll?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
That guy just took it away with him. He needed
the key to make the doll move.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
So it’s really important
to you, huh?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: But what would a Hashira want with it?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
That one’s special.
That mechanical doll can overpower
a human, and it’s capable of 108 moves.
It can be used to train for combat.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: So that’s why…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: But… now it’s…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: That guy must’ve already…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Against a Hashira… Wow!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: That’s the mechanical doll built by my ancestors, Yoriichi Type Zero.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: But… why does he have six arms?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
His arms? According to my father,
that doll was modeled on an actually
swordsman, but his moves
couldn’t be replicated unless they gave it six arms.
That face… It somehow seems familiar, but I’m not
sure.
That swordsman… Who was he? What did he do and
where?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Uh, sorry, but I don’t know too much about him, either. He was from the Sengoku
Period.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: S-Sengoku? You mean he lived more than 300 years ago?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: That’s what I was told.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
That doll has never
broken down in all that time?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
The technology’s so mind-blowing that we can’t
catch up to it today.
If it were to break down, there’d be no fixing
it.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
My father passed away suddenly, and I have no brothers
or sisters. I’m the one who’s
supposed to step up now, but since I’m no good with swords or mechanical dolls…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
So that’s why you were so… Right, I get
it.
That guy’s incredible. He’s only around my age… but he’s a Hashira,
and he’s so talented.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Well, what did you expect?
speaker: Crow
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
After all, he’s a descendant of the wielder
of the Sun Breathing technique!
That boy is a prodigy! He’s in a different league than the likes of you! Hohoho~!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Are you Tokitou’s crow? The first
breathing style, Sun Breathing? So he’s really
that amazing…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.
