text: But that’s not Sun Breathing that he’s using now, is it?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
You shut your mouth,
or I’ll gouge
out your eyes!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Ah… Hey, I remember
now! That dream!
I saw that man in a dream!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Huh?! Are you an idiot or what?! Have you been to this village before?
That’s so preposterous, you
make me laugh!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
You mean you’ve met a warrior
from the Sengoku
Period? How old are you, exactly?
speaker: Crow
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Listen, I’m sorry. There’s
something wrong with me, right?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
No, no!
Maybe it’s an inherited memory?
People talk about it all the time in our village.
It isn’t just your physical
form that gets passed on. Living creatures pass on
their memories, too.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: What you saw in your dream must’ve been your ancestor’s memory!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Preposterous! Preposterous! Tanjirou   That’s
so kind of you! Thanks! Crow  Blegh!
speaker: Crow
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
I’m Tanjirou.
What’s your name?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
I’m Kotetsu. Don’t pay any attention
to that mean female crow.
Ah… His armor!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text: Ah… Kotetsu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Kotetsu worries
about the situation.

text:
Kotetsu! Kotetsu! I’m going to find you! I’ve got a great sense of smell!
Even if it’s not in good shape right
now.
I think he went this way…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
Kotetsu! Could you have climbed any higher, Kotetsu?
If there’s
anything I can do, I’ll help you out. You can’t
give up on your doll! You have a future ahead of you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
You have to try hard now for your future self… ten, twenty
years from now! Someday,
you’ll be able to do what you can’t do now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
No,
I won’t! I don’t need anyone
to tell me that I’m a loser! It’s all
going to end with my generation! All because of me!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
You can’t give up and stop caring. I wish you wouldn’t talk about yourself
that way.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
He came without
making a sound.
That’s what a swordsman can do.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
Even if you can’t do it
yourself, there’s always
someone who will carry on for you. You
have to do what you can so that it gets passed on.
Even if it’s beyond
you, maybe your kids or grandkids might find a way, right?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
I
want to defeat Muzan Kibutsuji. I want to save my sister, who’s
been turned into a
demon. But I might die before I can fulfill my goals.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
But
I have faith that someone will surely finish the job for me. Just like we were
able to beat an Upper Rank demon with the lives that were connected
for us, someday, for sure, the lives we’ve connected will bring
down Kibutsuji!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text:
Let’s do our best together!
I didn’t want to
see the doll break down, but my mind is made up now. The combat training should last
until nightfall, so I’m going to brace myself
to see it through to the end.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forests
of the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou
looks for Kotetsu.

text: Oh? So you’re ten, Kotetsu?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: My little brother is --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Huh? You’re done?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text:
I’m done. That was a good training session.
Who are you again? Oh, right.
My sword snapped,
so…
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text:
… I’ll be taking
this one with me.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Ah… Ngh!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Kotetsu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Dispose of that one for me.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text:
Not a whiff of malice. He must not be doing that on purpose.
(Thoughts) But the thing is…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text:
… that crow is just oozing spite.
She’s so condescending toward me.
Ah! Kotetsu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Kotetsu… Let’s make sure. Let’s see if it still works or not.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Nothing. So it must be…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text:
All right! It’s working,
Kotetsu! That’s great…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text:
Yes, it is, Tanjirou.
I want you to train with this doll and become stronger
than that indifferent little jerk, no matter what! And you will have my full
support!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Huh? Does he mean right now?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou and Kotetsu
walk through the forest.

text: Ahhh! I’m gonna die! Six arms is too much!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
There are only five arms! Since that jerk broke one off, it’s less functional now!
Tanjirou, please become stronger!
And this is what you’re
going to say to him…
“Is that all you’ve
got, you scumbag?”
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
“Your hair is too long! Get a haircut,
seaweed head!”
“Pissant! You’re ugly, and your legs are short!”
“Commit harakiri! You shameless jerk!”
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
You’re going to say
them!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text: Please say them! Please!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
Even without my saying so, Tokitou was incredible! Despite
being smaller and younger than me.
I’ve got to train just as hard!
I’ve got to become stronger,
too!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text: Grr! Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text: Urgh! Ugh… Urgh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
Tanjirou! If that’s enough
to kill you, you’re pathetic! Keep working at it! I’m going to say it one more time! Look at me!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text: You’re moving out of habit, Tanjirou, all right?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
You’re not deciding how to move after observing your opponent’s moves.
That’s why you’re no good! Do
you understand?
In other words,
you don’t have the basics down! I’m really amazed you’ve managed to survive
this long in the Demon Slayer Corps! You’re cutting it close with everything
you do! Well, I’m here to denounce
your ever weak point backward
and forward! I’m not giving you any food until you can do
everything I tell you to!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text: Ahh… Right…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some time later. Tanjirou
spars with the Yoriichi mechanical doll.

text:
Tanjirou, you’re too slow! Epic fail!
If that doll wasn’t
armed with practice
sticks, you’d be dead! Get a hold of yourself!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text: This is day five! Starting tomorrow, I’m going to arm the doll with swords!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text:
No, even the practice
sticks could kill me! I’m going to die!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text: No food for you today, either!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text:
Ahh… The highly
analytical Kotetsu!
But as a swordsmanship instructor, he was a total amateur. Since he had no
idea about the limits of a human
life, his training
sessions were brutal!
So tyrannical that he’d withhold food and water from you
if you failed to meet his demands!
After three days or so without water,
a human will seriously die.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text: Mmm!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text:
Pure tyranny born out of
ignorance!
Though
I was able to survive,
thanks to some rainfall.
Gahhh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later.
Tanjirou continues to train. He gets struck
by the mechanical doll.

text:
All through these ghastly training
sessions, I went without water, food, or sleep.
I started to cross the River to the Afterlife.
I was walking
across a bridge,
feeling indescribably blissful,
only to get dizzy from hunger
and fall into the river.
It was dark in the water and heavy, but then it felt
as though I were being massaged by some warm hands.
I saw something shiny when I glanced
toward the bottom
of the river, so when I went to get it, all while being
massaged.
Strangely enough, I could smell this shimmering stone
even underwater.
What is this smell? It smells different
from the opening
thread. Ah!
Left side of the head! Neck! Right side of the chest! Left side!
(Thoughts) Right thigh! Right shoulder!
Here it comes!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later. Tanjirou
continues to train,
now with real swords.

text:
You got one strike
in, Tanjirou! Though it was so feeble
that the doll didn’t even flinch!
I’m going to give you some
food!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Some days later. Tanjirou
continues to train,
now with real swords.

text:
Rice balls and pickled
plums! And I want high-quality gyokuro tea!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Some days later. Tanjirou
continues to train,
now with real swords.

text: Tasty!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou eats his first meal.

text:
All right… All right! I see how he’s going to move!
I can see it way better than before! I can keep up now that I have my stamina back!
Now, I can tell by the scent where he’s going to strike!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
I can pick up this scent sooner
than I can see the opening thread!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
All right. I’m going for it! One strike with all my might!
(Thoughts) Ah… But what if it breaks?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text: Strike!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
I don’t care if it breaks!
I’ll fix it, no matter
what!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
Tanjirou, you’re too nice!
You can’t hesitate
now!
But that’s who you are, Tanjirou, and I don’t want you to die!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
I want you… to become
stronger than anyone else!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text: Tanjirou! Are you okay?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
Ow, ow, ow… S-Sorry,
I broke the sword you lent me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text: Don’t worry about that! It’s okay!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text: Something came out! K-Kotetsu! Something came out! What is that thing?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
Hey, hey! I have no idea,
either!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
What could that be? At the very least,
it’s a sword from over 300 years
ago, right?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Sometime
later. Tanjirou gets back to training with the mechanical doll.

text:
What could that be? At the very least,
it’s a sword from over 300 years
ago, right?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
It probably is. This is crazy,
huh? What should
we do?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
Tanjirou! You were at a loss because you couldn’t get a new sword forged,
right? I’m thinking it would
be all right if you took this sword!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text: No, no, no! That wouldn’t be right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
The steel they used in the Sengoku Period
is the best quality ever!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text: No, no, I couldn’t!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
But we only found
it because you came here!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
That’s because
it already had a battle history stored inside,
and I just happened to be
there when it broke! So no!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text: Are you sure about that? Really?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
Want to pull it out
just to take a look?
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou trains with the Yoriichi
mechanical doll. He dodges an attack and blocks it with his sword.

text:
Sure! I know I’d like to see it!
Ahhh~…

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text: Stop trying to flee…
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text: … like a pesky gnat! Ngh!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text:
Now I remember. I was knocked out by that demon with the fan! Nezuko
came to before I did!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text:
Curses! Could they be any slower?!
Karaku! Blast it away!
I was just about
to do that anyway!
Think! You’ve got to think!
How to inflict massive damage
on the enemy! An attack
that they can’t recover from right away!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text: Damn.
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text: Hey, brat… Die!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text: It’s all over for you now!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou smells
something unfamiliar.

text:
Hahaha! Now that’s what you call a fine view!
All right… Now there’s
nowhere for you to scurry
around and hide!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village,
at the ruined building. Sekido
and Karaku admire
their handiwork.

text:
Ngh… Dammit! The rubble!
Nezuko, it’s okay! I’d never abandon
you!
Let go of my sword! I’ll clear away the rubble,
okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village,
at the ruined building. Sekido
and Karaku admire
their handiwork.

text: Nezuko! Stop it! You’re going to cut your fingers!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village,
at the ruined building. Sekido
and Karaku admire
their handiwork.

text: It certainly blew up completely.
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village,
at the ruined building. Sekido
and Karaku admire
their handiwork.

text:
Once this smoke clears,
it will spell their demise.
Nezuko! Stop! You have to stop!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village,
at the ruined building. Sekido
and Karaku admire
their handiwork.

text: Ngh… Ngh… Ngh…!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village,
at the ruined building. Sekido
and Karaku admire
their handiwork.

text:
Hyo, hyo! A
pleasure to meet you! My name is Gyokko. Before
I kill you, might I
ask for a minute of your time?
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Why are you closing
in on me?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Because we’d be scared on our own.
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
I’d be delighted to show my artwork to my three
guests tonight!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Artwork? What are you talking about?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Now then, let me start with this piece!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Ah… Ahh… Ah… Ah…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Behold, “Death Throes of the Smiths”!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Uncle Tetsuhiro!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Yes! You’re absolutely right!
For this piece, I used five swordsmiths to lavish, extravagant effect!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
I didn’t expect you to be this moved!
Moreover, I’ve truly brought
out their swordsmith qualities by piercing
them with swords! I left these hyottoko masks on to
juxtapose emptiness and absurdity. Needless to say, this, too, was a deliberate
choice! And this is the best part!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Ahhh! Stop it! Ngh… Ugh…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
What do you think?
Isn’t it marvelous?! I’ve reproduced their
death throes!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Hey. You’d better knock it off, you piece of crap.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Hyo!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
I’m not done describing my artwork!
Kindly hear me out to the
end.
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
It can teleport
from one vase to another.
I see.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
What I especially take pride in is the vase’s
--
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: I can barely feel it.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
It got away again. It can
move fast. Now it’s over there.
Those vases pop up out of nowhere.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
You have a lot of
gall, slashing it! My vase! My art! You have no eye for beauty, you damn ape!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: How are those vases spawned?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
You bastards
with muscles where your brains
should be… Clearly,
you lack the ability to appreciate my artwork! Which, in a way,
is fine!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: No… But since it’s so intent on fleeing, then unlike that clone demon… beheading this one will kill it.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Thousand Needle Fish Kill!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Mr. Tokitou!
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: I’m sorry… I… I…
speaker: Kotetsu
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Hyo, hyo, hyo! Look at you, riddled with needles… A comical sight,
indeed!
How do you like
it? The poison must slowly be numbing your limbs, right? So very comical! You saved some worthless
lives, and now you’re going to die in a worthless
place. So worthless, it doesn’t matter whether they exist or not.
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Because
your lives are worthless!
speaker: Demon
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Who’s that? I can’t remember.
I think someone
said the same thing to me years
ago. Who was it?
It was summer.
It was hot. We’d left the door open.
I guess because
it was too hot, the cicadas
were buzzing really loud.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Hyo, hyo! Still, you are a Hashira, even looking like that. What kind of artwork should
I produce? Oh, I’m giddy!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Shut up. It’s all your talk that’s worthless.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Blood Demon Art, Water
Prison Pot!
Death by suffocation is rather stylish.
Beautiful! And that chilling feeling
of a blade pressed against your neck… Now that’s simply sublime!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
It’s no good. I can’t
slash it.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
I just stopped a Demon Slayer’s
greatest weapon, his breathing. I can barely
contain myself, just imagining your face twisted in agony! Hyo, hyo!
Obliterating
this village will be a devastating blow to you Demon Slayers. Once we’ve
brought the Demon Slayers to their knees,
even Ubuyashiki’s head will be within reach! Hyo, hyo!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Nezuko! Please let go of my sword! Nezuko!

scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
The sword’s ablaze with Nezuko’s
blood! (Thoughts) The sword’s changing color!
The temperature’s rising,
and my black sword is turning red! Enveloped in exploding blood! This is…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: … Exploding Blood Sword!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
So it turns red, right?
A samurai’s sword turns red only during
battle, right?
speaker: Suyako
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Why is that? So mysterious! Even though normally,
it’s pitch-black like obsidian…
speaker: Suyako
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: Who is that?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
It’s so beautiful, isn’t it?
Oh, right. This is an inherited memory.
The samurai she’s talking about…
Could it be that swordsman with the earrings?
Was that swordsman’s sword pitch-black?
I’ve got
a black sword just like his. And my own sword just turned red, too! It changed color!
This
sword turned red thanks to the power of Nezuko’s blood, so even if it was through
a different method
than that swordsman’s, right now, my sword is just
like his.
You may think
you’ve gotten stronger, but there are always even more
powerful demons.
I’m only flesh and blood,
so my body is scarred
and battered, but… every
time, someone comes to my aid! They keep me alive!
I have to meet their
expectations!
Everyone
who’s helped me out has just one wish, just one desire!
To defeat the demons! To
protect human lives!
speaker: Suyako
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
I have to come through
for them!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Fufu… Even if you resort to cheap tricks,
you can’t beat me.
speaker: Karaku
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: You can slash me, but I won’t feel a thing!
speaker: Urogi
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
A burning blade… Raging Sword…
Lord Muzan’s memories… The sword of a swordsman who drove Lord Muzan into
a corner… and nearly beheaded him!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: I see that swordsman in him.
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: Hinokami Kagura… Sun Halo Dragon…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: Guh… Gahh!
speaker: Urogi
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: … Head Dance!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
I’ve been thinking
about that one blow all this time… The reason
why I was able to cut off Gyuutarou’s head with that blow.
How I felt in that moment, my breathing, the way I exerted myself…
The way my whole body felt
like it was on fire, and my forehead!
Now I know. I can do it now!
Just one more! I need to slash all four at once!
(Thoughts) Where’s the last one?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Genya!
So you’re okay!
He beheaded the fourth demon!
That’s great! That’s
great!
Was it simultaneous? If it was at the same time…
Genya --
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Ngh… Ngh…
Is that Genya? Why… does he look like that?
(Thoughts) It’s like…
speaker: Genya
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: Ngh… Ngh…
speaker: Genya
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: It’s like…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Genya!
Ngh… Ngh… Ngh… Ngh…!

Tanjirou turns to Genya, who appears to have beheaded

text: Ngh… Ngh… Ngh… Ngh…

Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Gen… ya…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
What kind of slashing
attack was that?! I can’t regenerate!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: The attack worked!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
The pain is scorching
me!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Calm down! You’re pathetic!
It takes time, but we can regenerate!
I don’t know what’s going on with Genya, but I’ve figured
something out because he
slashed one of them!
Looks
like even if we behead all four at the same time,
we can’t finish them off
like we did Gyuutarou!
Attacking
these four Emotion
Demons is pretty much pointless! Ah… Nezuko!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Mm… Ngh!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Something’s been bothering me all this time. (Thoughts) Is it possible
that their heads aren’t their
vital spots?
Something
felt so off. That scent that I caught for just an instant… Right.
That was… the scent of a fifth demon!
There’s
a fifth demon! I have to find it… I have to find the fifth and kill it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Ngh… Don’t get so full of yourself! I’m the one who’s going to defeat…
an Upper Rank!
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Genya…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
You didn’t defeat Upper Six on your own! That’s why you haven’t
become a Hashira!
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Uh, yeah, that’s right!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: You can bet… that I’m going to… beat you to it!
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Genya! You’re drooling, okay? What’s wrong?
Not to mention, you’re choking
me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
I’m the one who’s going to become a
Hashira!
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
I
see! I get it, sure! Nezuko and I
will give you our full support!
Let’s give it our all, all
three of us!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
I’m sure there’s a fifth demon somewhere. I’ll look for it,
so I want you to buy me some time!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
I know what you’re up to! You’re just making me let my guard down,
and… Huh?
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Ah… Look out!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
The Anger Demon’s
revived already! Hurry!
Genya! I’ll let you know as soon as I’ve found the fifth demon, so keep these demons at bay!
They’ve all regenerated, dammit!
Ngh… Grr…
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Whatever you do, just don’t slash Nezuko! She’s my little
sister!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Gah… Ngh…
speaker: Urogi
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Where’s that fifth
demon?
I have to find it while Genya and Nezuko
are fending off the others!
Thanks
to the wind created by that demon with the fan, the sulfur smell from
the hot springs is gone!
Find it! Concentrate!
Hantengu         Eek… It’s all right…
They’ll never find me! It’s all right… My four Emotions will defeat
those villains for me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Found it! Found it, found it, found it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Genya!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Ngh… Urogi!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Go straight, northeast! Ngh…
The fifth demon’s hiding
itself close to the ground!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Go after it! I’ll cover you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Northeast!
speaker: Genya
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Crap, more lightning!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Nezuko! Go help Genya! Don’t let the Lightning
Demon get in Genya’s way!
Don’t let yourself
get swept away! Stay in this spot, no matter
what! Ah…!
This is bad! Here comes
a lightning attack,
too!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text: Ngh… Gah…
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the Swordsmith Village.
Tanjirou and Genya stare at each other.

text:
Hyo, hyo, hyo!
Is it excruciating? It must be
excruciating!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tokitou is trapped
in Gyokko’s Blood Demon Art.

text: So it’s the same everywhere?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tokitou is trapped
in Gyokko’s Blood Demon Art.

text:
Hyo, hyo, hyo! Not only are you unable
to unleash your breathing techniques, but you’ll soon be
drawing your last breath in there, too!
Hyo, hyo, hyo! Hyo, hyo, hyo! That look of fake stoicism… How very sublime
it is! My creative juices are simply gushing!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tokitou is trapped
in Gyokko’s Blood Demon Art.

text:
Don’t fight back. You’re making me sad.
Sekido.
speaker: Aizetsu
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
I know! I’m going to crucify
her --
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
That youngster is even faster
than before!
No… Even from the moment
I first met him, he’s exceeded all of his reports! (Thoughts) Those unbelievable
reflexes! His ability to adapt himself in combat!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
That explosive growth
he displays when he’s on the brink!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text: Gah! Ahh!
speaker: Aizetsu
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text: Damn! (Thoughts) Karaku! Karaku!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text: You little punk!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text: All right! Now I just gotta go after that bullet-popping kid!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
Damn… I’ve been slashed!
Damn you, punk!
To your right! It’s moving south!
Search for it!
speaker: Karaku
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
Ngh… Jeez! I am searching for it! I’ve been searching
for it all this time! (Thoughts) A spell? I can’t see it
because of another spell?!
Crap, crap, crap! Where are you?! The longer this goes on, the closer
I get to being depleted!
Ngh… Turn west! More to the right! It’s nearby! Down below!
Where
are you?! Where --
speaker: Genya
scene:

text:
My mom was such a tiny person.
I grew taller than her at an early age.
My mother was always working,
from morning until
night. Not once did I see
her sleeping.
My father was not only a big guy,
but he was also a good-for-nothing.
He got stabbed to death by someone
with a grudge, which served him right. The old man was always beating up my
mother and us kids.
With that tiny body of hers, our mother would shield us from our monstrous
father without so much as flinching. I think she was amazing.

Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s

text:
I’m sorry I said those awful things, Big Brother. (Thoughts) It’s all… It’s all just excuses, but I was in a panic.
Shuuya,

“It’s

into a demon.
You fought

Big Brother?
When you stood there,

When we’d only just promised

Aizetsu

but first, I’ll be

The “mu” in Muichirou
means “incompetence”. This conversation is meaningless. You can’t change the past.
The “mu” in Muichirou
means “meaningless”.

The seasons changed…

Y.Tokitou         I’m going to go fetch some water, okay?

Y.Tokitou         Ah…

I bet you and I can --

exactly like Father

Just like Mother, who worked without

We’re only going to be used by that woman!

this again! Got that?! Now hurry up and get dinner ready!

Many people

It could be because
it was not considered important at the time,
or perhaps, because
the Demon Slayer Corps has been nearly destroyed many times, the
information was not passed down. Only one thing was written down clearly.
When the marked one appears, the mark will appear on others around
as well as if in resonance.

scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: That was written down in the journal of the swordsman of the First Breathing.

It was like “gwaaah”! And “whooom”! Then “gaaah”! My heart was thumping nonstop!
My ears rang so loudly! Crack, crack, crack! Like that!

explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai

things that come to mind. If the conditions are met, everyone could probably
manifest the mark.

did it.

text:
During that battle, I was poisoned
and couldn’t move.
When I tried to slow down my blood circulation and the spread of the poison using my
breathing, I saw the boy who wanted to save me nearly killed, my lost memories
returned, and then I couldn’t control my emotions because I was so angry. I
think my heart rate was over 200 beats per minute.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
Furthermore, my body was burning hot. My temperature must have reached
over 39 degrees Celsius.
speaker: Tokitou

In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:

I think the difference between those who manifest the mark and those who don’t

his circumstances.

text:

How can you be sure your temperature was 39 degrees?

In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
Well,
I had a fever when I was being treated at Kochou’s place. The thermometer

I felt it was the same heat when the mark
manifested.
speaker: Tokitou

In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains

I didn’t realize
that.

and hums to himself. A wooden

the case, since we could hardly train others other than our Tsuguko

this opportunity to strengthen the
entire Corps.
This is important and urgent.
It is important, and therefore I propose the Hashira training.

Next comes Iguro’s
training to improve
swordsmanship. I tell you the Serpent Hashira
is stubborn. After is Shinazugawa’s training.
I heard it’s endless striking
training, which, as I’m sure the name implies, will have no
end.
The last one is Himejima’s muscle strengthening. You have to throw away your humanity for this one.
The Hashira
are also expected
to improve their strength as well since they have to deal with the Corps members one after
another.
What do you think?
Isn’t that flamboyant?
I wish I had the chance
to train with everything I have as well.

admit you are very good at hiding. While I was trying to find you, Ubuyashiki became unable to move.

At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text:
Hmm… You are suspicious of me. It is understandable.
As expected, it is difficult for me to gain your trust as Tanjirou did.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text:
What are his intentions? Is Ubuyashiki trying
to deceive me?
Where is Yushirou?
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text: There is no need to worry about Yushirou.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text:
Listen. You can hear his footsteps as he comes running.
Now… I shall tell you my business.
In the Demon Slayer
Corps, there is a child
who is knowledgeable about demon bodies
and pharmacology.
We would like you to look into Nezuko’s
transformation with her.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text:
Would you work with us in order to defeat Muzan Kibutsuji?
We invite you to the Ubuyashiki residence.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text:
I, a demon, am invited
to the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters?
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Tamayo continues
her research. A kasugai crow flies into the window.

text:
Good evening, Ms. Tamayo.
It’s dangerous, you know, leaving
your window open at night. But tonight, the moon is truly a
gorgeous sight to behold.
It’s a pleasure to meet you. I’m one of Kagaya Ubuyashiki’s messengers.
Hmm… You’re full of suspicion.
I don’t blame you. It would be hard to gain your trust
like Tanjirou has, just as I thought.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text:
What does he intend to do? Ubuyashiki… Is he trying to deceive
me somehow?
Where is Yushirou?
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text: You need not worry about Yushirou.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text:
And now… shall I state my business?
There is a girl in the Demon Slayer
Corps who is also well-versed in demon physiology and pharmaceuticals. Along with
looking into the changes to Nezuko, we want you to collaborate with her.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text:
Will you work with us to defeat Muzan Kibutsuji?
Please come to the Ubuyashiki Mansion.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text:
You’re summoning me, a demon…
to the Demon Slayer Corps headquarters?
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text:
I’ll be waiting for a favorable
response from you.
speaker: Crow
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text:
Let’s go… to the Demon Slayer
Corps headquarters, the Ubuyashiki Mansion.
speaker: Tamayo
scene:
At Tamayo’s
house. Yushirou feels a pang.

text: Master…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in Tanjirou’s hospital
room. Tanjirou reads a letter
from Kagaya.

text:
“Tanjirou… How are your wounds healing?”
“I’m ashamed to admit it, but I can no longer
move.”
“And though I’d like to speak with Giyuu,
it doesn’t look like that will be possible.”
“As this is a very important time for us, I’d like us all to strive as one as hard as we can.”
“Would you mind talking to Giyuu for me?”
“So that Giyuu,
who tends to put himself
into a negative frame of mind, can start to look
ahead again, will you be persistent in your efforts to speak with him?”
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At night,
in Tanjirou’s hospital
room. Tanjirou reads a letter
from Kagaya.

text:
Mr. Giyuu…
Yes, sir!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At night,
in Tanjirou’s hospital
room. Tanjirou reads a letter
from Kagaya.

text: Huh? Mr. Tanjirou, what are you doing at this hour?
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text: Ms. Aoi.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text:
You’re not going off to Hashira
Training already, are you?
Tanjirou     There’s someone I have to go see before
I start training. Aoi
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text: Ms. Aoi!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text: I’d like to ask you something. Is that okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text:
Let’s say there’s someone
who’s all alone.
How would you go about telling that person
that they’re not alone in a way that would get through to that person?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text:
Well,
I wouldn’t know the answer to that, but Mr. Tanjirou, you’re hoping to cheer that person up, right?
If it were me, I’d want you to let me be. Are you leaving now?
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text: Oh, yes.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text: Could you wait a minute, please?
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text:
Oh… This person you’re
going to see… It’s just one, right?
speaker: Aoi
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text: Hmm… This sure is complicated…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the Butterfly
Mansion. Aoi sweeps
the ground in the courtyard. Tanjirou comes outside.

text:
They’re very simple, but I made you some rice balls. For you and that person.
Whatever you do,
you need to eat your fill first, or
you can never become healthy
in body and soul.
speaker: Aoi
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
Ms. Aoi… Thank you!
I’ll be on my way!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
Excuse me! Mr. Tomioka!
Hello! Sorry to bother you!
Mr. Giyuu! It’s me! Are you around?
It’s Tanjirou Kamado! Hello!
All right, I’m coming in!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
Coming in? No, he must’ve
said he’s leaving.
I misheard him.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: So, long story short, everyone’s been training!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: I know.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: What? So you knew? I’m glad to hear it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: Too close…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
I’ll be cleared for active duty in seven
days’ time, so do you think you could train
me?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: That’s a no.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
But why not?
I’m catching a faint whiff of anger… but what are you mad about?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
I’m angry that you didn’t master
Water Breathing to perfection.
You were supposed to become the Water Hashira.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
I’m very sorry about that. But I did talk about it
with Mr. Urokodaki, and changing the style
you start out using to develop a new breathing technique isn’t all that
uncommon.
And as the Water Breathing moves are particularly in line with the fundamentals, he says
it’s spawned a lot of techniques.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
That’s not what I’m talking about.
Right now, in the absence
of a Water Hashira,
someone has to assume the mantle of Water Hashira sooner rather than later.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
In the absence of a Water
Hashira? But we have you, Mr. Giyuu.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: I am… not the Water Hashira.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text: Get out of here.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
“Will you be persistent in your efforts
to speak with him?”
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
Sometime
later. Aoi holds a bundle
of rice balls out for Tanjirou.

text:
Mr. Giyuu! I’ve brought
some rice balls with me! Would you like to have them with me?
They say that you can’t be in a bad mood on a full
stomach.
All right, I’m going
to leave them
here.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the evening. Tanjirou
stands outside of Tomioka’s room.

text:
Mr. Giyuu! Good morning!
So, you’ve had those rice balls!
I’m glad to see that.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At dawn. Tomioka returns
to his house and finds
Tanjirou on the floor.

text: Ah… Mr. Giyuu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At dawn. Tomioka returns
to his house and finds
Tanjirou on the floor.

text:
Mr. Giyuu! What’s going on, Mr. Giyuu?
Mr. Giyuu! What’s the problem? Are you on patrol?
It seems like there have been fewer demon sightings lately,
right?
No demons here, huh? Thank goodness! All right, let’s do some training now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At dawn. Tomioka returns
to his house and finds
Tanjirou on the floor.

text:
Mr. Giyuu! Won’t you join us in training? Training!
Everyone’s waiting for you! Mr. Giyuu!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Later in the morning.
Tanjirou stands outside
Tomioka’s room.

text:
Mr. Giyuu. Mr. Giyuu! Mr. Giyuu? Mr. Giyuu!
Mr. Giyuu!
speaker: Tanjirou

Throughout the day. Tanjirou
continues to bother
Tomioka.

text:
Is he going to… keep this up for the rest of my life? (Thoughts) If I talk to him, will he
stop stalking me?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Throughout the day. Tanjirou
continues to bother
Tomioka.

text: I… never passed the Final Selection.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later,
in the mountains. Tanjirou continues to follow Tomioka.

text:
What? Final Selection? You mean the trail on the mountain
with wisteria flowers?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later,
in the mountains. Tanjirou continues to follow Tomioka.

text:
That’s right.
That year, along
with a boy whose family had also been killed
by demons, a boy with peach-colored hair named
Sabito, I took part in the Selection.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later,
in the mountains. Tanjirou continues to follow Tomioka.

text: Sabito and Mr. Giyuu…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Everyone but Sabito passed
that Final Seleciton.
I was… wounded by the first demon that attacked me and was in a daze.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
At that moment… it was Sabito who
saved me, too. Sabito     (Flashback) Water Breathing, Fourth Form… Striking
Tide! Demon       (Flashback)
Ahh!
Y.Tomioka       (Flashback) Ah…
Ugh…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: Eek… Ah… Ahhh!
speaker: Boy
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Leaving me in the care of another boy, Sabito ran off toward the voice pleading for help.
When I came to, the Final Selection was over.
It’s true that
I’d survived for seven days and passed the Selection, but as I’d failed to
defeat a single demon and had only been saved by another,
could you really
say that I’d passed?
I’m not worthy of being the Water Hashira.
And for that matter,
I’m not even worthy of standing as an equal with the other Hashira. I’m not like them. Normally,
there’d be no place for me in the Demon Slayer Corps.
Have the Hashira
train you. That would be best.
I’ll never manifest a mark. Though it might
have happened for Sabito.
Just forget about me from now on. You’re only wasting your time.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I’ll bet that Mr. Giyuu
thinks he should’ve been the one to die.
I
know all too well how that feels. When someone close to you that you wish had outlived
you… ends up dying before
you instead, and worse, dies protecting you… it
leaves you feeling gutted with pain.
Sabito,
the boy who trained me on Mt. Sagiri… That was such a strange experience. They were both already
long dead, but they helped me.
I see. So, Sabito went through the Final Selection
with Mr. Giyuu? (Thoughts) If he’d lived, he
would’ve been the same age as Mr. Giyuu.
That’s
amazing… So amazing.
He saved everyone
during the Selection. (Thoughts) It’s something I
couldn’t do. It was all I could do to protect myself.
If Sabito
were alive now, he would’ve
become such an incredible swordsman.
That must be part of the reason
why Mr. Giyuu feels he should’ve been the
one to die.
I get that.
I had that same thought
myself.
Mr. Rengoku… risked
his own life to protect
us. He was an incredible man. (Thoughts) He was kinder than anyone else and stronger.
What
an amazing way to live… right up to the end. (Thoughts) I wished I’d been the one to die instead
of Mr. Rengoku.
I thought
Mr. Rengoku might’ve
been the one to kill Muzan one day. But…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: He said he believes in you, so just think about how you’re going to measure up to that!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Right. Yes, that’s
right.
Absolutely! But what should
I say to Mr. Giyuu?
No
matter how pathetic and embarrassed you may feel, you’ve got to go on living.
Though he refuses to acknowledge it himself, I can imagine how hard he must’ve
driven himself, whipped
himself into shape
to become a Hashira. Just how much suffering
he must’ve gone through…
It’s not my place to criticize Mr. Giyuu when I know nothing about
him. But… But there’s one
thing that I just have to ask him.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
M-Mr. Giyuu!
Ugh, he won’t stop for
me!
Mr. Giyuu… Mr. Giyuu… Aren’t you going to pass on what Sabito
entrusted to you?
Y.Tomioka       (Flashback) S-Sabito?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Don’t
ever say you should’ve died again!
Next time you say it, you and I are through! I won’t be your friend
anymore!
Your big sister,
who was supposed to be married the next
day, knew what was going to happen when she hid you from the demons to
protect you! You, of all people, shouldn’t be insulting your sister’s memory!
Don’t you dare die, no matter what! The life that your sister saved for you by
sacrificing her own… the future that she entrusted to you… You have to pass
those on, too, Giyuu!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
It hurts.
The shock and pain that I felt when he struck me across the face is coming
back to me now so vividly.
Why did I forget it?
That conversation with Sabito…
Y.Tomioka       (Flashback) Ngh…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
… was important, wasn’t it?
Y.Tomioka       (Flashback) Ahh…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I didn’t want to remember
it because I wouldn’t be able to stop the tears.
Y.Tomioka       (Flashback) Ngh… Ugh… Ngh…
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Remembering made my grief unbearable, and it left me utterly
helpless.
Y.Tomioka       (Flashback) Ahhh!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Big Sis Tsutako…
Sabito… Sorry that I’m so immature.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Uh-oh… Now he’s standing stock-still.
What should I do? Was that harsh of me? Mr. Giyuu seemed
pretty down already, so did I
make it worse?
I know! How about a speed eating contest?
If I win the contest,
I’ll say, “Let’s
cheer up and get
some training in,” or something.
Since
I haven’t been cleared for active duty yet, it’s not like I can spar with him or anything… and Mr. Giyuu may be a man of few words,
but he wouldn’t have to talk during a speed eating contest! What a
brilliant idea!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Tanjirou… It’s a little
late, but I’ll join the in the training --
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: Mr. Giyuu! Wanna take me on in a cold soba noodle speed eating contest?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: Why?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Listen, about the training
program, I didn’t
hear any mention
of Kochou. What’s
Kochou teaching you all?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later,
in the city. Tanjirou and Tomioka have a speed eating contest.

text:
Ms. Shinobu?
Come to think of it, I haven’t heard anything. I wonder how she is.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later,
in the city. Tanjirou and Tomioka have a speed eating contest.

text:
Calm down. It’s all right.
Big Sis… Help me calm
down.
Only the immature
fail to control
their emotions. The immature…
speaker: Shinobu
scene: At Shinobu’s house. Shinobu sits in her room in front of an altar.

text:
Master… You’ve returned, then?
I’m leaving now to be trained
by the Wind Hashira.
speaker: Kanao
scene: At Shinobu’s house. Shinobu sits in her room in front of an altar.

text:
Can your training session wait
until after the Stone Hashira’s? Shinobu         I won’t be able to take part in the Hashira
Training this time around.
Kanao      What? B-But why?
speaker: Kanao
scene: At Shinobu’s house. Shinobu sits in her room in front of an altar.

text: Kanao, come over here.
speaker: Shinobu
scene: At Shinobu’s house. Shinobu sits in her room in front of an altar.

text:
Um… Um… I want to train with you more, Master.
I can see you’ve learned
to be much more candid about
voicing your feelings. That’s a
good sign.
Just as I thought,
the timing is just right.
I’d like to tell you… about
the demon who killed my older sister,
Kanae.
speaker: Kanao
scene: At Shinobu’s house. Shinobu sits in her room in front of an altar.

text: And… let me also tell you… how to go about killing that demon.
speaker: Shinobu
scene: At Shinobu’s house. Shinobu sits in her room in front of an altar.

text:
Too slow! Too slow!
Let’s see some fire! I don’t
believe how slow you are! It’s going
to get dark soon!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the mountains. The Demon Slayer
Corps continues their Hashira training.

text: Swing those arms more! Throw your legs forward!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the mountains. The Demon Slayer
Corps continues their Hashira training.

text: Ngh… Yes, sir! Grrr… Urahhh!
speaker: Slayer
scene:
In the mountains. The Demon Slayer
Corps continues their Hashira training.

text: Come on, let’s hear you shout!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the mountains. The Demon Slayer
Corps continues their Hashira training.

text: One, two…
speaker: Slayers

In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
Think of it this way! You can’t move on to the next step without
boosting your basic stamina!
It all starts with the basics!
The basics!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text: Gahh! Ugh!
speaker: Slayer
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
You’re so not going
to make it through Shinazugawa and Kanroji’s training
after this! You slacker…
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
I’m
so sorry! (Thoughts) It’s hell…
It’s hell here, too!
Ah!
speaker: Slayers
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
Mr.
Uzui!
speaker:
(Thoughts) There’s only hell in store for us! Uzui          Come on! Keep it together, dammit!
Jeez… Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text: Oh? Hey!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
Is that you, Kamado?
Hey there! Long time no see!
It’s been a long time! I’m so glad to see you doing
well, Mr. Uzui!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text: Hah! If you can call this “well”!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text: Look at what I’ve become!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
I hear that you took on another Upper Rank! You’re

be intact!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
Yes, fortunately, I managed
to survive somehow!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest.
The Demon Slayers
continue their training
with Uzui.

text:
Right! Well,
after all that rest, you can shatter
the rust off your body here!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the forest.

continue their training

You need to hone every one of your movements to gain the skills that will help you survive.

The crime of
